The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF FLORA MIZUKI MP9 – MPX & FLORA PANORAMA PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Ho Chi Minh City, January 12, 2023] Newtecons in collaboration with the Investor – Nam Long Group, two Japanese partners – Nishi Nippon Railroad and Hankyu Hanshin Properties solemnly held the Topping out Ceremony of Flora Mizuki MP9 – MPX & Flora Panorama project, which belongs  to Mizuki Park urban area, Binh Chanh district. Representators from Investor, Supervision Consultant, General Contractor, Subcontractor, Supplier,… were attending the ceremony.

In this project, Newtecons undertakes the construction of foundation structure, tunnel, body structure, finishing, MEP system and internal landscape infrastructure. Newtecons Management Board has fulfilled the plan committed to the Investor, successfully putting the project to the top despite the heavy impacts from the Covid-19 pandemic as well as the fluctuations of the Vietnamese and world economy.

At the event, Mr. Van Viet Son – Chairman of Nam Long Construction Management and Investment Co. Ltd., Deputy Director of Nam Long Land said: “Topping-out ceremony of Flora Mizuki MP9 – MPX & Flora Panorama project is the result of the unremitting efforts of Newtecons general contractor, supervision consultants, subcontractors, and suppliers. Mizuki is the first project Newtecons accompanies Nam Long Group and Japanese partners. With the first product, the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8, was successfully handed over to the customer recently, followed by a reliable and excellent combination in this project, we believe you will continue successfully complete the project with the highest quality and services”.

“The Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project has been handed over ahead of schedule and is highly appreciated by residents and investors for its quality.”, shared by Mr. Vo Thanh Liem – General Director of Newtecons “This is a clear proof of the good cooperation between the Investor, the Consultants and Newtecons. I believe we will continue to do better together at the Flora Mizuki MP9-MPX & Flora Panorama project”.

After the topping out ceremony, Newtecons will continue to complete the infrastructure, podium, and apartments to hand over in the second and third quarters of 2023.

Sharing feelings on the topping-out day of the project, Mr. Pham Van Binh – QS Supervisor excitedly said: “It is fun and proud to be a factor that has created the success of the project. With the unremitting efforts of all the members of the Site Management Team, we have overcome all difficulties and obstacles to complete the topping out ceremony on schedule. One grain of sand cannot make a desert, together we will create a miracle, I wish the Site Management Team successfully complete the project handover milestone.”

Mizuki Park urban area is one of the important projects of the leading real estate developer in Vietnam – Nam Long Investment Joint Stock Company, in cooperation with Newtecons in the role of General Contractor. Flora Mizuki MP9 – MPX & Flora Panorama is an apartment project belonging to the Flora+ standard product line, aiming at international standards with a series of valuable improvements in architectural design and finishing materials.

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF FLORA MIZUKI MP9 – MPX & FLORA PANORAMA PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-topping-out-ceremony-of-flora-mizuki-mp9-mpx-flora-panorama-project/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE SIGNING CEREMONY OF BUSINESS PLAN FOR 2023 https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-signing-ceremony-of-business-plan-for-2023/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-signing-ceremony-of-business-plan-for-2023/#respond Thu, 12 Jan 2023 07:45:09 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12947 [Ho Chi Minh City, January 11, 2023] Newtecons organized the signing ceremony of business plan for 2023. Through the ceremony, the Board of Directors and managers commit to lead the team, strive to achieve common goals, and continue to maintain its position as the leading General Contractor of Construction in Vietnam. Overcoming a series of ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE SIGNING CEREMONY OF BUSINESS PLAN FOR 2023 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Ho Chi Minh City, January 11, 2023] Newtecons organized the signing ceremony of business plan for 2023. Through the ceremony, the Board of Directors and managers commit to lead the team, strive to achieve common goals, and continue to maintain its position as the leading General Contractor of Construction in Vietnam.

Overcoming a series of difficulties caused by the pandemic, the scarcity of supply of raw materials – equipment – workers, market fluctuations and the profound impact of the world economic recession, Newtecons affirmed its development by five consecutive years of growth, the revenue in 2022 exceeds the milestone of VND 11,000 billion. This is a great effort of a unified team from the Board of Directors to employees.

In 2023, Newtecons determines to achieve the same results as in 2022, aims to grow by more than 10% compared to the previous year.

Beside business goals, Newtecons continues to develop human resources, train and improve the team, organize and operate the apparatus optimally, catching up with world trends. Thus, Newtecons also focuses on taking care of the lives of employees, ensure jobs for thousands of employees and continue to perform social responsibility through meaningful activities.

Previously, at the Business Plan Defense Ceremony on December 21, 2022, Newtecons Management Board and Heads of Departments/Divisions presented in detail and thoroughly about the upcoming business plan. Each goal has received many comments and criticisms as well as the best solutions for implementation.

It’s believed that, with solid internal resources, consensus and determination of all employees,Newtecons will successfully complete the plan in 2023, continuing to affirm its position as the leading prestigious Construction General Contractor in Vietnam.

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE SIGNING CEREMONY OF BUSINESS PLAN FOR 2023 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-signing-ceremony-of-business-plan-for-2023/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS ORGANIZES A CHARITY PROGRAM IN BA TANG COMMUNE, HUONG HOA DISTRICT, QUANG TRI PROVINCE. https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organizes-a-charity-program-in-ba-tang-commune-huong-hoa-district-quang-tri-province/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organizes-a-charity-program-in-ba-tang-commune-huong-hoa-district-quang-tri-province/#respond Mon, 09 Jan 2023 03:25:46 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12857 The Union Board of Newtecons recently visited Ba Tang commune, Huong Hoa district, Quang Tri province, as part of a series of yearly charitable endeavors, and presented gifts to the locals. This event was funded by Newtercons people who participated in the online Newtecons Running Challenge 2022; for each kilometer completed, 1,000 VND will be ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZES A CHARITY PROGRAM IN BA TANG COMMUNE, HUONG HOA DISTRICT, QUANG TRI PROVINCE. appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The Union Board of Newtecons recently visited Ba Tang commune, Huong Hoa district, Quang Tri province, as part of a series of yearly charitable endeavors, and presented gifts to the locals. This event was funded by Newtercons people who participated in the online Newtecons Running Challenge 2022; for each kilometer completed, 1,000 VND will be donated to the “coats of love” program.

On this trip, Newtecons visited poor locals and gave them numerous practical gifts. Warm clothes were presented to children aged 3 to 5, as well as school bags and notebooks to the top performance pupils of primary school. Milk and sweets for children, as well as practical gifts for the poor locals, totaling 110 million.

The People’s Committee representative of Ba Tang Commune, Mr. Nguyen Huu Khoa, shared: “Ba Tang is the most isolated commune of Huong Hoa district. This area is very far from the district center, so there are few sponsors come here for charity, the rate of poor households accounts for 68.75%; people live dispersed on the high hillside; in the winter, children do not have warm clothes; it is very cold; in addition to crop failure, children are severely malnourished. People of Ba Floor commune are very appreciative that Newtecons company has come here twice to share and help the locals. On behalf of local government, I would like to thank you for providing a beneficial and useful program to assist the locals. Thanks for your kindness and care, and I look forward to receiving more learning materials and goodwill from your company”.

The principal of Ba Tang Kindergarten, Ms. Nguyen Thi Diem Ngoc, spoke on behalf of the 377 kids who were given gifts this time, shared: “Today is a wonderful day because the Coats of love program is bringing warm clothes and gifts to the kids in a poor commune, Ba Tang. The locals here are very poor, thus kids lack a lot, especially in terms of personal items that safeguard kids’ health. The school always makes an effort to provide excellent care and education for our children, but it lacks the resources to provide further support for them, we really need greater engagement from the sponsors to enhance their living and learning environments. Your program supports warm clothing while also spreading love and care.

Ba Tang is a border commune located 50 kilometers south of Huong Hoa district, on the Vietnam-Laos border. Despite its many challenges, Ba Tang commune strives every day to mobilize internal and external resources to develop the economy and improve the lives of its residents, particularly children.

 

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZES A CHARITY PROGRAM IN BA TANG COMMUNE, HUONG HOA DISTRICT, QUANG TRI PROVINCE. appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organizes-a-charity-program-in-ba-tang-commune-huong-hoa-district-quang-tri-province/feed/ 0 TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF M GARDEN CITY IN DA NANG BY NEWTECONS https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-m-garden-city-in-da-nang-by-newtecons/ https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-m-garden-city-in-da-nang-by-newtecons/#respond Mon, 09 Jan 2023 03:17:19 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12856 [Da Nang, Dec 09, 2022] The entire site management team, investor, supervision consultant, design consultant, supplier, subcontractor, etc. were delighted by the topping out ceremony that Newtecons conducted for M Garden City in Da Nang. This represents a significant turning point for Newtecons and M Group in the Central market. “On behalf of M Group, ... Read more

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF M GARDEN CITY IN DA NANG BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Da Nang, Dec 09, 2022] The entire site management team, investor, supervision consultant, design consultant, supplier, subcontractor, etc. were delighted by the topping out ceremony that Newtecons conducted for M Garden City in Da Nang. This represents a significant turning point for Newtecons and M Group in the Central market.

“On behalf of M Group, I would like to celebrate the topping-out ceremony of the project, and I thank all of you for your efforts together regardless of day and the night to create a grateful event today,” Mr. Tran Quang Duc, a representative of M Group, expressed during the event. “General Contractor Newtecons and partners precisely planned and constructed M Garden City Da Nang. I would like to congratulate the general contractor, Newtecons, for overcoming many obstacles and challenges and finishing the project on schedule despite the complexity of the project structure.”

Mr. Ho Khue, Director of Design Consultant Unit, Alpes, the project’s lead architect, also spoke at the ceremony and shared: “My emotions surged again. We used to be concerned that the Investor wouldn’t select a General Contractor with the vision and commitment to fully fulfill our suggestions and passion for the project. And as we look at the project today, we can see that General Contractor Newtecons’ professionalism has met the highest technical requirements of the M Garden City Da Nang project. The finished project, which resembles a vertical garden in the center of the city, will excite both us and the residents of Da Nang.

M Garden City Da Nang, according to architect Ho Khue, is like a child he looks forward to and is excited to watch grow up little by little. Architect Ho Khue once shared that the General Contractor Newtecons gave him a lot of help so that he could complete this project: “We definitely would have faced many obstacles in finishing the project if it weren’t with Newtecons. The project’s unconventional design presents a significant technical difficulty, and the contractor in charge of the job must be both competent and romantic while also understanding the feelings of the architect. I am fortunate to have encountered others who value beauty in life.”

“For almost two years, the Site Management Team have been sleeping, eating, and living with the project, overcoming numerous obstacles and hurdles to finish an incredibly amazing project in Da Nang city. We are devoted to keeping up our best efforts to complete the task on time. The success of this project demonstrates the positive working relationship between Newtecons, M Group, and partners in subsequent projects”, according to Mr. Phan Nhat Binh, who was in attendance on behalf of General Contractor Newtecons at the event.

The fair-faced concrete surface (also known as architectural concrete), which must be flawless, original, and free of any additional materials after removing the formwork, is a challenging requirement for the site management team in this project. The Technical Department, the Equipment Department, and the Site Management Team actively calculated and planned the size of each tee and cone positions to produce a unified highlight for the entire project. In accordance with the specifications for fair-faced concrete, a concrete product that is solid, committed, meticulous, and diligently produced is flat, smooth, and consistent in color. Not only is the design vision realized, but the investor and design consultant are both satisfied and grateful.

The M Garden City Da Nang project, situated in the heart of Da Nang’s high-rise coastal buildings, has 25 stories and 3 basements. The structure’s flowing vegetation, which starts in the first floor garden and moves up each story until entering deeply into each hotel room’s interior, is coupled with a distinct fair-faced concrete block shape for each floor and an infinity sand pool on the roof. In particular, the building was rated by Archdaily as one of the most environmentally friendly, elaborate, and distinctive projects in the world, and it won the best hotel architectural design prize at the contest were held in 2020 by Property Guru Awards (Singapore).

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF M GARDEN CITY IN DA NANG BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-m-garden-city-in-da-nang-by-newtecons/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS TOPPED OUT THE PEGASUITE II PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-topped-out-the-pegasuite-ii-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-topped-out-the-pegasuite-ii-project/#respond Sat, 07 Jan 2023 09:00:04 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12943 [Ho Chi Minh City, 07.01.2023] Newtecons cooperated with Investor – Phuong Viet Investment Joint Stock Company to successfully organize the Topping Out Ceremony of The Pegasuite II project. The Pegasuite II project is a high-rise apartment complex, including single apartments, duplex apartments, garden duplex apartments, shophouses, officetels with a scale of 28 floors, 01 basement. ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS TOPPED OUT THE PEGASUITE II PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Ho Chi Minh City, 07.01.2023] Newtecons cooperated with Investor – Phuong Viet Investment Joint Stock Company to successfully organize the Topping Out Ceremony of The Pegasuite II project.


The Pegasuite II project is a high-rise apartment complex, including single apartments, duplex apartments, garden duplex apartments, shophouses, officetels with a scale of 28 floors, 01 basement.


The apartment at The PEGASUITE II was designed by Korn Architects, a famous German company and constructed by a team of experienced engineers of Newtecons.

Each apartment is delicately built to increase the living space with a variety of internal utilities: children’s playground, swimming pool, landscaped garden, shopping and entertainment services right under the building, internal café, open-concept gym with convenient equipment,…

Located on Ta Quang Buu Street, The PEGASUITE II inherits the developed area infrastructure in the center of District 8 and has quick connections to key locations in the city.

The post NEWTECONS TOPPED OUT THE PEGASUITE II PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Hanoi, January 6, 2023] Newtecons opened a representative office at the address LK- C29, Embassy Garden villa, Hoang Minh Thao, Xuan Tao ward, Bac Tu Liem district, Hanoi. This is the “second house” to create cohesion, helping Newtecons gradually realize the strategy of strongly developing projects in the North.

Moving the representative office to the same location with companies in the Ecosystem such as Ricons, SOL E&C, Boho is a way for Newtecons to combine resources and increase strength. It’s believed that the Northern field will be strongly developed and contribute to affirming Newtecons’ position in the market.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-opening-representative-office-in-hanoi/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS SUMMARIZING AND HONORING CEREMONY 2022 https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-summarizing-and-honoring-ceremony-2022/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-summarizing-and-honoring-ceremony-2022/#respond Fri, 23 Dec 2022 03:32:57 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12863 [Ho Chi Minh City, December 23, 2022] The “Summarizing and  Honoring Ceremony 2022” was held by Newtecons at Gem Center, with participation from the founding chairman, the board of management, managers, and staff members from departments and construction sites. In 2022, construction industry was impacted by global commerce and the volatility of the real estate ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS SUMMARIZING AND HONORING CEREMONY 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Ho Chi Minh City, December 23, 2022] The “Summarizing and  Honoring Ceremony 2022” was held by Newtecons at Gem Center, with participation from the founding chairman, the board of management, managers, and staff members from departments and construction sites.

In 2022, construction industry was impacted by global commerce and the volatility of the real estate market. However, Newtecons has effectively finished the business plan and achieved amazing outcomes with a strong spirit..

Mr. Nguyen Ba Duong, the Founding Chairman of Newtecons, noted the outcomes of the team in 2022 and made the following comment: “With a strong team on hand, experience working with domestic and foreign partners and technical understanding, Newtecons has more than enough capacity to carry out the biggest projects today”.

“Newtecons people has achieved significant success despite experiencing difficulties and challenges, we have passed the milestone of 10,000 billion registered at the beginning of the year,” said Mr. Tran Kim Long, Chairman of the Board of Newtecons, about company’s achievements.

In 2022, Newtecons concentrated on human resource development, comprehensive training from expertise to skills, typically: Training activities from the Executive Board, Management level; Training activities at the level of Deputy Head of Department; Training activities at the level of Deputy Construction Site Manager; Safety training activities; Brand training. One brilliant example is the training activities conducted on the construction site, which are always kept up-to-date and provide several advantages to both the trainees and the training participants. With the signing of MOUs with prominent colleges, Newtecons created chances for students to get practical knowledge before their graduation.

Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, General Director of Newtecons, spoke about the strategy for 2023 and stated: “The real estate market is witnessing many fluctuations, which will directly effect construction enterprises in the future year. But after evaluating the available prospects and the strength of the Company’s human resources, the Board of Management discussed about and established ambitious targets for 2023. The business strategy for 2023 of the Board of Management has demonstrated the great determination and unanimity of all employees to reach the objective by using the message “Be Great Together” as a guideline”.

Newtecons honored 51 people and 7 teams at the ceremony for their great achievement in 2022. This is an annual event to honor the work of groups and individuals that have positively impacted the company’s production and business operations.

Năm 2022 dần khép lại với nhiều khó khăn, thách thức nhưng tập thể Người Newtecons kịp thời thích ứng, tiếp tục tin tưởng và đồng lòng để xây dựng một Newtecons thêm lớn mạnh – Be Great Together.

Một số hình ảnh khác tại sự kiện:

 

The post NEWTECONS SUMMARIZING AND HONORING CEREMONY 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-summarizing-and-honoring-ceremony-2022/feed/ 0 [SEMINAR] NEWTECONS PROVIDED “SAFETY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM” TRAINING FOR VICE CONSTRUCTION SITE MANAGERS AND WORKPLACE SAFETY TRAINING FOR EMPLOYEES NATIONWIDE https://newtecons.vn/en/seminar-newtecons-provided-safety-management-system-training-for-vice-construction-site-managers-as-well-as-workplace-safety-training-for-employees-nationwide/ https://newtecons.vn/en/seminar-newtecons-provided-safety-management-system-training-for-vice-construction-site-managers-as-well-as-workplace-safety-training-for-employees-nationwide/#respond Thu, 08 Dec 2022 04:25:59 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12677 In order to ensure that each employee fully comprehends and performs their job functions effectively, Newtecons continuously organizes occupational safety training sessions throughout the system. This ensures that the project construction process is accurate in every detail and provides safety for workers right on the construction site. Newtecons recently hosted a training session for more ... Read more

The post [SEMINAR] NEWTECONS PROVIDED “SAFETY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM” TRAINING FOR VICE CONSTRUCTION SITE MANAGERS AND WORKPLACE SAFETY TRAINING FOR EMPLOYEES NATIONWIDE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> In order to ensure that each employee fully comprehends and performs their job functions effectively, Newtecons continuously organizes occupational safety training sessions throughout the system. This ensures that the project construction process is accurate in every detail and provides safety for workers right on the construction site.

Newtecons recently hosted a training session for more than 30 Vice Construction Site Managers and other elite employees on the theme “Safety management system,” with the energetic and enthusiastic presentation of Duong Hoang Giang, the head of the HSSE department.

The training class “Safety management system” of Newtecons’ Vice Construction Site Manager training program 2022 – 2023 focused on general knowledge such as the safety management system’s vision, mission, and values; Operational structure of the occupational safety system; 4M + 1E occupational safety management system pillar; Foundational models of safety management systems; Vice Construction Site Manager’s roles and responsibilities; Formula 3-4-5-6 in safe system operation; and so on.

The clear and insightful presentation of Mr. Duong Hoang Giang helps learners better understood the significance of safety work. Vice Construction Site Managers also gained the knowledge, courage, and self-control they needed to ensure the safety of workers and stakeholders, which contributed to the project’s overall success.

Mr. Nguyen Van Ban shared after the course, “I’ve been to a lot of safety training sessions, but this one stands out for both its substance and its implementation. Boring safety knowledge is cleverly incorporated through games under the direction of Mr. Duong Hoang Giang, leaving a lasting memory”.

“After training, I realized the potential risks in the process of performing the work and measures to prevent these risks, as well as how to understand the organizational chart and how to coordinate with related departments to operate the job in the most efficient and safest way possible. I also sense the HSSE Department’s enthusiasm for developing the Occupational Safety Management system”, said Mr. Tran Duong Hong Quan.

At construction sites across the nation, Newtecons also frequently welcomes top specialists in the sector to transfer knowledge to our nurses, safety staff, and safety supervisors. Typical examples include the occupational safety and health training class mandated by Decree 44/2016/ND-CP and the first aid class for occupational accidents in 2022, mandated by Circular 19/2016/BYT, hosted by Vietnam Control – Center of Occupational Safety Inspection and Training.

In addition, Newtecons regularly audits all construction sites across the nation and inspects the Health and Safety System in accordance with ISO 45001:2018 and the Environmental Management System in accordance with ISO 14001:2015 in order to promptly assess, closely monitor, and reduce potential incidents.

Now, Newtecons’ occupational safety management system is run using the following principles: Risk control as the foundation; deployment and operation of the optimal management system; and data assistance during testing and evaluation.

Some photos from the training:

 

The post [SEMINAR] NEWTECONS PROVIDED “SAFETY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM” TRAINING FOR VICE CONSTRUCTION SITE MANAGERS AND WORKPLACE SAFETY TRAINING FOR EMPLOYEES NATIONWIDE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/seminar-newtecons-provided-safety-management-system-training-for-vice-construction-site-managers-as-well-as-workplace-safety-training-for-employees-nationwide/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS AWARDS SHOPDRAWING & REVIT COURSE CERTIFICATE https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-awards-shopdrawing-revit-course-certificate/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-awards-shopdrawing-revit-course-certificate/#respond Thu, 08 Dec 2022 03:32:45 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12862 Following an evaluation of their four months of training, Newtecons certified 17 engineers from the project and office in the M&E Division in Shopdrawing and Revit. Mr. Vo Thanh Cang, representative of the Board of Directors and Director of the M&E Division, presented certificates to learners who completed this course successfully. This is the second ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS AWARDS SHOPDRAWING & REVIT COURSE CERTIFICATE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Following an evaluation of their four months of training, Newtecons certified 17 engineers from the project and office in the M&E Division in Shopdrawing and Revit. Mr. Vo Thanh Cang, representative of the Board of Directors and Director of the M&E Division, presented certificates to learners who completed this course successfully.

This is the second Shopdrawing & Revit course to be held this year. Students are trained in basic knowledge of design software such as Autocad, Naviswork, and Revit over the course of 15 lessons, with the goal of being able to apply it smoothly to building 3D models, check and publish construction drawings, combination drawings, and collision control, etc. after completing the course.

Mr. Thoi Van Hoi (Expert in Bidding Department – M&E) took on the role of lecturer, ensuring that all knowledge was properly understood and effectively applied by learners. “To complete this course, students must have a tremendous amount of resolve and perseverance. When a large number of projects reach their peak, it can be difficult to focus on their studies. Nonetheless, they continued to study, attended all sessions in full, completed all assignments, and passed the final exam. I place a high value on learner effort”.

“As one of the Company’s new supervisors, I feel fortunate to have a good opportunity to attend the course and supplement my knowledge for the job, I had previously learned about Revit on my own, but it was sporadic. Since then, I have systematized my knowledge and applied it more effectively to my work, specifically for the bidding of a recent project”, said Mr. Le Minh Tam who received the highest honor for his graduation.

“The Shopdrawing & Revit course has successfully concluded and resulted in many positive outcomes”, said Mr. Vo Thanh Cang, Director of M&E Division, with joy. “As a result, we will expand the training model going forward so that both M&E and Construction staffs will have the chance to participate in learning and knowledge advancement”.

The Human Resource Management Department uses the completion of the course as a basis for evaluating the quality of human resources each year, which may lead to opportunities for the completed learners to be appointed and promoted in the near future.

The recently released draft predicts that BIM – Revit will quickly catch on and be widely used on construction sites. As the top general contractor for construction in Vietnam, Newtecons has pioneered and implemented this solution in numerous projects, including Grand Marina in Saigon, Masteri Waterfont, Techcombank Saigon Tower, Flora Mizuki and Flora Panorama, the Sóng, M Garden City Da Nang, tSora Gardens SC, and Viettel Hoa Lac, etc.

The post NEWTECONS AWARDS SHOPDRAWING & REVIT COURSE CERTIFICATE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-awards-shopdrawing-revit-course-certificate/feed/ 0 TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF SORA GARDEN SC BY NEWTECONS https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-sora-garden-sc-by-newtecons/ https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-sora-garden-sc-by-newtecons/#respond Thu, 01 Dec 2022 07:47:11 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12860 [Ho Chi Minh City, December 1, 2022] The SORA Gardens SC project’s topping out ceremony was held by Newtecons with the assistance of Investor Becamex Tokyu. Representatives from several organizations, including the leaders of the province of Binh Duong, Becamex IDC, AEON Vietnam, AEON FANTASY VIETNAM, Apave, Artelia, SWA, Plantec, 9PMP Vietnam, Site Management Team, ... Read more

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF SORA GARDEN SC BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Ho Chi Minh City, December 1, 2022] The SORA Gardens SC project’s topping out ceremony was held by Newtecons with the assistance of Investor Becamex Tokyu. Representatives from several organizations, including the leaders of the province of Binh Duong, Becamex IDC, AEON Vietnam, AEON FANTASY VIETNAM, Apave, Artelia, SWA, Plantec, 9PMP Vietnam, Site Management Team, contractors, and subcontractors, attended the ceremony.

Speaking on behalf of Becamex Tokyu, Mr. Oh Dongkun said: “Today we celebrate the topping out celebration, a significant milestone for the SORA gardens SC project. For maintaining the site’s record of safe construction with more than 500,000 hours of safety, I would like to convey my sincere gratitude to Newtecons contractor. I want to emphasize to the contractor that they should keep putting safety first and keeping the project on track. We are close to our dream SORA Gardens SC. We are confident that this project would considerably improve living conditions in Binh Duong City and offer great joy to all locals”.

The local government, Becamex Tokyu Investor, and partners were thanked by Mr. Tran Kim Long, Chairman of Newtecons Board of Directors, for fostering favorable conditions that allowed Newtecons to carry out the project and proceed with the project topping-out on schedule. “SORA Gardens SC was constructed during a period when the construction sector, particularly the overall economy, was struggling. Significant effects include spikes in raw material prices, a labor shortage, banks’ tightening of credit policies, modifications to legislation governing fire prevention and fighting, etc. Despite these obstacles, the topping ceremony still took place at the scheduled time. This is a significant milestone to mark the completion of the first difficult part of the journey and also demonstrates the enthusiasm of the Newtecons engineering team who have worked tirelessly day and night to bring success to the project”, said Mr. Long.

The SORA gardens SC project was quickly put into operation beginning in March 2022 by Newtecons as the General Contractor under the strict supervision of the Investor. Construction management, environmental sanitation, and safety are always prioritized and definitely guaranteed; office work, including record administration, is carried out carefully and systematically.

“Site Management Team carefully planned people resources, supplies, and equipment while promptly preparing and implementing proper construction plans. We are always highly focused, united, working day and night to complete the huge workload and urgent timeline.” Mr. Le Van Manh, Construction Site Manager, shared at the event.

The project is expected to be completed by the end of the first quarter of 2023, the Site Management Team has made numerous preparations to meet the tight construction deadline while maintaining the highest level in accordance with strict Japan technical standards.

Những ngày cuối năm, mặc dù gặp rất nhiều khó khăn do biến động của thị trường, nhịp làm việc trên công trường dự án SORA gardens SC tất bật, tinh thần làm việc hăng say kể cả ngoài công trường và tại văn phòng dự án. Không khí làm việc luôn khẩn trương, sôi nổi nhưng không thiếu những nụ cười lạc quan, tin tưởng.


Dự án gồm 4 tầng với tổng diện tích sàn xây dựng 19.863m2. Sau khi hoàn thiện, SORA gardens SC sẽ trở thành khu phức hợp thương mại đầu tiên và lớn nhất Thành phố mới Bình Dương, bao gồm: Siêu thị, khu mua sắm, khu vui chơi giải trí, khu ẩm thực, rạp chiếu phim, khuôn viên cây xanh với cảnh quang bắt mắt. Đây là dự án thứ 2 sau sự hợp tác thành công giữa Newtecons và Becamex Tokyu tại dự án Sora Gardens II.

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF SORA GARDEN SC BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

The post NEWTECONS FINISHES AND DELIVERS WAREHOUSE FOR LEASE OF SAO DAU appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The Warehouse for Lease of Sao Dau was finished and delivered to the Investor by Newtecons Site Management Team after a time of concentration and efforts to overcome numerous obstacles.

This multi-story factory model (with 2 main floors and 2 mezzanine floors) is a factory for lease that vividly illustrates the aesthetic, quality is its own individuality when combined with a steel structural system and a well-invested exterior that complies with LEED (USA) criteria. It has a scale of almost 3 hectares, a floor area of almost 58,000 sqm, and a main floor height of 12 m.

“The Site Management Team faced many obstacles at the start of the project because the epidemic situation was unstable, the location was far from the center, and there was a lot of equipment,” said Acting Construction Site Manager Truong Van Quyen. “However, with the assistance and encouragement of the Board of Directors and other Departments, we were able to successfully complete the project. Everyone’s efforts and tenacity are what have led to today’s major achievement.”

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-finishes-and-delivers-warehouse-for-lease-of-sao-dau/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS HAS BEEN HONORED THE VIETNAM BEST PLACES TO WORK AND MOST ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYERS 2022 https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-has-been-honored-the-vietnam-best-places-to-work-and-most-attractive-employers-2022/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-has-been-honored-the-vietnam-best-places-to-work-and-most-attractive-employers-2022/#respond Tue, 15 Nov 2022 04:04:10 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12584 [November 9, 2022, HCMC] Newtecons is honored to be named to Anphabe’s Top 100 Vietnam Best Places to Work and Top 50 Vietnamese Most Attractive Employers 2022 lists. The Vietnam Best Place to Work is an annual prestigious workplace award presented by Anphabe, a Pioneering Consultant on Employer Branding and Happy Working Environment. The program ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS HAS BEEN HONORED THE VIETNAM BEST PLACES TO WORK AND MOST ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYERS 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [November 9, 2022, HCMC] Newtecons is honored to be named to Anphabe’s Top 100 Vietnam Best Places to Work and Top 50 Vietnamese Most Attractive Employers 2022 lists.

The Vietnam Best Place to Work is an annual prestigious workplace award presented by Anphabe, a Pioneering Consultant on Employer Branding and Happy Working Environment. The program began in 2013 under the sponsor of the Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry (VCCI).

The award is based on a totally independent study that collected honest opinions from 60,000 respondents across the nation and asked them to rank the workplaces they would most like to work at according to a series of criteria. Benefits, career chances, culture and values, the leadership team, the quality of work and life, the reputation of the organization, etc. are all assessed. The calculations and results were inspected by Intage Vietnam, a market research company.

With consistent efforts over the years, Newtecons has been successful in attracting applicants and keeping personnel with practical activities, such as providing a welcoming and convenient workplace and showing an interest in building the successor team. The best welfare and compensation policies in construction industry are what Newtecons concentrates on creating, including competitive pay, superior health insurance, visiting and caring policies for staff members and their families, etc. Focus on executing training activities and establishing the right environment for employees to succeed in their career path while simultaneously identifying the crucial goal of uniting the entire apparatus and increasing the quality of human resources.

Because people are the key to sustainable development, Newtecons places a strong emphasis on employee happiness, develops unique principles, and will continue to enhance welfare policies to become a second home where employees feel safe and commit to grow.

Newtecons was previously recognized by HR Asia Magazine as one of the Best Companies to Work for in Asia in August 2022. For three years in a row, Newtecons has held this distinction.

The post NEWTECONS HAS BEEN HONORED THE VIETNAM BEST PLACES TO WORK AND MOST ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYERS 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-has-been-honored-the-vietnam-best-places-to-work-and-most-attractive-employers-2022/feed/ 0 SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF GRAND MARINA, SAIGON PROJECT CONQUER THE DEEPEST BASEMENT IN VIETNAM https://newtecons.vn/en/site-management-team-of-grand-marina-saigon-project-conquer-the-deepest-basement-in-vietnam/ https://newtecons.vn/en/site-management-team-of-grand-marina-saigon-project-conquer-the-deepest-basement-in-vietnam/#respond Mon, 24 Oct 2022 01:40:16 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12412 On October 20, 2022, late at night, the Newtecons Site Management Team rushed to pour the second largest batch of concrete of the B4 basement at the Grand Marina project in Saigon, with a volume of up to 2,600m3. With a total volume of up to roughly 12,700 m3, basement B4 of the Grand Marina ... Read more

The post SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF GRAND MARINA, SAIGON PROJECT CONQUER THE DEEPEST BASEMENT IN VIETNAM appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On October 20, 2022, late at night, the Newtecons Site Management Team rushed to pour the second largest batch of concrete of the B4 basement at the Grand Marina project in Saigon, with a volume of up to 2,600m3.

With a total volume of up to roughly 12,700 m3, basement B4 of the Grand Marina project in Saigon includes 5 huge batches of concrete for the annulus area (excluding the pit foundation area). The Site Management Team and the Technical Department evaluated several options in order to balance cost, time, and concrete quality. The last decision was using low heat cement for large concrete batch because it helps to lower the risk of mechanical cracking caused by the thermal effect of cement hydration in concrete after construction, the thermal insulation method was also applied to increase the cement block’s efficiency.

The project’s Vice Construction Site Manager, Mr. Tran Hong Phuoc, shared: “The B4 basement of the Grand Marina, Saigon project has substantial components and a challenging building process, necessitating the Site Management Team’s intense concentration. My team is “stretching” for the second batch tonight following the success of the first. I am confident that we will achieve this significant milestone together, with the help of experienced staff, carefully monitored construction activities, and the application of numerous ideal technological measures.

Site Management Team of Grand Marina, Saigon project is determined to complete this important milestone.

The project’s basement B4 is now the deepest basement in Vietnam, with a digging depth of -29.75m. When building such a depth basement, the Site Management Team faces numerous difficulties, such as the ease with which leads to the quality of nearby construction projects subsiding, the dangers of the diaphragm wall from depths pushing up the excavation pit and lowering the groundwater, and so on.

Faced with the aforementioned challenges, the Site Management Team’s compliance with the measures has been strengthened, and all engineers are well aware of the measures; monitoring diaphragm wall displacement cyclically, focusing on areas with poor prognosis, checking reverse analysis for continuous assessment during construction; conducting exploratory excavation of the diaphragm wall in each area; closely supervising and coordinating with the Technical Department throughout the construction process. Many contingency construction plans, in particular, are prepared to respond to potential risks in a flexible manner.

The remaining batches of basement B4 are expected to be deployed and completed in late October, followed by the Site Management Team carrying out construction and excavation to the bottom of the foundation area in mid-November.

Best wishes to the Grand Marina, Saigon Project’s Site Management Team for successfully completing the important milestone and conquering Vietnam’s deepest basement.

Some images from the second batch of the B4 basement construction of the Grand Marina project in Saigon:

 

 

 

 

 

The post SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF GRAND MARINA, SAIGON PROJECT CONQUER THE DEEPEST BASEMENT IN VIETNAM appeared first on Newtecons.

It is an annual event for the Vietnamese business community organized by Vietnam Economic Magazine – VnEconomy – Vietnam ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS WAS HONORED AS A WINNER OF TOP 10 EXCELLENT BRANDS 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Hanoi City, October 12, 2022] Newtecons was honored as a winner of Top 10 Excellent Brands 2022 – Construction and building materials industry at the “Vietnamese Excellent Brand Awards 2022” event that was organized by VnEconomy.

It is an annual event for the Vietnamese business community organized by Vietnam Economic Magazine – VnEconomy – Vietnam Economic Times. The program was created to recognize prestigious businesses that have made significant contributions to the local and national economies through their production and business activities.

With the theme “Creating and Developing a Green Vietnamese Brand”, the voting criteria this year included creativity, innovation, the application of digital technology in production and business activities, corporate restructuring, digital transformation, green transformation, energy saving, development of production and business models, brand protection, focusing on promoting policies towards employees and the community.

Meeting the program’s criteria, Newtecons made a mark when becoming one of the 10 Excellent Brands in 2022.

Mr. Tran Thanh Hai – Newtecons representative received the award of Top 10 Excellent Brands 2022 in construction and building materials industry.

Newtecons is currently one of the most prestigious General Contractors in the Construction industry, undertaking the Design and Construction of a wide range of projects. With the motto “Build on trust,” Newtecons has built a series of works of outstanding quality, meeting the strict technical – fine art requirements of domestic and foreign investors over the years.

Furthermore, Newtecons is constantly improving the working process toward leanness and flexibility; raising a team of experienced, passionate engineers; and creating a transparent, dynamic, and professional working environment. Newtecons has always believed that human is the key to long-term growth, so it strives to create a working environment that prioritizes employee satisfaction to create truly unique values.

The post GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF GRAND BAY HALONG COMPLEX PROJECT HELD BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]>  [On September 14, 2022, Quang Ninh] The Grand Bay Ha Long Complex project’s official groundbreaking ceremony was hosted by Newtecons and BIMLand. Distinguished visitors from the Investor, Artelia Supervision Consultant, General Contractor, Supliers, and Sub-contractors were present at the event.

The Grand Bay Halong Complex project is located on peninsula 3, Halong Marina tourism urban area, Bai Chay ward, Ha Long city, Quang Ninh province. The project takes the form of a bow, capturing all of the poetic beauty of the sky, and is located next to the world’s natural wonder, Ha Long Bay. It is located on 7.8 hectares of land and is surrounded by 475 meters of coastline. The project, which is scheduled to be finished in the third quarter of 2023 with Newtecons is at the General Contractor position.

Speaking at the event, Mr. Le Duc Buu, the Managing Director of Newtecons, said: “With extensive experience in implementing projects with strict quality requirements from many domestic and foreign partners, Newtecons will meet the requirements of the project and coordinate well with the Investor, the Supervision Consultant to complete on schedule, quality, and safety.”

According to Mr. Francis A. Nuñez Jr., a representative of the investor, the project is anticipated to provide clients with a private, opulent, and elegant living area in the most desirable position in Ha Long Bay. While doing so, he also expressed his confidence in choosing Newtecons as the general contractor for the project. With experience building numerous significant and noticeable projects in Vietnam, Newtecons will finish the Grand Bay Halong Complex project on schedule, guaranteeing worker safety and being environmentally responsible. This is also a good start, tightening the cooperation relationship between the parties.

With a professional and dynamic team, the Newtecons Site Management Team is committed to finishing the project on time, with the highest level of technical and aesthetic achievement as well as Investor satisfaction. At the moment, construction plans have been promptly created and implemented, and equipment and human resources have also been carefully prepared.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/groundbreaking-ceremony-of-grand-bay-halong-complex-project-held-by-newtecons/feed/ 0 THE M&E CONSTRUCTION SKILLS CONTEST WAS SUCCESSFULLY ARRANGED BY NEWTECONS https://newtecons.vn/en/the-me-construction-skills-contest-was-successfully-arranged-by-newtecons/ https://newtecons.vn/en/the-me-construction-skills-contest-was-successfully-arranged-by-newtecons/#respond Wed, 14 Sep 2022 02:04:38 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12177 [September 9, 2022, HCMC] At the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project, a board of Dong Nai Plastic Joint Stock Company, Artelia supervision consultant, Ngoc Nguyen Production Trading Co., Ltd, and Newtecons successfully held an M&E Construction Skills contest for 16 teams from various partners. “Newtecons M&E Division has constantly developed, combining from management, supervision, and selection ... Read more

The post THE M&E CONSTRUCTION SKILLS CONTEST WAS SUCCESSFULLY ARRANGED BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [September 9, 2022, HCMC] At the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project, a board of Dong Nai Plastic Joint Stock Company, Artelia supervision consultant, Ngoc Nguyen Production Trading Co., Ltd, and Newtecons successfully held an M&E Construction Skills contest for 16 teams from various partners.

“Newtecons M&E Division has constantly developed, combining from management, supervision, and selection procedures, considering the specifics of each type of project while choosing the materials and building resources.” Said Mr. Vo Thanh Cang, Director of Newtecons M&E Division. “In addition, the strength of engineers and skilled laborers is critical in ensuring that the construction process is meticulous and technically sound. As a result, the M&E Construction Skills Competition was held, providing technicians with the opportunity to collaborate, learn new skills, and sharpen their abilities. This contest is the change for Newtecons and partners can strengthen our bonds by exchanging ideas and connecting with one another.

Mr. Vo Thanh Cang – Director of Newtecons M&E Division shared at the event

The contest featured 16 teams who engaged in spirited competition: CSE, Vinh Dat, Metech, Aquarius, Dat Phan, Mepac, Quoc Hung, CEE, Tan Long Hai, Fire Protection 2.9, Ba Duong, Gia Nguyen, Tan Phu Loi, Tran Huynh Quang, Minh Y, and Nam Viet. The teams must concentrate on allocating employees, carrying out the construction in a safe manner using the proper technique, finishing on schedule, and producing the highest quality during the three hours. The following results were noted:

Category of water supply and drainage:

+ First Prize: Aquarius

+ Second Prize: CSE

Category of fire protection:

+ First Prize: Ba Duong

+ Second Prize: Tan Long Hai

Category of Air Conditioner:

+ First Prize: Tan Phu Loi

+ Second Prize: Minh Y

Category of M&E:

+ First Prize: Quoc Hung

+ Second Prize: CEE

Installation of copper pipes, ducts, electrical equipment, fire hoses, and water supply pipes are the four competition categories. The organizing committee has set up the relevant materials and lists at each tournament area for the teams to verify and confirm before beginning.

A Jury Council was formed with a team of specialists, skilled engineers from Newtecons, and representatives of the competing units to assure objectivity. The construction process and organization, construction process and methods, technique and skills of workers, and completion time were taken into consideration when making the decision.

“Today, the teams competed very enthusiastically, focusing on construction and completion of their tasks in the quickest and most exciting way,” said Mr. Nguyen Anh Tuan, representative of Dong Nai Plastic Joint Stock Company, the unit assisting the contest. “As a result of this competition, the teams were able to exchange and learn skills from one another. I believe this is an important specialized playground, and I hope that Newtecons will continue to organize and grow these events next time.”

Some photos from the event:

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/the-me-construction-skills-contest-was-successfully-arranged-by-newtecons/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS APPOINTED DEPUTY HEAD OF FINANCE – ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-appointed-deputy-head-of-finance-accounting-department/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-appointed-deputy-head-of-finance-accounting-department/#respond Thu, 08 Sep 2022 06:02:54 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12112 Mr. Vo Thanh Liem - General Director of Newtecons awarded the decision on appointment to Ms. Ha Thi Thuy Hang as Deputy Head of Finance - Accounting Department on September 5, 2022.

The post NEWTECONS APPOINTED DEPUTY HEAD OF FINANCE – ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]>

The Board of Directors promoted Ms. Ha Thi Thuy Hang to Deputy Head of Finance – Accounting Department due to her expertise and enthusiasm for her job. Ms. Hang will collaborate with other members of the Construction Department to immediately prevent, detect, and handle cost control, finance, and cost optimization issues to improve the efficiency of the Company’s business operations.

Before starting at Newtecons in December 2020, Ms. Hang held several prominent positions in the Finance – Accounting Department at leading construction companies. Ms. Hang was employed by Newtecons and worked as the Accounting Controller. During her time working here, she showed a constant sense of positivity, dedication, and care for detail. For the purpose of controlling project costs, Ms. Hang has also used her expertise to enhance the Financial Management – Accounting and Cost & Contract Management systems.

“I appreciate the trust the Board of Directors and my coworkers have shown in me,” Ms. Ha Thi Thuy Hang said. “As the Deputy Head of the Finance – Accounting Department, I will continue to work hard, strive to complete the assigned tasks, and work with the Department’s members to provide advice to the Executive Board regarding finance and accounting, build a complete system, and contribute to the overall development of Newtecons.”

Wishing Ms. Ha Thi Thuy Hang luck in her new position and pledging to work with her in furthering the growth of Newtecons in general as well as the Finance – Accounting Department in particular.

The post NEWTECONS APPOINTED DEPUTY HEAD OF FINANCE – ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-appointed-deputy-head-of-finance-accounting-department/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS ORGANIZED FLEXIBLE THINKING WORKSHOP IN THE VUCA ERA FOR MANAGERS https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-flexible-thinking-workshop-in-the-vuca-era-for-managers/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-flexible-thinking-workshop-in-the-vuca-era-for-managers/#respond Thu, 01 Sep 2022 10:00:21 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12065 Flexible thinking has become an increasingly important skill for managers in order to successfully manage work and lead teams to achieve goals. So, what exactly is flexible thinking? How can organizations develop flexible thinking in their operations and management? What is the best way to practice flexible thinking? Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, General Director of ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED FLEXIBLE THINKING WORKSHOP IN THE VUCA ERA FOR MANAGERS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Flexible thinking has become an increasingly important skill for managers in order to successfully manage work and lead teams to achieve goals. So, what exactly is flexible thinking? How can organizations develop flexible thinking in their operations and management? What is the best way to practice flexible thinking? Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, General Director of Newtecons, shared and discussed these contents at the seminar with the topic “Flexible thinking.” All Newtecons management staff from the Board of Management, Office Division, and Construction Division attended the sharing session.


During the VUCA period, when there were many fluctuations, complicated changes, that difficult to predict, and sometimes very vague, the market in general, and the real estate – construction market in particular, faced some certain challenges. These challenge require managers to shift their thinking toward flexibility, adaptability, and innovation. “Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything”, said George Bernard, and “The measure of intelligence is the ability to change”, said Einstein

So, what is “flexible thinking”?

Thinking with flexibility, sometimes referred to as COGNITIVE FLEXIBILITY and MENTAL FLEXIBILITY, enables you to comprehend and accept the actions, thought processes, routines, way of life, and decisions of others.

Leaders in the VUCA era must have Vision – Knowledge – Courage – Adaptability to develop flexible thinking in operating and managing organizations. One of the most important abilities is the ability to think creatively. The Agile Thinking method follows rules but has no restrictions on how it is implemented as long as specific results are achieved.

“The more flexible we become in our thinking and being, the more we open ourselves to self-awareness & growth.” James Van Praagh

“Be clear about your goal but be flexible about the process of achieving it”. Brian Tracy

Mr. Vo Thanh Liem also discussed with Newtecons employees how to cultivate flexible thinking skills such as KEEPING CALM, CONTROLLING TIME, SHARING PROBLEMS, and, most importantly, STARTING POSITIVE ATTITUDE. Managers should try to face change; stay calm when things don’t go as planned and give everyone the opportunity to come up with their own way of doing things. Look for external sensations; View from the expert’s point of view; Accept mixed feedback; Drop your ego.

Many viewpoints were shared during the training session on the above-mentioned great topic, and many contributions were analyzed collectively.

“It is challenging to be flexible in the process because of the nature of the construction sector, which is characterized by urgent progress and high-quality criteria”, said Mr. Phan Nhat Binh, Project Director. “So, in order to maximize productivity, we prioritize compliance and do our best to be adaptable in our work practices.”  

According to the seminar analysis, Mr. Tran Thanh Hai – Project Director honestly admitted that he was not very flexible in managing and operating work. Mr. Hai told himself that he would change himself to become more flexible and run the organization in a more rhythmic manner as a result of this.

Nhận được nhiều phản hồi tích cực và sự tham gia thảo luận nhiệt tình từ các thành viên tham dự, buổi seminar đã thành công hơn mong đợi. Tin rằng, mỗi CBQL sẽ kiên trì thực hành các phương pháp để rèn luyện tư duy linh hoạt, áp dụng vào trong quản lý và lan tỏa đến từng thành viên trong tổ chức. 

Đào tạo nâng cao kiến thức, kỹ năng là hoạt động được Newtecons chú trọng thực hiện nhằm nâng tầm nhân sự. Các cấp Quản lý Newtecons sẽ tiếp tục các chuyên đề tiếp theo trong thời gian tới.

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED FLEXIBLE THINKING WORKSHOP IN THE VUCA ERA FOR MANAGERS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-flexible-thinking-workshop-in-the-vuca-era-for-managers/feed/ 0 MIZUKI TEAM WON THE NEWTECONS CHAMPIONSHIP SUPER CUP 2022 https://newtecons.vn/en/mizuki-team-won-the-newtecons-championship-super-cup-2022/ https://newtecons.vn/en/mizuki-team-won-the-newtecons-championship-super-cup-2022/#respond Mon, 29 Aug 2022 04:39:43 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12056 The Newtecons Championship Super Cup 2022 took place on August 28, 2022, at Gia Dinh Stadium (HCMC), and it was concluded after more than 3 hours of battle between 4 teams from the North, Central, and South. The Mizuki team successfully won the Championship Cup with a convincing 4 – 0 victory in the final ... Read more

The post MIZUKI TEAM WON THE NEWTECONS CHAMPIONSHIP SUPER CUP 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The Newtecons Championship Super Cup 2022 took place on August 28, 2022, at Gia Dinh Stadium (HCMC), and it was concluded after more than 3 hours of battle between 4 teams from the North, Central, and South. The Mizuki team successfully won the Championship Cup with a convincing 4 – 0 victory in the final match, “holding up” a cash prize of VND 50 million from the Organization Board.

including BWID, Hoa Phat, Mizuki, Lien Quan (Technology – Equipment – CCM – Communication Departments). These are the teams that won at the elimination round of the North – Central – South regions and excellently got the tickets to the Super Cup round.

“Football is not just a sport; it also exemplifies teamwork, flexible thinking on the part of each member, with the loyalty, morality, and unity of all team members for victory,” said Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, General Director, at the Opening Ceremony. “This Super Cup round brings together people from the North, Central, and South; I hope we all do well as a team. This is an opportunity for you to have fun and get some exercise, as well as for all of us to interact, get to know one another, and work well as a team.”

Mizuki and Lien Quan had a fierce confrontation in the final match. Mizuki opened the scoring after only a few minutes. The Lien Quan team was almost completely outmatched by the strong attacks. Despite numerous opportunities to counterattack, Lien Quan did not counterattack “efficiently.” Lien Quan may spend too much energy competing in the Semi-Final match under hot weather this noon. Mizuki shone brightly for the entire 40 minutes and two halves. Finally, when the whistle blew, the fans erupted in joy at Mizuki’s well-deserved victory of 4 – 0.

This is considered Mizuki’s excellent game turn because the two teams previously met at the Southern region’s table, but the Lien Quan team won the Championship. Mizuki team achieved the goal this time, becoming the defending champion of the Newtecons Championship Super Cup 2022.

Previously, in the semi-finals, according to the draw schedule: Lien Quan met Hoa Phat and Mizuki met BWID, and the teams had fierce competition in the stadium.

Meeting Lien Quan was probably difficult for Hoa Phat. Hoa Phat maintained his composure despite facing a strong opponent and playing away. However, with strong strikers and fierce play, Lien Quan quickly led the score 2 -1, earning the golden ticket to the Final.

On the other field, at the same time, Mizuki had many stunning attacks that break the BWID team’s defense. The BWID team’s players appeared to be on the defensive in this round as they had no chance to let up a goal against a highly regarded foe. Mizuki defeated BWID 5–0 at the conclusion of the game to earn a spot in the Finals. BWID faced Hoa Phat in the third-place contest.

The tremendous mood surrounding the third-place match has never “cooled down”. After barely a few minutes of play, the BWID players unexpectedly scored a goal to go up 1-0. Hoa Phat defense was broken by BWID’s constant assault but immediately pulled even with a penalty. The BWID team, however, showed better skills with the “hot” kicks, good technique, and many players with endurance. Hoa Phat stopped in the fourth position at the conclusion of the game, while BWID ultimately finished in third place with a score of 2–1.

Hoa Phat player, Mr. Ngo Thanh Cong shared: “Hoa Phat’s players genuinely want to bring the Championship Cup to the Central region but we regret only finishing in fourth place. The entire team joined together in unity today, engaged in a spirit-based competition, and ultimately triumphed over themselves. I think the Champions Cup merits us all.”

Mr. Nguyen Quy Binh – BWID team said: “Today, we all are very happy. This is a valuable opportunity for us to unite, bond, exchange and reduce the stress of work. I hope there will be more sports programs like this, especially football so that all members of the Newtecons family have the opportunity to immerse themselves in the team and bond together.”

Some photos of Super Cup round:

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/mizuki-team-won-the-newtecons-championship-super-cup-2022/feed/ 0 PROJECT 05 BW HAI DUONG IS FINISHED AND READY TO BE HANDLED https://newtecons.vn/en/project-05-bw-hai-duong-is-finished-and-ready-to-be-handled/ https://newtecons.vn/en/project-05-bw-hai-duong-is-finished-and-ready-to-be-handled/#respond Fri, 26 Aug 2022 00:43:09 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=12058 Project 05 BW Hai Duong is a type of industrial factory for lease with Newtecons as the General Contractor and BW Industrial Development Joint Stock Company as the Investor. After nearly 8 months of construction, the project has been carefully and meticulously completed by the Site Management Team for handover. The 05 BW Hai Duong ... Read more

The post PROJECT 05 BW HAI DUONG IS FINISHED AND READY TO BE HANDLED appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Project 05 BW Hai Duong is a type of industrial factory for lease with Newtecons as the General Contractor and BW Industrial Development Joint Stock Company as the Investor. After nearly 8 months of construction, the project has been carefully and meticulously completed by the Site Management Team for handover.

The 05 BW Hai Duong project spans 63,000m2 and includes three 35,000m2 warehouses. The Site Management Team completed the concrete structure, steel structure, facade, infrastructure, and surrounding landscape after beginning construction in December 2021.

The super flat floor of this project needs to be built quickly and with a high-quality end result. This type of floor should have a lovely glossy surface, be flat, have lower tolerances than other floors, and be polished to a high standard. The super-flat floor with an appropriate surface, once in use, aids in ensuring the smooth operation of the rack system and the cargo handling equipment, increasing operational efficiency in the sector, low maintenance costs, hygiene, and safety, giving the Investor long-term benefits.

With a team of skilled engineers, The Site Management Team has been highly focused, devoted to ensuring the progress promised to the Investor while also forming a project with high quality, meticulous attention to details.

“The pandemic had a direct impact on the project at the start of construction,” according to Mr. Ho Hoang Quoc Viet, Project Director. “The entire Site Management Team was under a lot of pressure due to the manpower scarcity, high cost of raw materials, and “tight” timeline. All Site Management Team’s members have worked hard, even on holidays, to complete their assignments with a team of vivacious, skilled, and diligent engineers. Despite the limited time, I constantly endeavor to execute projects gradually to provide the highest quality result.”

Currently, the 05 BW Hai Duong project has been completed and is in the process of being handed over. Following the success of project No. 08 BW Thoi Hoa, this is the first project in the North between Newtecons and BW Industrial Development Joint Stock Company. This close and favorable cooperation serves as a foundation for the development of industrial projects in the North in the near future between the two leading companies.

Some photos of 05 BW Hai Duong project before the handover date:

 

 

 

The post PROJECT 05 BW HAI DUONG IS FINISHED AND READY TO BE HANDLED appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/project-05-bw-hai-duong-is-finished-and-ready-to-be-handled/feed/ 0 TOPPING OUT CEREMONY FOR FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 PROJECT BY NEWTECONS https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-for-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-project-by-newtecons/ https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-for-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-project-by-newtecons/#respond Wed, 24 Aug 2022 02:50:15 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11933 Topping-out Ceremony for Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project was solemnly held on August 23, 2022, by Newtecons in collaboration with Investor Nam Long, two Japanese partners Nishi Nippon Railroad and Hankyu Hanshin Properties in the construction site of urban area Mizuki Park, Binh Chanh district. The ceremony was attended by suppliers, subcontractors, and the supervision consultant ... Read more

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY FOR FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 PROJECT BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Topping-out Ceremony for Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project was solemnly held on August 23, 2022, by Newtecons in collaboration with Investor Nam Long, two Japanese partners Nishi Nippon Railroad and Hankyu Hanshin Properties in the construction site of urban area Mizuki Park, Binh Chanh district. The ceremony was attended by suppliers, subcontractors, and the supervision consultant Artelia.

Project Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 was initiated in June 2021. As a general contractor, Newtecons worked on the project and completed subsurface, structural, finishing, MEP, and landscape infrastructure. The Newtecons Construction Management Team has fulfilled the plan committed to the Investor after more than 14 months of intensive focus, overcoming challenges brought on by the pandemic and the pressure of a heavy workload, and successfully bringing the topping-out project.

“Newtecons is a reputable, dedicated General Contractor with strong capacity and knowledgeable in the construction sector,” remarked Mr. Van Viet Son, Chairman of Nam Long Construction Management and Investment Company Limited and Deputy CEO of Nam Long Land, at the event. “Newtecons has worked tirelessly to bring the project moves forward and has surmounted numerous obstacles. With the results obtained, I am certain that Newtecons will keep advancing and speeding up the process while rigorously adhering to quality control to complete the project on schedule and with the same level of excellence. meeting the trust and expectations of customers.”

The General Director of Newtecons, Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, stated: “Newtecons’ qualified Site Management Team and skilled engineering team have collaborated closely with the Technical Department and the Department of MEPF to work tirelessly, regardless of day or night, kept the project progress on track. This demonstrates that Newtecons gives special consideration to the quality of finishing and the MEPF system in addition to completing the project’s structural work as committed to the Investor. The Site Management Team will continue to put a lot of effort into the finishing work immediately following the topping-out ceremony with the objectives of safety, quality, and quickest progress. Residents will undoubtedly enjoy the exceptional qualities of the Mizuki Park urban area, which was designed with great precision and is inspired by Japan spirit, once the project is finished.”

“The Covid-19 outbreak, which has resulted in a scarcity of personnel, supplies, and equipment, has generated numerous challenges for the project since it began development,” said Mr. Nguyen Phan Anh Tuan, Construction Site Manager, in an impassioned tone. “Site Management Team carefully planned its human resources, materials, and equipment, and promptly devised and implemented the necessary building plans. Site Management Team collectively overcame challenges by working day and night to do a significant amount of work and make quick progress. The formation of a project that fully satisfies the standards for quality, safety, and progress has made the entire Site Management Team very happy today.”

It is expected that, after the topping-out ceremony, General Contractor Newtecons will continue to complete infrastructure, podium, apartments, and hand over in the first quarter of 2023.

The Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project located on Nguyen Van Linh Avenue, Binh Hung Commune, Binh Chanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, and in Mizuki Park urban area with the total area of 26 ha. The project’s blocks are deftly placed in zigzag lines to maximize the flats’ open space, bringing the “aquatic” natural landscape and a comfortable climate into each tranquil living space. The development is expected to bring a perfect setting for its residents.

Some more pictures from the event:

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY FOR FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 PROJECT BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-for-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-project-by-newtecons/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS TALENT – THE CONSENSUS TO OVERCOME ALL CHALLENGES IN TEAM BUILDING IN HANOI https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-talent-the-consensus-to-overcome-all-challenges-in-team-building-in-hanoi/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-talent-the-consensus-to-overcome-all-challenges-in-team-building-in-hanoi/#respond Sat, 20 Aug 2022 15:00:18 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11963 Nearly 80 members of the NewStar Leaders Club from the North and Central regions gathered on August 19, 2022, in Hanoi to take part in the team-building activity that Newtecons had planned. Following the program’s success in Ho Chi Minh City, it continued to be held for talented members (team leaders, potential specialists) in the ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS TALENT – THE CONSENSUS TO OVERCOME ALL CHALLENGES IN TEAM BUILDING IN HANOI appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Nearly 80 members of the NewStar Leaders Club from the North and Central regions gathered on August 19, 2022, in Hanoi to take part in the team-building activity that Newtecons had planned.

Following the program’s success in Ho Chi Minh City, it continued to be held for talented members (team leaders, potential specialists) in the North and Central areas in Hanoi. More specifically NewStar club members (Deputy Construction Site Managers or Deputy Head Of Department and above) and higher levels from both regions participated in the program and exchanged knowledge.

The General Director, Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, shared: “The series of team-building activities in both the South and the North have the same message: “be all you can be.” I want all Newtecons’ people from the North, Central, and South to overcome their geographical differences, share the same goal, and put equal effort into building a powerful Newtecons. At the same time, we will be the “warriors” who are passionate about our work, excited about the games, keep a cold head and a hot heart that is filled with love and duty for the organization.

The participants were split up into 5 teams, each representing one of Newtecons’ 5 core values: Integrity, Unity, Kindness, Optimization, and Creativity. The team names serve as the “key” to completing the program’s tasks and also serve to exemplify the values and spirit of Newtecons: Integrity in all of one’s thoughts and deeds; unity among team members for a common goal; kindness toward one’s coworkers, employer, customers, and business partners; kindness toward one’s family and society; kindness toward oneself; constant proactive improvement; solutions to operate the work effectively; constant creation, updating, and innovation.

The teams had an impressive “opening” dance to warm up the team building.

All participants enjoy the laughter and moments of relaxation that movement games in team building provide. Participants can use this chance to show their skills, sense of humor, and ability to take on difficulties. Above all, the teamwork attitude is encouraged, and obstacles must be faced as a unit.

With one goal, one direction, and one consensus to move forward, the series of team-building exercises in the two regions of the South and the North have successfully come to a conclusion. This has eliminated geographic-related barriers and distances. Along with the delight and memories, the message “Be all you can be” – to work hard, play hard, and be ready to adapt to any changes – remains ingrained in each member’s consciousness.

NewStar Leaders Club will continue to carry out the mission of discovering and developing high-quality human resources, and continuously promote many bonding, training and exchange activities in the coming time.

Some photos of the team building activities:

The post NEWTECONS TALENT – THE CONSENSUS TO OVERCOME ALL CHALLENGES IN TEAM BUILDING IN HANOI appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-talent-the-consensus-to-overcome-all-challenges-in-team-building-in-hanoi/feed/ 0 PROJECT FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 REACHES 1 MILLION SAFE HOURS https://newtecons.vn/en/project-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-reaches-1-million-safe-hours/ https://newtecons.vn/en/project-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-reaches-1-million-safe-hours/#respond Fri, 19 Aug 2022 10:00:48 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11928 Site Management Team of Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project received the certificate of 1 million safe hours in the morning of August 19, 2022, from a representative of Nam Long Investor. This action is significant because it highlights the efforts General Contractor Newtecons has made to ensure employee safety and foster a positive work environment.

The post PROJECT FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 REACHES 1 MILLION SAFE HOURS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Nam Long Investor, the PMU Project Management Board, Construction Management & Supervision Consultant Artelia, the entire Site Management Team, and almost 1,000 directly employed construction employees attended the ceremony of Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project’s 1 million safe hour milestone.

Speaking at the ceremony, Mr. Tran Dang Minh Hieu, a representative of PMU Project Management Board, and Mr. Tran Vuong Nam Thanh, a representative of Construction Management & Supervision Consultant Artelia, both praised the past efforts of the Newtecons Site Management Team. To successfully complete the project, Mr. Hieu and Mr. Thanh encouraged the Board of Directors, the worker teams, and themselves to keep a positive attitude and constantly take the initiative to ensure safety.

Mr. Nguyen Phan Anh Tuan, Construction Site Manager of Newtecons General Contractor, thanked Nam Long Investor, PMU Project Management Board, Supervision Consultant Artelia, and all workers for working closely with the Site Management Team to adhere to the established rules, regulations, and safety precautions.

“During nearly a year of project implementation, through difficult Covid epidemics, we tried to complete the project on schedule with the motto Safety is a prerequisite. And today, the project is recognized for the achievement of 1 million safe hours, this is not the achievement of an individual but the efforts of all teams. And we will be united, committed to protecting the goal of no accidents until the project is handed over.” Nguyen Phan Anh Tuan shared.

 

The Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 Site Management Team awarded and honored individuals and groups with positive contributions to safety work at the project.

Since the beginning, the Site Management Team has worked together with the HSSE Department to tightly regulate safety-related operations, adhere to protocols, assess potential risks, and take preventive plans for emergency preparedness and management. An effective firefighting and rescue drill was previously organized by the project in collaboration with the Binh Chanh District Police and the Fire Prevention & Rescue Police Team (Firefighting & Rescue).

At Newtecons, safety training and retraining for engineers and workers is always focused on investment and serious implementation. On the construction site, Newtecons also keeps improving its risk management, identification, and assessment procedures.

After the milestone of 1 million safe hours, the construction work will continue to be strictly managed to successfully hand over the project to the Investor in the first quarter of 2023.
