]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/project-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-reaches-1-million-safe-hours/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS TALENT “ROCKED” THE TEAM BUILDING https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-talent-rocked-the-team-building/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-talent-rocked-the-team-building/#respond Tue, 16 Aug 2022 00:30:54 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11982 Nearly 120 members of the South’s Talent team attended a team-building activity that Newtecons organized on August 13, 2022, in the Van Thanh Tourist Village. This program is held the first time for the NewStar Leaders Club members. NewStar Leaders Club consists of 2 groups: the Star group for Deputy Heads of departments, Deputy Construction ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS TALENT “ROCKED” THE TEAM BUILDING appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Nearly 120 members of the South’s Talent team attended a team-building activity that Newtecons organized on August 13, 2022, in the Van Thanh Tourist Village. This program is held the first time for the NewStar Leaders Club members.

NewStar Leaders Club consists of 2 groups: the Star group for Deputy Heads of departments, Deputy Construction site managers, and higher levels, and the Talent group for Heads of departments and Potential Specialists. This is the first time the team building program has been expanded and organized for the Talent group with the aim of creating favorable conditions for all NewStar members to have the opportunity to exchange knowledge, learn new things and connect with each other.

The “Be all you can be” team building encourages Newtecons employees to work hard, play hard, and be ready to adapt to any changes to building resilience and substantial internal resources for the organization’s next move.

“NewStar Club consistently prioritizes seeking for members with great knowledge and full leadership skills to join,” said Mr. Vo Thanh Liem, the General Director, during the program. I hope NewStar club, especially the Talent group, continued growth and success in the years to come. At the same time, through these team building programs, Newtecons’ people have moments of fun, relaxation and more cohesion, consensus and enthusiasm at work.”

The participants were split up into 5 teams, each representing one of Newtecons’ 5 core values: Integrity, Unity, Kindness, Optimization, and Creativity. Through many physical games, the members are like enthusiastic “warriors”, burning with all their hearts, with the whole alliance team, using collective strength to overcome challenges.

The smile, the win, and the motivating prizes are the joy of all the teams. Additionally, it is the spirit of solidarity, forming a cohesive team, and working together to cross the finish line.

In coming time, the team building program for the Northern and Central Talents will continue to be held in Hanoi.

Some photos in team building activity:

Câu lạc bộ NewStar sẽ tiếp tục hoạt động với sứ mệnh: Giao lưu, gắn kết, đồng lòng vì mục tiêu chung; chia sẻ, đào tạo, phát triển chuyên môn và kỹ năng; ươm mầm tài năng, xây dựng, bồi dưỡng đội ngũ cán bộ nguồn.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-talent-rocked-the-team-building/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS WAS HONORED AS “BEST COMPANY TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2022” https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-was-honored-as-best-company-to-work-for-in-asia-in-2022/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-was-honored-as-best-company-to-work-for-in-asia-in-2022/#respond Fri, 12 Aug 2022 10:00:42 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11946 On August 11, 2022, Newtecons was honored by HR Asia Magazine as one of the Best Companies to Work for in Asia in 2022. Newtecons is thrilled to win this award for the third year in a row. HR Asia – Best Companies to Work for in Asia is an awards program held annually to ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS WAS HONORED AS “BEST COMPANY TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2022” appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On August 11, 2022, Newtecons was honored by HR Asia Magazine as one of the Best Companies to Work for in Asia in 2022. Newtecons is thrilled to win this award for the third year in a row.

HR Asia – Best Companies to Work for in Asia is an awards program held annually to recognize and honor businesses with outstanding working environments in Asia. With more than 400,000 annual surveys to measure employee engagement with the workplace, the award is available in 15 markets across the region.

The list of winners this year was carefully considered and chosen using the TEAM (Total Engagement Assessment Model) based on a set of criteria including: Core, Self, and Group applied to significant Vietnamese human resource in Asia labor market.

Newtecons is honored to receive the Best Companies to Work for in Asia Award in 2022

This is Newtecons’ third consecutive year winning in this category; the first two were in 2020 and 2021.

In its 19 years of existence, Newtecons has worked to solidify its position as the top General contractor in Vietnam by leveraging goodwill and prestige to draw in highly skilled workers who will provide the best advantages to clients, and partners and contribute to social development. Five core values which Newtecons builds its company culture: Integrity, Solidarity, Kindness, Optimization, and Creativity. In addition, Newtecons cultivates a work atmosphere that adheres to the following values: Openness, Justice, Cooperation, Sincerity, Youth, Enthusiasm, and Professionalism.

Mr. Luke M.Peereboom – Senior Advisor of Newtecons said: “The recognition is a testament to Newtecons’ efforts to connect with its employees and provide them with attractive compensation and a positive working environment. The recognition is also Newtecons’ commitment to advancing welfare practices and turning the company into a real second home where staff members always feel safe, and we can grow together.”

The post NEWTECONS WAS HONORED AS “BEST COMPANY TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2022” appeared first on Newtecons.

The post NEWTECONS APPOINTS NEW OPERATIONS DIRECTOR appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan has been legally appointed to the position of Operations Director with effect from July 31, 2022. He is an excellent worker who has given Newtecons a significant number of positive contributions over the years. Newtecons people believe that Mr. Nhan and his fellow Board of Management members will lead the team, enhance the apparatus needed to carry out the established strategy, and advance Newtecons.

Before joining Newtecons as Director of Economic Division in November 2020, Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan held important positions in several the top significant construction firms in Vietnam. Through confidence, a reasonable system for organizing work, a comprehension of the departmental structure, and the capacity to negotiate and make judgments at appropriate times, Mr. Nhan has gained the trust from Board of Directors and coworkers.

In the prepared session, Mr. Nhan appeared before the Evaluation Council to defend his position, and the Board of Management and all levels of management gave him favorable comments. Newtecons’ Board of Management expects that Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan will promote his capacity in both expertise and experience.

Mr. Do Nguyen Thanh Nhan is wished success in his new position and looks forward to contributing to the development of Newtecons in accordance with the established plan for 2022 and subsequent years.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-appoints-new-operations-director/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS REVIEWS PRODUCTION AND BUSINESS OUTCOMES FOR THE FIRST HALF OF 2022, WITH THE GOAL OF CONSOLIDATING THE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE APPARATUS AND RAISING THE LEVEL OF PERSONNEL TO MEET THE OUTSTANDING GROWTH RATE https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-reviews-production-and-business-outcomes-for-the-first-half-of-2022-with-the-goal-of-consolidating-the-corporate-governance-apparatus-and-raising-the-level-of-personnel-to-meet-the-outstand/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-reviews-production-and-business-outcomes-for-the-first-half-of-2022-with-the-goal-of-consolidating-the-corporate-governance-apparatus-and-raising-the-level-of-personnel-to-meet-the-outstand/#respond Thu, 21 Jul 2022 12:50:06 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11476 Following a challenging year in 2021, Newtecons set a revenue and profit growth target for 2022. On the one hand, Newtecons continued to win contracts for significant and large-scale projects in 2022, while on the other, we completed backlog work successfully in 2021. In the first half of 2022, Newtecons’ revenue increased by 82 percent ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS REVIEWS PRODUCTION AND BUSINESS OUTCOMES FOR THE FIRST HALF OF 2022, WITH THE GOAL OF CONSOLIDATING THE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE APPARATUS AND RAISING THE LEVEL OF PERSONNEL TO MEET THE OUTSTANDING GROWTH RATE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Following a challenging year in 2021, Newtecons set a revenue and profit growth target for 2022. On the one hand, Newtecons continued to win contracts for significant and large-scale projects in 2022, while on the other, we completed backlog work successfully in 2021. In the first half of 2022, Newtecons’ revenue increased by 82 percent when compared to the same period in 2021. The Ceremony had a solemn and focused atmosphere. This is an opportunity for Newtecons to recognize all employees’ efforts over the last six months. It was a watershed moment for Newtecons people decision to act unanimously and decisively in order to meet the established goal for the entire year of 2022.

Newtecons focuses on the development of human resources, both in terms of quantity and quality, in order to keep up with the revenue and number of ongoing projects that are rapidly increasing. The ratio of human resources increased by 35% over the same period in the first six months of the year, reaching 959. Newtecons is aggressively improving and training activities to develop and raise the team’s level.

All of Newtecons’ departments have also received promotions, improving both quantity and quality in order to handle both the current workload and set the foundation for future growth in both production and commercial operations in 2022 and the next years.

“Change is a threat if we are its passive object, but an opportunity if we actively create it.” – The Change Masters.

Newtecons is actively creating positive changes to meet the outstanding development, flexibly following market changes and social movement laws, focusing and drastic to achieve the plan in 2022 and striving to become a billion-dollar enterprise by 2025.

The post NEWTECONS REVIEWS PRODUCTION AND BUSINESS OUTCOMES FOR THE FIRST HALF OF 2022, WITH THE GOAL OF CONSOLIDATING THE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE APPARATUS AND RAISING THE LEVEL OF PERSONNEL TO MEET THE OUTSTANDING GROWTH RATE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-reviews-production-and-business-outcomes-for-the-first-half-of-2022-with-the-goal-of-consolidating-the-corporate-governance-apparatus-and-raising-the-level-of-personnel-to-meet-the-outstand/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS MODIFIES THE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE STRUCTURE https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-thay-doi-mo-hinh-quan-tri-cong-ty/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-thay-doi-mo-hinh-quan-tri-cong-ty/#respond Sat, 25 Jun 2022 03:00:46 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11107 Newtecons sets a revenue goal of more than 10,000 billion VND for 2022. The post NEWTECONS MODIFIES THE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE STRUCTURE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons sets a revenue goal of more than 10,000 billion VND for 2022. The Board of Directors of Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company has decided to modify the corporate governance structure in accordance with international best practices to meet the expanding development roadmap and ensure that revenue for the upcoming year is higher than it was for the previous year. As a result, Mr. Vo Thanh Liem was appointed to General Director position beginning at the end of June 2022, while Mr. Tran Kim Long remained the Chairman of the Board position.

Mr. Vo Thanh Liem was born in 1977, graduated from Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology. He has more than 22 years of experience and has held numerous important roles in significant Vietnamese construction companies, most recently serving as former Acting General Director of Coteccons and Operations Director of Ricons.

Mr. Vo Thanh Liem has a personable, vivacious, and fierce personality in addition to the ability to connect with significant domestic and foreign investors. He is trusted to be given the duty of leading the human resources team, assisting Newtecons to maintain its position as the top general construction contractor in Vietnam.

Since rebranding formally in 2019, Newtecons has undergone substantial transformations and seen rapid growth under the direction of Mr. Tran Kim Long, Chairman of the Board and General Director. After such accomplishments, Mr. Vo Thanh Liem is anticipated to join the Board of Directors and the Board of Management to uphold the preceding standards of  Unity – Integrity – Kindness, and continually enhance and optimize the procedure, putting creativity into practice while continually innovating to help the business grow.

A major step has been taken with the appointing of senior staff, setting the stage for Newtecons to soar to a new higher level. The board of directors of Newtecons believes that Mr. Vo Thanh Liem will continue to be successful for the business while also helping to bring a new face to the Vietnam construction market.

The post NEWTECONS MODIFIES THE CORPORATE GOVERNANCE STRUCTURE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-thay-doi-mo-hinh-quan-tri-cong-ty/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS HELD GROUND-BREAKING CEREMONY OF T&T CITY MILLENNIA PROJECT – GREEN RESIDENCE IN THE SOUTH OF SAI GON https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-khoi-cong-du-an-tt-city-millennia-quan-cu-xanh-phia-nam-sai-gon/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-khoi-cong-du-an-tt-city-millennia-quan-cu-xanh-phia-nam-sai-gon/#respond Fri, 24 Jun 2022 00:00:39 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11207 [Long An, 23 June 2022] The T&T City Millennia project’s ground-breaking ceremony was held by Newtecons, T&T Group and the project’s investor Thai Son – Long An Joint Stock Company. Representatives of T&T Group, Investor, Khai Hoan Land project developer, Coninco supervisor consultant, Newtecons Construction General contractor, subcontractors and suppliers were represented during the event. ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS HELD GROUND-BREAKING CEREMONY OF T&T CITY MILLENNIA PROJECT – GREEN RESIDENCE IN THE SOUTH OF SAI GON appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Long An, 23 June 2022] The T&T City Millennia project’s ground-breaking ceremony was held by Newtecons, T&T Group and the project’s investor Thai Son – Long An Joint Stock Company. Representatives of T&T Group, Investor, Khai Hoan Land project developer, Coninco supervisor consultant, Newtecons Construction General contractor, subcontractors and suppliers were represented during the event.

T&T City Millennium is the largest project in the South Saigon region, spanning up to 267 hectares. It was invested in and developed with the intention of becoming a modern complex metropolitan area with a variety of products such as high-rise flats, luxury villas, townhouses, and shophouses, as well as a network of accompanying utilities such as hospitals, schools at all levels, entertainment hubs, and the ideal living environment for residents.

“T&T City Millennia is one of the rare projects that satisfy both the criteria of “position” and “direction” by being situated on the extended Long Hau Road, surrounded by big rivers, and featuring ecological scenery with a huge carpet of green. These elements help to create a resort-style living environment at home while keeping preserving the lively and hectic pace of city life. So, in my opinion, this project will be a standout, being a remarkable topic in real estate market and reaffirming a strong position for the Investor, T&T Group, and the General Contractor Newtecons.” said Mr. Do Hoang Viet, a representative of the Investor, the deputy general director in charge of construction.

Mr. Le Duc Buu, Operations director and a representative of Newtecons General Contractor, said: “With a strong foundation of collaboration in many prior projects between Newtecons and T&T Group and 20 years of experience in conducting large-scale projects in Long An and throughout the country, Newtecons committed working closely with the Investor, the supervision consultant, and the subcontractor to finish the project on time with high standards of quality and safe conditions.”

T&T City Millennia project is located in Long Hau commune, Can Giuoc district, Long An province, adjacent to Rach Doi river, Soai Rap river and Nha Be river. Recently, the plans to build provincial road 826E have also been agreed by the leaders of Long An province and Ho Chi Minh city. This is the route connecting National Highway 50 with the Southwest axis to Long Hau Industrial Park; Tan Tap – Long Hau Road to Long An International Port and Hiep Phuoc Industrial Park – Ho Chi Minh city, creating a convenient traffic network in which T&T City Millennia is located in a central location.

After the Ground-breaking Ceremony, the Site Management Team will begin construction of the piles, closely following the progress of phase 1 to hand over 1,700 villas to the Investor at the beginning of the third quarter of 2024.

There are some photos from the Ground-breaking Ceremony:

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-khoi-cong-du-an-tt-city-millennia-quan-cu-xanh-phia-nam-sai-gon/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS SIGNED COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH THE UNIVERSITY OF ARCHITECTURAL HO CHI MINH CITY https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-signed-cooperation-agreement-with-the-university-of-architectural-ho-chi-minh-city/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-signed-cooperation-agreement-with-the-university-of-architectural-ho-chi-minh-city/#respond Sat, 18 Jun 2022 01:40:55 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11161 To preserve the positive relationship, Newtecons and the University of Architecture Ho Chi Minh City signed a cooperation agreement on June 17, 2022. The post NEWTECONS SIGNED COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH THE UNIVERSITY OF ARCHITECTURAL HO CHI MINH CITY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> To preserve the positive relationship, Newtecons and the University of Architecture Ho Chi Minh City signed a cooperation agreement on June 17, 2022. Representatives of the Board of Directors and departments, and the representatives of the University Faculties were present at the signing ceremony.

“Our university always focuses on scientific research, technology transfer, and business collaboration activities to bring students chances for complete of knowledge, skills, and attitudes,” said Assoc. Prof. Dr. Architect Le Van Thuong, the university’s rector. “And we hope that our students will have the chance to get experience and work in a prestigious construction company like Newtecons.”

Mr. Le Duc Buu, Operations Director of Newtecons, highlighted the strong relatives between academics and business, education and practice. “I believe that today’s ceremony will signal a new and more solid development step between the University of Architecture Ho Chi Minh City and Newtecons because of the close and ongoing partnership over the previous years. We’ll keep making it possible for your students to gain experience and expand their practical knowledge in a top professional environment of construction in Vietnam.”

After the signing ceremony, the following activities will be promoted by Newtecons in partnership with the university: arranging internships, providing students majoring in civil engineering and infrastructure engineering with training in occupational safety and soft skills; accompanying students as they engage in original research endeavors, academic competitions, and specialized training; planning site visits and training sessions, and career orientation. By doing this, students will have access to new technology and construction techniques then covert them to practical knowledge that they can use right after graduation.

The signing ceremony was successful, which helped to confirm the long-term partnership between Newtecons and the University in their shared duty for the field of education and the next generation of brilliant engineers.

The post NEWTECONS SIGNED COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH THE UNIVERSITY OF ARCHITECTURAL HO CHI MINH CITY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-signed-cooperation-agreement-with-the-university-of-architectural-ho-chi-minh-city/feed/ 0 FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 & FLORA PANORAMA SITE MANAGEMENT TEAMS COLLABORATED TO ORGANIZE A FIRE DRILL AND RESCUE REHEARSAL https://newtecons.vn/en/flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-flora-panorama-site-management-teams-collaborated-to-organize-a-fire-drill-and-rescue-rehearsal/ https://newtecons.vn/en/flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-flora-panorama-site-management-teams-collaborated-to-organize-a-fire-drill-and-rescue-rehearsal/#respond Wed, 15 Jun 2022 03:00:08 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11099 A fire drill and rescue rehearsal were recently held at Tower 3 of the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project with the consent of Nam Long Investor, Supervision Consultant, Newtecons Management Board, Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 Project and Flora Panorama Project Site Management Teams, in collaboration with Fire and Rescue Police department and Binh Chanh District Public Security. ... Read more

The post FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 & FLORA PANORAMA SITE MANAGEMENT TEAMS COLLABORATED TO ORGANIZE A FIRE DRILL AND RESCUE REHEARSAL appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> A fire drill and rescue rehearsal were recently held at Tower 3 of the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project with the consent of Nam Long Investor, Supervision Consultant, Newtecons Management Board, Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 Project and Flora Panorama Project Site Management Teams, in collaboration with Fire and Rescue Police department and Binh Chanh District Public Security.

Fire drill and rescue is one of the extremely important tasks in the finishing construction process. Therefore, Site Management Team must always check, strictly control and be ready to respond to emergency situations, especially when a fire or explosion situation occurs.

❖ Purpose of the rehearsal:

– Improve professional qualifications, coordination of the Site Management Team with the Fire and Rescue Police department in combat work, understanding the characteristics of the situation at the project, identifying firefighting water supply points, informing know the way back and forth inside and outs

ide the project, proactively organizing timely and effective handling when fire incidents occur.

– Raise employee awareness of the importance of fire prevention and fighting, as well as how to use firefighting equipment and methods on the spot to quickly extinguish a fire. The activity, on the other hand, demonstrates Newtecons Site Management Team’ sense of duty and deep concern for fire prevention and fighting, which has led to efforts to better coordinate fire prevention and fighting with local authorities and police.

Fire drills are done on a regular basis at toolbox sessions at the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 and Flora Panorama projects. This rehearsal is on a much larger scale than past internal rehearsals, with more than 50 participants from the Fire drill and Rescue Team, Binh Chanh District Public Security, Binh Chanh Electricity, Binh Hung Ward Public Security and Newtecons Site Management Team representatives; vehicles included 1 command vehicle, 2 fire engines, and 1 ladder truck. This is also the first time the Site Management Team of the Mizuki Park project cluster’s projects have cooperated, exhibiting internal solidarity and togetherness.

The project has 1 main gate and 3 auxiliary gates from 8-10m wide located on the internal road, the height is clear and smooth; there are doors facing the internal road in the ground floor area of the building so that fire engines can circulate, ensuring convenience for firefighting, moving property, guiding escape, and saving people.

❖ Rehearsal Process:

– Phase 1: The Site Management Team consists of 25 people divided into five groups: The communication team (alarm, evacuate, disconnect MCB, fire alarm, etc.), the rescue team (directing the escape route, providing first aid, and transporting the injured to the nearest hospital); the asset relocation team (relocating flammable items and valuables); the firefighting team (fighting the fire and isolating it with portable fire extinguishers, directing the fire and rescue police and other forces to approach the fire area); and the security team (Blocking the entrance, protecting property safety, protecting the scene).

– Phase 2: The Fire and Rescue Police of Binh Chanh District Public Security, consisting of 20 people, organizes reconnaissance to determine if any victims are still trapped in the fire, to determine the extent of the fire and the possibility of it spreading, and to identify the main attack points, as well as to organize the rescue of victims from the fire.

“As the coordination and adherence to the plan, the program was a success; explicitly assign duties and roles to all parties involved. Following the rehearsal, the Newtecons Site Management Team pledged to continue to promote and ensure fire safety throughout and after construction so that the apartment can be handed over to residents in the best possible condition.” – said Mr. Pham Minh Vien, Occupational Safety Manager and Head of the Fire prevention and fighting team of Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project.

Newtecons was received certificates from the Ministry of Labor – Invalids, and Social Affairs as well as the Department of Work Safety for outstanding achievements in workplace safety and health in 2021.

Let’s take a look at the rehearsal photos:

One of the major ... Read more

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF THE MASTERI WATERFRONT PROJECT BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> In an intimate setting on June 14, 2022, the Site Management Team of the Masteri Waterfront project held a topping-out ceremony for the CT3 tower cluster to honor everyone who worked hard to overcome challenges and complete extremely heavy workloads in accordance with the Investor and Site Management Team’s progress commitments.

One of the major initiatives of Newtecons, the general contractor of design and construction for Masterise Homes, is the Masteri Waterfront. The structural, finishing, landscape infrastructure, MEP, aluminum and glass construction, and elevator system for the two subdivisions, CT03 (Miami) and CT06 (Hawaii), each with a maximum size of 19,000sqm, are all under the control of the Newtecons Site Management Team on this project.

CT03 subdivision has 3 towers: The T30 tower (30 floors), the L26 and L26M towers (26 floors). The General Contractor must have courage and strength to finish this massive project on schedule and to the specified level of quality.

Due to the project’s location in an upscale urban region, there is a restricted amount of time for building (construction work must be done before 8 pm). Despite confronting many challenges brought on by the epidemic during more than 18 months of building, the stage must be extremely quick and precise to assure progress. The building site is always “hot” and bustling, mobilizing thousands of people, and continuously completing tasks due to tight criteria on labor safety, progress, and exceptional quality. In the joy of construction team, the project was recently recognized to mark the ceremony of exceeding 3 million safe hours.

At the event, Mr. Tong Duc Hanh, Project Director of Masterise Homes, praised the Site Management Team for managing and directing the project to accomplish progress, quality, ensuring safety, topping out successfully.

After topping out, the project moved into the finishing phase with a higher finishing level than Vietnam Standards to introduce a unique and elegant “living paradise” and bring the best experience to its residents.

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF THE MASTERI WATERFRONT PROJECT BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-the-masteri-waterfront-project-by-newtecons/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS PROMOTE TRAINING ACTIVITIES, ENHANCE HUMAN RESOURCES QUALITY https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-promote-training-activities-enhance-human-resources-quality/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-promote-training-activities-enhance-human-resources-quality/#respond Mon, 06 Jun 2022 12:00:49 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11120 Newtecons has consistently won bids and begun many projects in the first five months of the year, including Flora Panorama; Sora Garden SC; Hoa Phat Dung Quat 2; Service, Trade and Housing Center Project, Hamlet 4, Ward 1, Sa Dec City, and others, all of which are contributing to the company’s goal of revenue and ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS PROMOTE TRAINING ACTIVITIES, ENHANCE HUMAN RESOURCES QUALITY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons has consistently won bids and begun many projects in the first five months of the year, including Flora Panorama; Sora Garden SC; Hoa Phat Dung Quat 2; Service, Trade and Housing Center Project, Hamlet 4, Ward 1, Sa Dec City, and others, all of which are contributing to the company’s goal of revenue and profit growth beginning in 2022. Newtecons believes that the most essential goal is to consolidate the complete machine and raise the staff’s knowledge, bringing projects to a successful conclusion with the assurance of a powerful and elite team. As a result, Newtecons is constantly investing in training and upgrading the quality of its human resources.

Internal training activities at construction sites are remarkable in Newtecons’ training operations from the beginning of the year till now. The Site Management Team has arranged these activities. Weekly training sessions are held, with tasks, substance, and themes separated according to the construction progress. The Site Management Team gathered the training content from a variety of sources, including the Technical Department, Human Resources & Training Department, HSSE Department, Equipment Department, and others, as well as on-the-job construction methods and techniques, and the previous project implementation experience.

The Site Management Team of the Phuoc Tho project was recently granted the “Excellent Site in Training” by the Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department, as one of the typical construction sites in training activities.

“With the growing expansion of Newtecons, in order to meet the workload, the Company in general, and the Phuoc Tho project in particular, the number of new recruits and young staff are quite large,” Mr. Pham Huu Nghia, Construction Site Manager, said of the project’s training program. “As a result, I believe that training is no longer solely the responsibility of the company, but also the responsibility of Site Management Team, who must work together to develop the Newtecons’ people in order to train the next generation and ensure the integrity of the workforce.” He also expressed his sincere thanks to the Board of Directors and Human Resources & Training Department for their constant attention to the Site Management Team. This honor motivates Site Management Team of Phuoc Tho project to work harder and promote the training spirit to all Site Management Teams from other construction sites.

The Site Management Team of the Hoa Phat Dung Quat project, which has been prominent with training work in the Central area in recent years, is also highly regarded by Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department. “The internal training program in Hoa Phat is held at 7pm every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday,” said Mr. Vo Dinh Thuan, Vice Construction Site Manager as one of the people directly involved in the training. “We had 4 topics are Presenting the operation plan from the management level; Detailed work analysis from specialized teams; Process training (ordering, field management, bills, and records, etc.); Professional training (supervising steel, formwork, concrete, underground construction, etc.) The training program enabled the new supervisors gain information before starting work at the construction sites, and the Site Management Team machinery runs more smoothly and efficiently as a result of the agreed-upon plans.”

In addition, the Technical Department, the Communications Department, the Legal & Policy Department and other functional departments also regularly train at each construction site to help the members of the Site Management Team understand the necessary knowledge for their work.

  • In construction, technique is the key to transforming a design on paper into a finished product, and it is related with the project from start to finish. As a result, the Technical Department organized direct training sessions at each project to guide the Site Management Team measures for each specific stage prior to construction; at the same time, the Technical Department clearly identified common errors and offered appropriate plans, assisting in the reduction of potential risks.

  • To improve individuals’ roles in internal communication and communication activities, the Communications Department visited each site to help them understand the vision, mission, core values, culture, as well as the importance of communication and communication tools commonly used. Following the training, the Site Management Team confidently applied their knowledge to work and communication; created its own communication program for the Site; and served as a bridge to help new members understand, love, and stay with Newtecons.

  • Many events will occur during project implementation that will impact project progress, causing the Site Management Team to extend the construction schedule. This extension will assist the project Site Management Team in preventing and mitigating risks such as penalties for contract progress delays, compensation for damages resulting from these delays, and so on. With the aim of helping Site Management Team strengthen to gain legal knowledge on project progress extension, guide the procedure for filing a progress complaint, and share practical views and experiences on this issue.

In addition to professional training sessions, Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department also organizes many other skills and integration training classes such as:

  • Leadership Skills training

Chương trình đào tạo mở ra bức tranh toàn diện về một nhà quản lý bền vững, nêu rõ vai trò và nhiệm vụ của người quản lý cũng những năng lực phải có để trở thành một quản lý thực thụ. Thông qua chương trình, CBQL Newtecons hiểu rõ và vận dụng được những kỹ năng: 

  • Understand the 5 levels of leadership and evaluate your own leadership ability.
  • How to communicate and connect with colleagues and subordinates.
  • How to influence and inspire others.
  • Use excellent assign and delegating strategies to encourage employees to be proactive in their work.

  • Professional communication skills training

This is a training for all Newtecons Office employees, led by Trainers Le Ha Mai Thao and Lam Nguyen Tuan Phuong, they have over 20 years of experience in business management and human resource management in large businesses in Vietnam.

Following the training session, employees apply what they’ve learned to achieve the course’s objectives in a step-by-step manner:

  • Understanding and apply communication strategies, thereby increasing workplace confidence and contributing to increased worker efficiency;
  • Ensuring that indirect communication is always standard, mastering indirect communication techniques, rules of composing letters, responding to messages, telephones, and strategies to combat common text presentation problems.
  • Becoming an active and professional person, master the art and etiquette of direct contact.

  • Integration training

With a growing number of young employees joining the staff, the Human Resources & Training Department organizes integration training sessions on a regular basis so that the new members can better understand the Company’s culture, system operating procedures, regulations and regimes, benefits, and so on, allowing you to quickly catch up and implement better work.

Recognizing human development as a prerequisite for building a sustainable team, Newtecons is constantly innovating training methods and providing the most up-to-date information and knowledge to each employee. Newtecons will continue to maintain and organize more training courses in the future.

The post NEWTECONS PROMOTE TRAINING ACTIVITIES, ENHANCE HUMAN RESOURCES QUALITY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-promote-training-activities-enhance-human-resources-quality/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS SIGNED A COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-signed-a-cooperation-agreement-with-ho-chi-minh-city-university-of-technology/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-signed-a-cooperation-agreement-with-ho-chi-minh-city-university-of-technology/#respond Thu, 26 May 2022 05:00:27 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=11117 The signing ceremony of the cooperation agreement between Newtecons and Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology was placed on May 25, 2022 in hall B4, Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology, in the presence of Newtecons representatives, the university representatives, and more than 200 students. “The Division of Civil Engineering has a long ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS SIGNED A COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The signing ceremony of the cooperation agreement between Newtecons and Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology was placed on May 25, 2022 in hall B4, Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology, in the presence of Newtecons representatives, the university representatives, and more than 200 students.

“The Division of Civil Engineering has a long collaboration relationship with Newtecons”, stated Assoc. Prof. Dr. Nguyen Danh Thao, Vice Director of Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology, at the signing event. “Every year, Newtecons has aided the school in the organization of numerous academic competitions, sport events, and the awarding of scholarships to our students. With the signing of a cooperation agreement with Newtecons today, we are very excited to deepen our collaboration with Newtecons. It will establish conditions for the two sides to connect, share, and receive students for internships, scientific research, and technology development.”

Mr. Nguyen Quang Thuy, Operations Director of Newtecons, stated that as an alumnus of the Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology, he is always interested in the university’s progress and is very proud of its achievements. “The majority of Newtecons’ staff are currently University of Technology alumni” he said. “Newtecons wishes to contribute to the construction industry’s human resources with knowledge and practical experience, to inspire young people to love the profession, and to nurture bright talents for the future, while keeping in mind that training high-quality human resources for society is not only the responsibility of schools, but also the cooperation of businesses.”

Following the signing ceremony, Newtecons plans to continue working with Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology on the following activities: Providing students with internship experiences in a real-world setting; The student union, in collaboration with the Youth Union, arranges staff training courses and thematic gratitude activities; Establishing a research and creation fund to support students in scientific research and competitions for new technology research and development; Research and technology transfer collaboration; Orientation and recruitment for jobs; Other content relating to human resource support, training, and development.

On the same day, Newtecons held a seminar with students from Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology titled “We are ready – and you?”. Mr. Tran Ngoc Duc, Head of Technical Department, and Mr. Le Quang Vui, Training Specialist, gave presentations on “High-rise Project Structure” and “Human Resources Policy” respectively, to provide students with practical and useful knowledge and information when deciding on a career and working environment after graduation.

In addition, the students played mini-games to test their professional knowledge and received detailed and enthusiastic responses from Newtecons’ managers.

The signing ceremony and seminar program were a success, ushering in a new chapter in the relationship between Newtecons and Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology.

The post NEWTECONS SIGNED A COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-signed-a-cooperation-agreement-with-ho-chi-minh-city-university-of-technology/feed/ 0 TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF LAKE TOWER OF THE GRAND MARINA, SAIGON PROJECT WAS HELD BY NEWTECONS https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-lake-tower-of-the-grand-marina-saigon-project-was-held-by-newtecons/ https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-lake-tower-of-the-grand-marina-saigon-project-was-held-by-newtecons/#respond Fri, 20 May 2022 07:36:15 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10889 [May 19, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] Topping out Ceremony of the Lake Tower of the Grand Marina project, Saigon was held by Newtecons and Masterise Homes Investor. Nearly 100 guests and 20 press agencies attended the event. Lake Tower is the commercial name for the Lux5 project that Newtecons previously announced. Lake Tower has ... Read more

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF LAKE TOWER OF THE GRAND MARINA, SAIGON PROJECT WAS HELD BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [May 19, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] Topping out Ceremony of the Lake Tower of the Grand Marina project, Saigon was held by Newtecons and Masterise Homes Investor. Nearly 100 guests and 20 press agencies attended the event. Lake Tower is the commercial name for the Lux5 project that Newtecons previously announced.

Lake Tower has 47 floors, which began construction in 2021 and is the first structure in the luxury residential complex Grand Marina, Saigon, has completed the rough phase and begun the interior and exterior finishing process. Residents are scheduled to receive JW Marriott-branded luxury flats in the first quarter of 2023.

Lake Tower is built on a perfect balance of large space, luxurious materials, and delicate details. Large windows let in plenty of natural light, revealing a tranquil and breathtaking natural landscape. Large marble bathroom, harmoniously designed bedroom, and a large living space with luxurious materials. Lake Tower is meticulously and delicately completed by Newtecons to Marriott’s strict standards, down to the smallest detail. High-quality interior furnishings are used to provide residents with complete comfort.

Speaking at the event, Mr. Mahdi Samhouri, Deputy Head of Project Development Division of Masterise Homes, praised the efforts of all project development partners, including Newtecons, Mace, Aurecon, HBA, and Italian Fit Out Company. “The Lake Tower has been gradually completed in accordance with the expected handover plan in early 2023, bringing an unprecedented super product in the residential product segment to the Vietnamese market.”

Mr. Luke M.Peereboom – Senior Advisor of Newtecons

Newtecons, in its role as General Contractor, has focused on human and material resources to complete the project on time while maintaining quality and safety standards, resulting in a successful topping-out. “Being with Masterise Homes since the early days of the project and being here to attend the topping out ceremony, I am personally very happy and proud,” stated Mr. Luke M.Peereboom, Senior Advisor of Newtecons. “The Topping-Out Ceremony is a significant milestone that recognizes the efforts of the entire team and is the product of effective collaboration among all stakeholders, including Masterise Homes, Mace, supervision consultants, subcontractors, and Newtecons. Following the topping-out ceremony, the project team of engineers will focus on finishing the building’s interior and exterior with the goal of safety, quality, and speed. We will continue to work hard and coordinate with the Investor and partners to ensure that the Lake Tower project’s flats are delivered on schedule to tenants.”

“Countless hurdles were surmounted with the coherence and coordination between Mace, Newtecons, and other contractors for the Topping out Ceremony today. We believe that with the Investor’s continuing cooperation, planning, and support, the next projects will be successes,” said Mr. John Campbell, General Director of Mace Vietnam.

Special components, such as a 1,200sqm of 12m high roof deck on the height of 170m and beams with over 1150cbm concrete and 300 tons of steel on the 20th floor, were completed in mid-May 2021.

After topping out, the project moved into its finishing stages, with completion expected in the first quarter of 2023. According to Mr. Nguyen Tan Tai – Construction Site Manager, Lake Tower is a project with tough and intricate finishing techniques which was required by Operator Marriott International and Investor Masterise Homes. Mr. Tai commits to finish the project with his team in the spirit of “Fire proves gold, adversity proves men,” where each onerous demand is a task that, once overcome leads to maturity, experience, and “expert” in the industry.

Lake Tower – Grand Marina project, Saigon is located at No. 2 Ton Duc Thang Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, invested by Masterise Homes, is first-class apartments of JW Marriott, supervised and controlled by Mace.

The post TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF LAKE TOWER OF THE GRAND MARINA, SAIGON PROJECT WAS HELD BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/topping-out-ceremony-of-lake-tower-of-the-grand-marina-saigon-project-was-held-by-newtecons/feed/ 0 NEWSTECONS ORGANIZED TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF VIETTEL HOA LAC TECHNICAL CENTER https://newtecons.vn/en/newstecons-organized-topping-out-ceremony-of-viettel-hoa-lac-technical-center/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newstecons-organized-topping-out-ceremony-of-viettel-hoa-lac-technical-center/#respond Thu, 19 May 2022 03:08:41 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10890 The topping out ceremony of Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center was held on May 18, 2022, at Hoa Lac Hi-Tech Industrial Park, Thach That, Hanoi, by Newtecons and Investor – Viettel Asset Management Company. Representatives from Supervision Consultant – Vietnam Institute for Building Science and Technology (IBST) – Technology’s Center for Design and Construction Consulting ... Read more

The post NEWSTECONS ORGANIZED TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF VIETTEL HOA LAC TECHNICAL CENTER appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The topping out ceremony of Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center was held on May 18, 2022, at Hoa Lac Hi-Tech Industrial Park, Thach That, Hanoi, by Newtecons and Investor – Viettel Asset Management Company. Representatives from Supervision Consultant – Vietnam Institute for Building Science and Technology (IBST) – Technology’s Center for Design and Construction Consulting and subcontractors attended the ceremony.

On November 29, 2021, Newtecons started working on Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center project as the General Contractor of Construction and M.E.P. Site management team from Newtecons has kept the plan on track as committed the Investor, effectively finish topping out ceremony on time, after six months of focusing only on construction and overcoming problems imposed by epidemics and bad weather.

Mr. Ha Quang Huy – Director of Viettel Asset Management Company, was surprised by the event that the Site management team of Newtecons held, it was well beyond the Investor’s expectations. He also complimented the supervision consultant, suppliers, subcontractors, and General Contractor Newtecons for their continued efforts over the years. “The Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center is a significant project with a unique nature and rapid development.” With the achieved results, I am confident that the Site management team of Newtecons will to complete the project on time and with high quality,” he stated emphatically.

Mr. Vu Van Chu – Deputy Director of Technology’s Center for Design and Construction Consulting – Vietnam Institute for Building Science and Technology (IBST) – represented the Supervision Consultant and congratulated the Site management team on the successful completion of the topping out event in accordance with the stated objective. “Today, attaining the outcomes is the success of all parties’ efforts after more than 170 days of continuous building with many obstacles, notably during the severe Covid-19 time.” IBST is dedicated to collaborating closely with the Site management team of Newtecons to ensure that the allocated activities are completed effectively.”

“Newtecons is grateful to Viettel Asset Management Company for entrusting and appointing us as General Contractor, and IBST consultant has assisted and accompanied us throughout the project.” Said Mr. Hoang Phuong Lam, Operations Director of Newtecons. “The Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center is a surface-level project with a challenging structure and architecture, and a tight construction timeframe. Understanding the requirements from the beginning, the Newtecons Site Management Team worked tirelessly on the project, dedicating their full attention to it. We are committed to allocating all required resources to achieving the Investor’s safety, quality, and progress goals.”

Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center has 7 floors with a total construction area of 21,467sqm. Despite the lack of a basement, the project has a complicated structure that required high techniques as the construction of the building with two basements structure. In which, each floor with a height of 6-9m is constructed to serve the installation of technical equipment systems such as oil tanks, huge water tanks, more than 70m in length and -7.5m in depth.

The building has the shape of a big, solid building block and is equally modern and new, with a square box architecture, a non-standard perforated aluminum facade system, and an impressive steel structure system. It is a typical work for the combination of technical and artistic features.

Viettel Hoa Lac Technical Center, which is expected to be completed in September 2022, will go through the most stringent completion and acceptance phases. The M.E.P system implemented by Newtecons is committed to meet data center construction standards, and plays an important role in operational safety, security, and self-convenience.

Some critical items, such as an air conditioner to maintain a consistent temperature for servers and equipment, a backupable connection system, security and surveillance systems, a power supply system that meets international standards, and so on, were prioritized by Newtecons, we closely monitored the construction process from start to finish. The project also uses a BIM model in construction to synchronize the stages.

We can expect one of Viettel’s two largest data storage centers to start operating in Vietnam later this year.

The post NEWSTECONS ORGANIZED TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF VIETTEL HOA LAC TECHNICAL CENTER appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newstecons-organized-topping-out-ceremony-of-viettel-hoa-lac-technical-center/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE TRAINING PROGRAM “LEADERSHIP SKILLS 5R” FOR MANAGERS https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-training-program-leadership-skills-5r-for-managers/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-training-program-leadership-skills-5r-for-managers/#respond Thu, 12 May 2022 03:31:25 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10891 The “Leadership Skills 5R” program for managers was recently organized by Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department. This is a program in Newstar Club’s series of potential leadership development programs. Leadership is a very vital skill for a management position, especially for young managers who have little experience in a new role. The training program ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE TRAINING PROGRAM “LEADERSHIP SKILLS 5R” FOR MANAGERS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The “Leadership Skills 5R” program for managers was recently organized by Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department. This is a program in Newstar Club’s series of potential leadership development programs.

Leadership is a very vital skill for a management position, especially for young managers who have little experience in a new role. The training program has provided a comprehensive picture of a long-term manager, clearly articulating the manager’s functions and responsibilities, as well as the competencies needed to become a true manager.

Speaker Phan Huu Loc (VMP Academy), who has more than 18 years of rigorous experience in management, leadership, and training, presented and communicated the lecture’s contents directly through graphics. Teaching formula 3V with Fun, Movement and Application provides a dynamic learning environment with instructions that are simple to understand and implement.

Rights, Relationship, Result, Reproduction, and Respect are the 5Rs in the training program, which correlate to the 5 ladders that the manager affects people for a common purpose.

Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department believes that managers will learn and implement the following abilities as a result of the program:

  • Understand the five levels of leadership and know your own capacity;
  • Learn the way to communicate with coworkers and subordinates;
  • Learn the way to influence and motivate others;
  • Use good assignation and delegation strategies to encourage people to be proactive in their work.

“The training session has methodically reorganized a number of abilities that can be instantly implemented to the current job, such as presentation skills, assignment skills, priority planning steps, and helped me better understand the roles and responsibilities of a manager” Mr. Nguyen Van Thien, Site Vice Manager of The Sóng project, remarked after participating in the program. “Every day, I will utilize this knowledge and practice to improve my expertise.” He added.

“After the course, I noticed that several mistakes were repeated over and over throughout my two years as a manager, that is, I often work on behalf of my team members,” said Mr. Nguyen Thanh Nam, Deputy Head of Technical Department. “This is a common issue among novice managers. As a result, I enjoy the statement “Doing everything is losing everything” because it gives me a clear idea of my duty as a manager as well as work orientation for the team members in my department. I’m excited to share what I’ve learned and experienced from the lesson with other participants, especially those who have the potential to lead.”

“The training event was a realistic opportunity for me to reflect on my management work in the past and learn some additional proper knowledge for future management job that help me to save time and effort in the future.” stated Mr. Nguyen Thanh Nhon, Head of Legal System Department, who frequently manages processes that demand high precision.

The training program was interesting with a variety of activities and approaches to help participants remember and practice what they had learned in class. Newtecons Human Resources & Training Department will conduct additional programs for Newtecons’ managers in the future to increase professional knowledge and management abilities in order to foster resource staff while also strengthening internal communication.

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE TRAINING PROGRAM “LEADERSHIP SKILLS 5R” FOR MANAGERS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-training-program-leadership-skills-5r-for-managers/feed/ 0 MASTERI WATERFRONT PROJECT ACHIEVES 3 MILLION SAFETY HOURS https://newtecons.vn/en/masteri-waterfront-project-achieves-3-million-safety-hours/ https://newtecons.vn/en/masteri-waterfront-project-achieves-3-million-safety-hours/#respond Thu, 28 Apr 2022 08:48:03 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10892 [Hanoi, April 28, 2022] The Masteri Waterfront Project Management Board received a construction site certificate for 3 million safe hours from the client’s representative. Representatives from Masterise Homes Investor, Apave Supervision Consultant, Site Management team, subcontractors, and approximately 1,000 workers attended the congratulatory ceremony. This is a meaningful activity to commemorate World Day for Safety ... Read more

The post MASTERI WATERFRONT PROJECT ACHIEVES 3 MILLION SAFETY HOURS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Hanoi, April 28, 2022] The Masteri Waterfront Project Management Board received a construction site certificate for 3 million safe hours from the client’s representative. Representatives from Masterise Homes Investor, Apave Supervision Consultant, Site Management team, subcontractors, and approximately 1,000 workers attended the congratulatory ceremony. This is a meaningful activity to commemorate World Day for Safety and Health at Work.

The site management team has worked closely with the Safety Department for more than 16 months of construction, starting on November 20, 2020, to issue stern directions in the management and control of safety activities at the project for thousands of workers. The achievement of 3 million safe hours is a testament to the efforts of all personnel who have adhered to all construction and work safety regulations.

Mr. Do Duong Chuc – Director of Safety Department of Masterise Homes, expressed his gratitude for Newtecons’ efforts at the congratulatory ceremony. He expects that after achieving 3 million safety hours, Newtecons will continue to accomplish 2 more million hours of safety, completing the project on time and with good quality.

Mr. Do Duong Chuc, on behalf of Masterise Homes, awarded the certificate of 3 million safe hours to the site management team.

On behalf of General Contractor Newtecons, Mr. Nguyen Anh Tuan – Construction Site Manager thanked Masterise Homes & Apave Supervision Consultant, NSC subcontractors, and all project workers for supporting and accompanying Newtecons during difficult times, managing and coordinating with the contractor to achieve the certificate. The efforts of the entire team, particularly the direct construction workers, have played a vital role in the project’s achievement of the 3 million safe hours.

Mr. Tran Duc Quynh – a worker from An Gia Hung subcontractor expressed his gratitude to the Site Management team and the Safety Board for their strictness in all work to ensure the safety and health of the workers. Despite the strict regulations, they are essential aspect in allowing him and his coworkers to operate in peace.

The Site Management team has created and revised the professional management process after determining that occupational safety is a prerequisite. Engineers, construction supervisors, and workers are all routinely disseminated and trained to ensure a thorough understanding, firm grip, and a constant sense of full compliance. The project’s human resources, machinery, and equipment are all in compliance with ISO 45001:2018 and ISO 14001:2015, as well as the HSSE Management System that Newtecons has developed and committed to implementing.

The Safety Board holds training sessions before to each project to enhance employee awareness of safety issues. The Site Management team closely follows the processes before each construction stage, analyzes and evaluates potential hazards, and then takes preventative measures and emergency response plans.

After topping out, there are still finishing works, MEP, aluminum and glass, infrastructure, and other concerns to consider when the construction is completed. As a result, the entire project must continue to increase safety work to not only reach 3 million hours of safety, but to reach 5 million hours of safety and complete the project on time.

Related information:

Every year on April 28, on a global scale, the International Labor Organization commemorates World Day for Safety and Health at Work to promote the prevention of workplace accidents, occupational illness prevention and control, as well as a day to memorize those who have died or been injured while at work.

Other photos of the ceremony:

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/masteri-waterfront-project-achieves-3-million-safety-hours/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION IN THE TOP 10 BEST CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN VIETNAM BY ITS SOLID INNER FORCES https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-affirms-its-position-in-the-top-10-best-construction-companies-in-vietnam-by-its-solid-inner-forces/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-affirms-its-position-in-the-top-10-best-construction-companies-in-vietnam-by-its-solid-inner-forces/#respond Tue, 26 Apr 2022 10:24:21 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10612 [Hanoi, April 22, 2022] Newtecons was honored to receive reward of TOP 10 BEST CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN VIETNAM 2022 at the Announcement Ceremony of Top 10 prestigious firms in property and construction in the year 2022 by Vietnam Report (VNR) and VietNamNet Newspaper – Ministry of Information and Communications solemnly organized. Solid inner force is ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION IN THE TOP 10 BEST CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN VIETNAM BY ITS SOLID INNER FORCES appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Hanoi, April 22, 2022] Newtecons was honored to receive reward of TOP 10 BEST CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN VIETNAM 2022 at the Announcement Ceremony of Top 10 prestigious firms in property and construction in the year 2022 by Vietnam Report (VNR) and VietNamNet Newspaper – Ministry of Information and Communications solemnly organized. Solid inner force is the strength that helps Newtecons overcome all obstacles under the pressure of the Covid-19 pandemic and achieved this reward.

VNR’s independent investigation on scientific and objective principles resulted in the TOP 10 rating. Financial capacity as demonstrated in the most recent financial statements is used to measure a company’s reputation. The Media Coding approach, which involves coding articles from influential media outlets, is used to assess media trustworthiness. In the period 2021-2022, a survey of research subjects and stakeholders will be conducted as an additional aspect in determining the position of businesses in the industry.

SOLID INNER FORCE – ADAPTING TO CHANGE

“Newtecons’ market rivalry is defined not only by its equipment, technology, finance, and skilled human resources capability, but also by its PRESTIGE. PRESTIGE is a Newtecons brand, and when it comes to Newtecons, it’s all about the prestige. Newtecons comes to mind when the Investor is looking for a reputed General Contractor.

Due to the detrimental impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the construction industry had a terrible year in 2021. Due to disruptions in the supply of materials and human resources, most projects in the provinces and cities affected by social distancing had to halt construction, and projects out of blocked areas were also delayed. The expense of maintaining the apparatus, the cost of epidemic prevention, and the cost of deploying resources after the lockdown are the most evident economic costs. Aside from the epidemic’s convoluted evolution, fluctuations in the price of raw materials have had a direct impact on construction investment prices, the efficiency of many projects, and the erosion of business profit margins. Newtecons has opted to grow internal resources and maintain its reputation with customers, partners, and employees, while other businesses are searching for methods to boost profits, cut personnel, reduce pay, and increase works.

Newtecons is always ready for any situation by developing solutions, promptly adapting, and having faith in its own team as a pioneer of creation. With the capacity and agreement of all employees, Newtecons quickly took steps to preserve production and business on the one hand, while also caring for each employee’s life and sharing responsibility for public community.

The cost of PCR testing has been significant since the beginning of the pandemic, but the company continues to do tests for employees in order to satisfy the “zero covid” campaign, discover and trace infections immediately, and avoid spead of the pandemic; maintain business in order to assure safety. When news of the death spread, everyone became panicked and anxious. The vaccination dose was highly rare and crucial at the time, but all Newtecons employees and their families were shot as soon as possible, ensuring health safety and mental stability. Newtecons has organized a rapid reaction team, consulting doctors, supporting medicines, information, oxygen tanks, SPO2 concentration meters, ambulances, and treatment facilities during the process of suppressing the epidemic – living with the pandemic. Because of Covid, the Newtecons collective has securely through the most difficult and perplexing period of crisis, with peace of mind and pride in being a part of a corporation. In every circumstance, there is a Board of Directors that pays special attention to each member.

Newtecons founded the Newshare Fund to help employees and their families, as well as to create a sense of community, empathy, and solidarity among employees. Internal activities are always maintained so that the member are “distance never separates hearts,” always looking towards the company, always looking towards each other, working with peace of mind while working at a distance.

As a result, all Newtecons employees are proud and courteous, ready to step in with a dedicated heart. Many new initiatives born. Many construction sites worked tirelessly at all hours of the day and night, finishing projects ahead of schedule. Newtecons is one of the few companies in the same industry that expects to expand in 2021. Newtecons announces a daring expansion strategy from 5,363 billion to over 10,000 billion as more than a half of the construction market freezes. When the entire market was struggling to reduce workers, Newtecons opened a 5 star office with “all-cool” facilities for employee, recruited many new employees.

General Director Tran Kim Long shared: “I am most proud of Newtecons’ staff. Today’s success is the result of all Newtecons’ people who have worked day and night with dedication. I am happy to have a united, enthusiastic, passionate and powerful team.”

UPGRADE SOLUTION – SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT      

In a time when the entire economy is trying to recover, Newtecons’ short and medium-term business plan focuses on five priorities: Strengthening financial management and risk management; ensuring jobs, wages, and benefits for employees; promoting investment and technology development; strengthening training and improving the quality of human resources to adapt to the digital era; Building strong financial resources.

Sustainable construction, according to experts, is gradually approaching ESG – Environmental, Social and Governance Criteria, which focus on activities to protect the natural environment and effectively use natural resources; improving the quality of life, making progress in social life, while ensuring economic growth and generating profits without affecting the needs of future generations. As a result, Newtecons has been using a green building model that adheres to high standards, saves fuel, and operates closed and cyclical stages to produce competitive advantages and value for customers in particular, and for society as a whole.

Newtecons continues to organize team bonding activities, setup a series of new personnel, and trains at every level, from the office to the construction sites, from senior management to employees, in the fortunate year of 2022. Sports and team-building activities take precedence. Newtecons seemed to have regained its vigor, becoming stronger and more resilient, full of hope for the future, and fast recovering from the pandemic.

Vietnam Top 10 Building contractors Reputation Award 2022 is a proof to Newtecons’ internal strength and a motivator to keep reaching higher levels and fulfilling its purpose of contributing to the development of the construction industry and creating long-term benefit for society.

The post NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION IN THE TOP 10 BEST CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN VIETNAM BY ITS SOLID INNER FORCES appeared first on Newtecons.

So, employee ability is proven, their ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED A CEREMONY FOR TITLE DEFENSE TO IMPROVE HUMAN RESOURCE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Throughout the first quarter of 2022, Newtecons held a ceremony to defend the titles of Construction Site Manager/Head of Department, Deputy Construction Site Manager/Deputy Head of Department for many individuals with excellent operational history, who were well-trained and supervised with the records from direct management levels and specialized departments. So, employee ability is proven, their contribution is recognized, and new opportunities to further promote their advantages while also training and developing the next generation open up.

TITLE DEFENSE OF CONSTRUCTION SITE MANAGER /HEAD OF DEPARTMENT

✥ Mr. Nguyen Duy Hien – defended the title of Construction Site Manager of Asiana Danang Project

Mr. Hien is a person who is full of energy, is active in all of his thoughts and actions, and is not afraid of challenges. During the long-lasting epidemic, he had to be in charge at the Asiana Danang project, only being able to visit his wife and children through the phone screen. He devoted himself to the construction site and his team, suppressing his homesickness and temporarily suspending the responsibilities of a breadwinner. As a result, the Asiana Danang project always meets key milestones on time, with high quality and to the satisfaction of Investors/Supervision Consultants.

He has received a lot of praise from the Evaluation Board for his strengths in project implementation experience from setup to completion and maintenance, as well as a meticulous and serious personality in work and a confident and coherent presentation.

✥ Mr. Le Dinh Phuc – defended the title of Construction Site Manager of the M Garden City Danang Project

Mr. Phuc is loved by his team and colleagues for his genuine, honest personality, which he devotes entirely to his work and teammates. He has a long-term commitment, is always enthusiastic and passionate about his profession, and gives “fire” to everyone he meets. Everyone is united, engaged, and vibrant in internal activities at the construction site where he works. He was awarded the title of Excellent Deputy Construction Site Manager in 2021. Accepting the position of Construction Site Manager, he is committed to promoting his strengths and completing the assigned tasks successfully.

✥ Mr. Vo Quoc Tuan – defends the title of Construction Site Manager of the Service, Trade and Housing Center Project, Hamlet 4, Ward 1, Sa Dec City

Mr. Tuan had worked in the office for a long time and is highly familiar with the role of functional departments in the company, allowing him to effectively exploit the department’s support in order to operate smoothly and successfully. Through his working procedure, Mr. Tuan has demonstrated his adaptability and spirit of perpetual learning to the Board of Directors, and he frequently hurries to accept responsibilities wherever they are necessary. He converted challenges into opportunities and was motivated to succeed, so he now stands confidently and courageously in his new position.

✥ Mr. Nguyen Thanh Liem – defended the title of Head of Information Technology Department

Mr. Liem is a sincere and enthusiastic individual; he is highly energetic and open-minded that contrast to the “definition” that many people identify with the term “IT people.” According to Mr. Liem, the most important factors in the sector are loyalty, prestige, and always preserving the company’s interests. In the next months, he will work with the Information Technology Department to further promote the company’s robust development, deserving of its position as Vietnam’s Leading General Contractor.

TITLE DEFENSE OF DEPUTY CONSTRUCTION SITE MANAGER / DEPUTY HEAD OF DEPARTMENT

✥ Mr. Nguyen Hoang Dung – defended the title of Deputy Head of Safety Department (HSSE)

Mr. Dung joined Newtecons shortly after graduating from university and has been in charge of safety work on several of Newtecons’ most demanding and complicated projects. Mr. Dung’s excitement, passion for the profession, progressive spirit, and ongoing learning and development left a lasting impression on the Evaluation Board. Mr. Dung will work with the Safety Department to refocus safety efforts to best suit each type of project in his new position after being appointed, in addition to pushing the establishment of a standardized system. Simultaneously, supporting the spread of safety culture throughout the construction workforce, assisting Newtecons in affirming its brand as a safety general contractor in the market.

✥ Mr. Nguyen Duc Thanh – defended the title of Deputy Head of Technical Department 

Mr. Thanh was quite confident when he took the position of Technical Specialist, then the Head of Technical Team of the Technical Department, after holding several various roles at the Vinhomes Central Park construction site. Mr. Thanh’s presentation recognized and highlighted the Technical Department’s involvement in project bidding and implementation, particularly the relationship between technology and cost. Mr. Thanh will continue to strengthen coordination with departments – the construction sites from the beginning of the project to propose the most appropriate construction method; at the same time, he will focus on motivating the team members in the department by giving a clear career development path.

✥ Mr. Vo Minh Hoang – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of Techcombank Saigon Tower project

This is a typical project in the city center, with many unique components and significant technical needs. Mr. Hoang displayed great technical competence, team leadership, internal and external interactions, and developed a reputation with the Investor and Foreign Consultant during the project.

✥ Mr. Dang Duc Minh – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of The Giao project

Mr. Minh has worked on a variety of projects in the North, including Vinhomes Times City, D’Capitale, Berriver, Barret Brewery, Mapletree Logistics, and others, he has made an indelible impression with his meticulous, prudence, fierce working style. Mr. Minh has been entrusted with the management of the complete The Giao project due to his extensive experience in the construction of various sorts of projects in a variety of roles.

✥ Mr. Tran Anh Dung – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of Asiana Danang project

Mr. Dung is one of the experts on the team, and he is having a great influence on his subordinates and the construction crew. He is making a significant contribution in training the succession of supervisors at a typical Da Nang project to fulfill the standards of knowledge, meticulousness, and sophistication in their job.

✥ Mr. Vo Dinh Thuan – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of Hoa Phat Dung Quat project

Mr. Thuan is recognized by his superiors to be a highly careful, methodical, and fierce person in his work, and he has a strong reputation with the Construction Site Management Team, consultants, and investors, he is having worked on a variety of projects. His cogent and assured presentation manner also made a good impression on the Evalution Board. He resembles the image of a future Newtecons Construction Site Manager.

✥ Mr. Hoang Xuan Nam – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of Masteri Waterfront project

Mr. Nam has extensive experience in high-rise building construction, particularly structural construction. He is a forward-thinking, positive thinker who is decisive in problem-solving and has a significant role in training and developing the next generation team.

✥ Mr. Vu Duc Nang – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of Masteri Waterfront project

With experience in QA/QC in many projects, Mr. Nang is a meticulous worker with excellent office abilities. One of his strength is his ability to work with foreign investors.

✥ Mr. Nguyen Huy Tung – defended the title of Deputy Construction Site Manager of Masteri Waterfront project

Mr. Tung has strengths in construction sites with many years of experience in both structural and finishing areas. With his fierce personality and good presentation ability, he is expected to further promote his role in this project.

The Evaluation Board and the audience provided candid, objective, and reasonable feedback, which helped them see the areas that needed to be addressed and fully promoted in new positions, while also seeking to advance to higher positions, with the goal of becoming one of the core leaders in the future.

Wishing you continued passion, excitement, and creativity in your new position, as well as the opportunity to further develop your abilities. Wishing all who are passionate about the vocation the best of luck in their future endeavors.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-a-ceremony-for-title-defense-to-improve-human-resource/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS KICK OFF NEWSTAR CLUB IN 2022 WITH MANY “DYNAMIC” ACTIVITIES https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-kick-off-newstar-club-in-2022-with-many-dynamic-activities/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-kick-off-newstar-club-in-2022-with-many-dynamic-activities/#respond Fri, 08 Apr 2022 02:48:57 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10514 NEWSTAR Club – Newtecons’ potential leadership club just announced its new Board of Directors and began its first events in 2022.
