The post NEWTECONS KICK OFF NEWSTAR CLUB IN 2022 WITH MANY “DYNAMIC” ACTIVITIES appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> NEWSTAR Club – Newtecons’ potential leadership club just announced its new Board of Directors and began its first events in 2022.

  • NEWSTAR‘s mission are:
    • Exchanging values, connecting and agreeing on a common goal.
    • Expertise and talents should be shared, trained, and developed.
    • Developing and growing resource employees by nurturing talents.

The Board of Directors’ and club members’ exchange program has received excellent comments. All members comfortably shared their feelings, discussed their struggles, lessons learned, and, most importantly, OPTIMIZE, CREATIVE solutions based on experience.

General Director Tran Kim Long reminded the members about KINDNESS – INTEGRITY in all actions. Always maintain a cold head and a hot heart full of love, take responsibility for the company, consider work is the foundation, and success will come quickly.

THE POWER OF ONE – TEAMBUILDING CONNECTING THE POWER OF THE LEADERS

With the participation of more than 150 elite members, a teambuilding program was effectively conducted within the scope of outstanding and regular club events. To express the club’s attitude in 2022, the motto “THE POWER OF ONE” – the strength of a UNITED community, leadership, energetic, and always going forward despite obstacles – was chosen.

Movement games provide lots of laughs, moments of relaxation, and an opportunity to show off talents and humorous qualities that the members haven’t shown in a long time. Get “on fire”, dare to take on obstacles, and most importantly, teamwork is developed when playing games together using both intellect and strength.

Gala Dinner allows members to converse, gather around the campfire, sing their favorite songs, confide in, and share their lives and professions with one another. All members can come closer to the Board of Directors, listen to shared orientation, and open to talk about issues and problems, lessons learned, and get to know one other through the program.

“The program is both enjoyable and beneficial, providing a valuable opportunity for the members to bond, cohere, and revitalize themselves after a difficult period on the construction site. I hope the program will be repeated more frequently, allowing all members of the Newtecons family to join and strengthen their bonds.” Vice Site Manager of Sao Dau project – Mr Dao Quang Huy enthusiastically expressed.

The journey came to a successful end, leaving each member with special feelings, amazing memories, and new energy, as well as more love, more faith, and more strength for an exciting 2022.

In the early future, NEWSTAR continues its mission of “discovering and developing quality human resources; fostering excellent individuals who have full leadership qualities to become the Company’s core management force, contributing to the company’s stronger and more sustainable development”.

Let’s look back at some of the event’s most memorable moments.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-kick-off-newstar-club-in-2022-with-many-dynamic-activities/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE CONFERENCE OF CONSTRUCTION FORCE IN 2022 https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-conference-of-construction-force-in-2022/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-conference-of-construction-force-in-2022/#respond Mon, 04 Apr 2022 09:33:06 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10449 [March 30, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] The Newtecons Construction Force (CF) Conference 2022 was a success, with over 100 close partners who are subcontractors attending in person at Newtecons Tower headquarters and online. Subcontractors make a significant contribution to the success of each project. As a result, Newtecons holds a meeting and dialogue program ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE CONFERENCE OF CONSTRUCTION FORCE IN 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [March 30, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] The Newtecons Construction Force (CF) Conference 2022 was a success, with over 100 close partners who are subcontractors attending in person at Newtecons Tower headquarters and online.

Subcontractors make a significant contribution to the success of each project. As a result, Newtecons holds a meeting and dialogue program once a year to listen to the sharing, difficulties, and obstacles in the cooperation process between subcontractors and the steering committee of construction sites to quickly eliminate such difficulties. The meetings annually help subcontractors feel secure about the lives of workers, and stabilize human resources, allowing the project to run more smoothly, with many initiatives to make the work more and more developed. This benefits not only subcontractors, but also the steering committee of building sites, assisting Newtecons in their development.

Mr. Tran Kim Long – General Director of Newtecons shared an overview of the development process of Newtecons in the past time, the current situation as well as the company’s orientations in the coming time with the subcontractors. “I would like to express my gratitude for the companionship and joint role of subcontractors who have made important contributions to the success of Newtecons. Despite spending two years mobilizing workers during and after the epidemic, subcontractors have always shared the same passion and suffering as Newtecons to get through the difficult period and develop as it is today. In 2022, Newtecons achieves a revenue breakthrough, increasing from over 5,000 billion to more than 10,000 billion, which is a significant growth. In order to do so, Newtecons requires the companionship and support of partners, subcontractors, and suppliers, in addition to consolidating internal resources. I hope that the relationship between Newtecons and its subcontractors will be strengthened, committed, reputable, fair, and reciprocal in order to increase the parties’ efficiency.”

Mr. To Van Thang, Head of Newtecons’s Construction Force Department, highlighted the Department’s activities to support the subcontractors in 2022 and subsequent years. In which case, it is necessary to mention the activities of strengthening the entire force, adding specialized personnel, and changing processes and regulations to be more compatible with the rapid development and market conditions. The function of CF department has also been updated:

  • Providing consulting and arranging CF at the project’s first stages.
  • Managing information of CF: capability assessment, decentralization, information receipt, and feedback to subcontractors.
  • Control: Ensure the commitment between subcontractors and the construction site that are upheld in accordance with the CF requirements.

Mr. Thang further said that the cooperation strategy with subcontractors in 2022 has new policies:

  • For strategic partners who are committed to the company, advance guarantee and warranty exemptions are waived.
  • Depending on the size and characteristics of the project, increase the percent of project advance payment for subcontractors.
  • Increase payment value in installments for strategic partners who have demonstrated a commitment to the company (in comparison to present regulations).
  • Contracting orientation includes labor, equipment, and materials.
  • Assisting subcontractors in obtaining financial support products from banks that are Newtecons partners, allowing subcontractors to manage cash flow and the lives of technicians and workers.
  • Ascertain the source of work so that subcontractors can feel comfortable that the apparatus will be maintained.
  • Raising the level by training subcontractor’s technical apparatus.

The subcontractors openly communicated and contributed in detail to the outstanding challenges in the coordination process with the goal of understanding and continuing to passionately believe in Newtecons, assisting in the achievement of new successes.

Newtecons’ Board of Directors and functional units responded quickly to each issue, provided a clear solution, and established favorable conditions for subcontractors. Newtecons has arranged full-time personnel and cross-checked projects; announced the reference price, which is updated annually in accordance with market conditions and project characteristics. Newtecons builts a flexible payment mechanism for strategic subcontractors; always use new equipment, comply with regulations, inspect, and tighten the delivery of equipment at the construction site to ensure the appropriate use of the equipment and increase labor productivity. That helps to restrict groups of “opportunity seekers” from exploiting obstacles to manipulate prices and obstruct labor mobilization for genuine subcontractors, ensuring fairness for all subcontractors in all operations.

The Newtecons representative also reminded the subcontractors to follow the Newtecons Board of Directors’ occupational safety regulations, as this is the benchmark for ensuring the general safety of construction employees. Companionship, commitment, financial stability, always having a representative on duty, and cooperation with the project, as well as in agreement with the site management committee, for incident acceptance and timely handling are all conditions for becoming a subcontractor with the finest incentives. The Newtecons representative urged subcontractors to concentrate their efforts and “work hard” while working on projects with tight implementation timelines.

The CF Department should have more open rules to support subcontractors, according to the Newtecons Board of Directors, and the site management committee should have a fair progress point to help subcontractors mobilize personnel at the proper moment, be proactive in finance, and avoid losses. Other issues are also documented and addressed. The subcontractors may be entirely confident in their ability to establish the management apparatus and mobilize workers to stay with Newtecons in the future.

Newtecons’ 2022 Construction Force Conference was a massive success, with many valuable shares and contributions from subcontractor’s representatives, allowing Newtecons to respond and coordinate more quickly next time. Newtecons will truly, effectively, and successfully cooperate with the subcontractors in 2022 and subsequent years.

Some more photos at the event:

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-conference-of-construction-force-in-2022/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS STARTS FLORA PANORAMA PROJECT AT MIZUKI PARK – URBAN AREA WAS INVESTED BY JAPANESE https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-starts-flora-panorama-project-at-mizuki-park-urban-area-was-invested-by-japanese/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-starts-flora-panorama-project-at-mizuki-park-urban-area-was-invested-by-japanese/#respond Fri, 01 Apr 2022 09:47:00 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10445 [Ho Chi Minh City, March 22, 2022] Newtecons and the Investor – Nam Long, two Japanese partners Nishi Nippon Railroad and Hankyu Hanshin Properties solemnly held the groundbreaking ceremony of the isolated apartment building project Flora Panorama in phase 3 of the 26ha Mizuki Park Integrated Urban Area. This is the next project in a ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS STARTS FLORA PANORAMA PROJECT AT MIZUKI PARK – URBAN AREA WAS INVESTED BY JAPANESE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Ho Chi Minh City, March 22, 2022] Newtecons and the Investor – Nam Long, two Japanese partners Nishi Nippon Railroad and Hankyu Hanshin Properties solemnly held the groundbreaking ceremony of the isolated apartment building project Flora Panorama in phase 3 of the 26ha Mizuki Park Integrated Urban Area. This is the next project in a long line of successful collaborations among leading enterprises in their busines. Distinguished visitors representing the Investor, Supervision Consultant, General Contractor, Subcontractor, Supplier, and others were present at the occasion.

The Mizuki Park urban area is one of the most important projects of Nam Long Investment Corp, Vietnam’s biggest real estate developer, in collaboration with two well-known Japanese partners, Nishi Nippon Railroad and Hankyu Hanshin Properties. This project in phase 3 of the Mizuki Park urban area project series, it is a cluster of three blocks with over 400 isolated apartments Flora+, in which Newtecons is the General Contractor and Artelia and FQM are the construction managers and supervision consultants.

Flora Panorama là dự án căn hộ thuộc dòng sản phẩm tiêu chuẩn Flora + của Nam Long, hướng đến tiêu chuẩn mid-end của quốc tế với hàng loạt cải tiến đáng giá về thiết kế kiến trúc lẫn vật liệu hoàn thiện. Khu căn hộ biệt lập Flora Panorama gồm 3 Block căn hộ với hơn 400 sản phẩm nằm tại trục đại lộ thương mại nội khu, liền kề khu compound biệt thự triệu đô ven sông The Mizuki và kết nối trực tiếp đến quảng trường Marina. Ngoài hệ thống tiện ích riêng, khu căn hộ còn được thừa hưởng toàn bộ tiện ích của khu đô thị tích hợp như kênh đào rộng 1,7ha, đường dạo bộ thể dục 1,5km và đường xe đạp dài 1,3km, công viên cây xanh 103.000m2, quảng trường sự kiện 8.700m2,  hệ thống giáo dục 40.000m2, khu thương mại 15.000m2, công trình y tế 7.500m2, khu hành chính – văn hóa 5.000m2. Dự án được phát triển bởi các đơn vị hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực Bất động sản và Xây dựng trong nước và quốc tế như Conybeare Morrison CM+ (Australia – planning design), CPG (Singapore – landscape design), Aurecon (Australia – infrastructure design consultant), Yellowstone Consultants (Australia – infrastructure design consultant), Belt Collins (USA – landscape consultant), Rankine & Hill (Sigapore – structural consultant), Newtecons (General contractor).

Newtecons is responsible for the foundation structure, tunnel, body structure, finishing, MEP system, and interior landscape infrastructure for this project. The project will be completed in the third quarter of 2023 after a 16-month implementation period.

Newtecons already won the bid, began construction, and is speeding up the completion of the MP6-7-8 project in the Mizuki Park Urban Area. The Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 blocks are carefully organized in a zigzag form to optimize the open space of the flats while also introducing the “water-tree” natural scenery and a harmonious climate into each living space. Despite the challenges of the Covid-19 epidemic, Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 was constructed on time and handed over on time.

“With the strong cooperation between the two sides in many prior projects, coupled with many years of expertise in executing a series of projects according to high quality standards,” stated Mr. Tran Kim Long, General Director of Newtecons, during the occasion. “Newtecons is confident that the collaboration in this project will be a success, providing residents of Mizuki Park Urban Area with the greatest living conditions.”

With vast construction experience on a variety of demanding and complex projects, the Newtecons Management Board is dedicated to attaining the greatest levels of progress, quality, aesthetics, and investor and customer satisfaction in this project. Construction procedures were rapidly established and implemented, and labor and equipment plans were meticulously prepared.

Mr. Tran Xuan Ngoc – General Director of Nam Long IC shared at the ceremony: “Mizuki Park has played and continues to play a critical part in Nam Long Corporation’s strategy and business plan. Nam Long appreciates Newtecons’ and its partners’ cooperation; the parties will collaborate with one mind, consensus, and coordination in the best way possible during project implementation to assure the best process, quality, and schedule, continue to develop goods that are the best value for the community, as intended.”

“On behalf of Japanese investors, I’d want to express my gratitude to Nam Long, Newtecons, and all of our partners for their outstanding work thus far. We are optimistic that a robust and long-term partnership will propel the project to new heights in the market. We are committed to working with Nam Long and Newtecons to create high-quality, safe, comfortable, and convenient apartment complexes that inspire and elevate consumers’ lifestyles.” Mr. Kentaro Matoba – Representative of Hankyu Hanshin Properties Vietnam shared at the event.

The Mizuki Park project is located at a key location in Ho Chi Minh City’s southern gateway area. In addition to the completely built utilities in Saigon South and the Phu My Hung Urban Area. Residents can easily visit bustling sections of the city such as Cho Lon, An Dong market, Ben Thanh market, or the center of District 1 within a 4.5km radius of Mizuki Park Residential Area.

The groundbreaking ceremony of Flora Panorama project.

Mizuki Park urban area, with its distinct Japanese design style, provides a green living environment in the center of the bustling city to its residents.
Some other photos at the ceremony:

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-tower-pride-symbol-of-newtecons-people/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS HELD THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF SORA GARDENS SC PROJECT – THE BIGGEST TRADING CENTER IN BINH DUONG NEW CITY ACCORDING TO JAPANESE STANDARDS https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-held-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-sora-gardens-sc-project-the-biggest-trading-center-in-binh-duong-new-city-according-to-japanese-standards/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-held-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-sora-gardens-sc-project-the-biggest-trading-center-in-binh-duong-new-city-according-to-japanese-standards/#respond Sat, 19 Mar 2022 09:55:24 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10224 [Binh Duong, March 8, 2022] Newtecons solemnly held the groundbreaking ceremony of SORA gardens SC project – the first and largest trading center in Binh Duong new city, this is the second project following the successfull cooperation between Newtecons and Becamex Tokyu at the Sora Gardens II project. SORA gardens SC is a multi-functional project ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS HELD THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF SORA GARDENS SC PROJECT – THE BIGGEST TRADING CENTER IN BINH DUONG NEW CITY ACCORDING TO JAPANESE STANDARDS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Binh Duong, March 8, 2022] Newtecons solemnly held the groundbreaking ceremony of SORA gardens SC project – the first and largest trading center in Binh Duong new city, this is the second project following the successfull cooperation between Newtecons and Becamex Tokyu at the Sora Gardens II project.

SORA gardens SC is a multi-functional project with 4 floors and a total area of 19,863sqm. It includes a supermarket, a shopping mall, an entertainment area, a food court, a cinema, and a green garden with breathtaking views. It is currently the only and largest trading center in Binh Duong New City.

The AEON supermarket system (Japan) chose SORA gardens SC to deploy the first “Compact GMS” concept in Vietnam. This is a significant project in the urban area that the province leaders and local citizens are highly interested in. It has the potential to become the focal point for enticing inhabitants to live and work in the city, assisting in the transformation of the city into a desirable place to live, work and enjoy life.

“We have created a trustworthy collaboration with Newtecons through the Sora Gardens II project – the project is warmly received and enjoyed by clients”, Mr. Onuma Minoru, Deputy General Director, COO, representative of the Investor Becamex Tokyu, said at the ceremony. “I’m hoping that, as we approach the opening ceremony next year, the contractors will be able to continue working without interruption, establish the Covid-19 prevention plan, and finish the project on time. We expect that by accelerating other development projects in Binh Duong new city, the notion of “Always new” will become a reality, contributing to the general growth of Binh Duong province.”

 

Mr. Tran Kim Long, General Director of Newtecons, appreciates Becamex Tokyu’s confidence in Newtecons and has poured his heart and soul into the project, instructing the Board of Directors to always follow Newtecons’ guideline of prestige, realizing the project with the highest level of commitment and quality: “SORA gardens SC is the next project between two leading enterprises, one is the largest real estate developer in Vietnam – Becamex Tokyu and Newtecons – a most prestigious general contractor in Vietnam. Newtecons is committed to reaching the highest progress, quality, aesthetics, and customer satisfaction to the Investors and customers in this project, as well as additional prospective projects, with the following business philosophy: Taking prestige and having experience in a succession of significant projects around the country as a brand measure. I am confident that the project’s success will provide a stronger platform for long-term cooperation between Becamex Tokyu and Newtecons.”

 

With the rich experience of executing many projects with complicated structures, unique technological variables, and experience building commercial centers to the highest standards, the Newtecons Board of Directors is committed to completing the project as expected, successfully overcoming challenges such as expedited progress, stringent technical standards, and severe subcontractor selection criteria, etc.

Newtecons and Becamex Tokyu previously completed and handed over the Sora Gardens II project to residents, which received a lot of great praise.

SORA Gardens II has a total area of 84,000sqm, 24 floors, 557 apartments meet high-quality Japanese standard with green and airy living space and various high-class amenities to provide a comfortable and high-quality lifestyle. The project is a joint venture between Becamex Tokyu and Mitsubishi Corporation – one of Japan’s major urban development contructor with a diverse real estate portfolio. The project succeeded in forming a modern and vibrant residential community at the gateway, transforming the appearance of Binh Duong New City and increasing its worth.

SORA gardens SC project is located at Hung Vuong Road, Hoa Phu Ward, Thu Dau Mot city, Binh Duong province. The project is expected to be handed over and put into operation in early 2023, therefore the Steering Committee has created numerous plans to meet the tight construction deadline, but it must nevertheless adhere to the most stringent Japanese standards in terms of technical considerations.

Some photos at the ceremony:

 

 

The post NEWTECONS HELD THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF SORA GARDENS SC PROJECT – THE BIGGEST TRADING CENTER IN BINH DUONG NEW CITY ACCORDING TO JAPANESE STANDARDS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-held-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-sora-gardens-sc-project-the-biggest-trading-center-in-binh-duong-new-city-according-to-japanese-standards/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS AWARDS THE WINNERS OF THE CONTEST “BIM – REVIT APPLICATION IN M&E CONSTRUCTION https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-awards-the-winners-of-the-contest-bim-revitapplication-in-me-construction/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-awards-the-winners-of-the-contest-bim-revitapplication-in-me-construction/#respond Sat, 19 Mar 2022 09:41:14 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10222 Newtecons held the meeting to award the winners of THE CONTEST OF BIM – REVIT APPLICATION IN M&E CONSTRUCTION. Mr. Nguyen Van Thanh – Director of M&E Division awarded 1 iPad Air 2020 64GB to the first prize is Mr. Pham Phi Long – Techcombank Saigon Tower project, and 1 iPad 9 Wifi to the ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS AWARDS THE WINNERS OF THE CONTEST “BIM – REVIT APPLICATION IN M&E CONSTRUCTION appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons held the meeting to award the winners of THE CONTEST OF BIM – REVIT APPLICATION IN M&E CONSTRUCTION. Mr. Nguyen Van Thanh – Director of M&E Division awarded 1 iPad Air 2020 64GB to the first prize is Mr. Pham Phi Long – Techcombank Saigon Tower project, and 1 iPad 9 Wifi to the second prize is Mr. Nguyen Dinh Thieu – Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project.

Newtecons M&E Division held a contest “BIM – Revit application in M&E construction” to promote the use of BIM – REVIT in the implementation of Shopdrawing in M&E construction and to standardize Shopdrawing Revit 3D amongst construction projects. All projects involving MEP construction are eligible to enter the competition. After many months of completing the entries according to the evaluation criteria, the grading committee selected 6 units from Techcombank Saigon Tower, Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8, Asiana Da Nang, M-Garden City Da Nang, The Sóng and Masteri Waterfront to enter the presentation round – the final round of award selection.

“This is a playground for members to use and deploy BIM – Revit more strongly, establishing a healthy competitive environment among MEP staffs and project management teams. Following this event, the M&E Division believes that the contest will not be confined to Newtecons, it will also be expanded to the ecosystem, allowing member companies to join, promote, and further develop the use of technology in construction.” , said Mr. Nguyen Van Thanh, Director of M&E Division.

After the presentation round, Mr. Pham Phi Long – Techcombank Saigon Tower project excellently won the first prize, which is 01 iPad Air 2020 64GB.

The second prize, which is 01 iPad 9 Wifi belongs to Mr. Nguyen Dinh Thieu – Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project.

Mr. Nguyen Dinh Thieu said in the contest, “I feel lucky and proud to get the prize. I have only been with Newtecons for a year, however, my company always makes it possible for me to attempt new things and gain experience in the field of BIM. This award is both a spiritual gift that pushes me to work harder and a recognition from my company that will help me be more determined to achieve the goals set for me. The new point while implementing BIM at the Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project is to use QR Code to examine and extract information from BIM LOD400, therefore this iPad reward will let me operate BIM application faster and easier.”

BIM (Building Information Modeling) is an advanced process applied in the construction industry (AEC) based on digital 3D models. BIM models are more advanced than simple 2D and 3D drawings, they are made up of accompanying intelligent models, which are changed and updated throughout the project development process.

Throughout the life cycle of building projects, BIM helps to optimize workflow by boosting design and operational efficiency. Individuals and organizations involved in the design and construction of works can utilize the data in the BIM model to analyze costs, timelines, and construction methods, as well as maintain the project.

Construction will become faster, more accurate, and less expensive as a result of the use of BIM in M&E construction. As a result, BIM is quickly becoming a new trend and practically a required standard in the construction sector over the world.

Advantages of BIM application in project:

  • Centralize data management.
  • Easy to detect conflicts with intuitive model design, optimal design of details in the space of the building.
  • Save costs – time, reduce costs incurred and work time with consistent data management, avoid loss in the process of archiving and managing documents.
  • Boost collaboration: BIM connects departments closer, architectural design, structure, MEP, estimation departments, etc., All work on a unified model with all information updated on a regular basis to create a continuous flow of information.
  • Reduce risks: 3D models in BIM put all of the pieces of a real structure together to make it easier to spot conflicts between components, limit issues that arise during construction, reduce risk and minimize errors.

REVIT is a software program designed to aid in the implementation of a construction project using the BIM process. Revit is viewed as a tool for making the BIM process more efficient.

Architects, Engineers, and BIM Specialists may ensure a simplified building process, enhance profit margins and save time by using Revit to create accurate 3D models. Furthermore, the Revit model’s benefits do not end after the building is completed; the BIM model can be updated to reflect current circumstances and then used for facility management or restoring historic structures.

The contest was a success, offering numerous practical benefits, helpful content, the spirit of interchange, learning, bonding, and development, and appealing rewards. Hopefully, the contest will have a positive impact, not only on Newtecons’ construction sites but also on other employees in this industry, allowing BIM to be used more extensively in the future, helping the domestic business approach the global environment.

Congratulations to the winners!

The post NEWTECONS AWARDS THE WINNERS OF THE CONTEST “BIM – REVIT APPLICATION IN M&E CONSTRUCTION appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-awards-the-winners-of-the-contest-bim-revitapplication-in-me-construction/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS SET A REVENUE TARGET OF 10,000 BILLION IN 2022 https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-set-a-revenue-target-of-10000-billion-in-2022/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-set-a-revenue-target-of-10000-billion-in-2022/#respond Tue, 08 Feb 2022 06:49:01 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=10084 [February 8, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] At the signing ceremony of Business Plan, Newtecons ushers in the Year of the Tiger with the goal of achieving 10,000 billion VND in revenue by 2022. The post NEWTECONS SET A REVENUE TARGET OF 10,000 BILLION IN 2022 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [February 8, 2022, Ho Chi Minh City] At the signing ceremony of Business Plan, Newtecons ushers in the Year of the Tiger with the goal of achieving 10,000 billion VND in revenue by 2022. The Board of Directors and all levels of management were present for the signing ceremony.

Newtecons has overcome a series of challenges caused by the pandemic, a lack of materials, equipment, and workers, and now has a revenue of 5,363 billion in 2021, making it one of the few leading construction enterprises with strong revenue growth compared to 2020. In the face of a tumultuous market, this is a tremendous effort by a cohesive team, from the Board of Directors to the company’s employees.

On January 21, at the ceremony of the 2022 production and business plan, the Newtecons Executive Board and the Heads of Departments/Divisions/Units sat down to discuss, present in detail and thoroughly the upcoming business plan. Each goal has gotten a lot of feedback, and comment, as well as the finest implementation solutions.

Newtecons aims to increase both revenue and profit in 2022. In addition, Newtecons has determined that the most essential goal is to complete its structure, stay up with market trends, raise staff levels, and bring projects to completion with the quality guaranteed by the Newtecons brand and its powerful human resources.

Mr. Tran Kim Long – General Director of Newtecons shared: “With positive results in 2021 and the unanimity and dedication of a “strong Tiger” team, Newtecons will grow dramatically in 2022, we confidently achieve the set plan, bring a prosperous year to Newtecons people.”

Based on the market’s scenario and an experienced team that has always overcome all obstacles and difficulties to break through limits, find new solutions, and effective ways to complete our projects, Newtecons’ Board of Directors has set three goals, the most optimistic of which is revenue of 10,000 billion in 2022, an increase of approximately 87% over 2021. By improving the structure and team to adapt to the new position that helps Newtecons combine a set of stages from Procurement – Design – Engineering – Cost Management – Equipment – Construction & Human Force, etc… from the Office to the Construction Division to save costs, optimize quality, control the system, ensure safety, improve labor rate, and perfect services.

In the signing ceremony, the key management team of the Company, representing all employees, committed to the Board of Directors to excellently implement the goals and action plan in 2022.

Newtecons will develop even stronger in 2022 and the following years, maintaining its position as the leading Construction General Contractor in Vietnam, believing that with strong internal resources, consensus, and dedication, this goal will be quickly achieved and beyond expectations.

Let’s take a look back at some of Newtecons most thrilling new year images to start a fantastic year of the Tiger:

]]>

Brilliant dawn as the strong, sense of urgency of the Site management team of Phuoc Tho Residential Area – Vinh Long City in the early days of November.

Currently, Phuoc Tho I Residential Area project has completed civil work with a completion rate of 95%, 94% of driven piles, and 25% of the low-rise building’s structure; Phuoc Tho II residential area is focusing on the construction of the technical infrastructure, embankment construction, canal digging, internal lake and foundation pile construction, and house structure.

Phuoc Tho Residential Area deploys a variety of projects: townhouses, shophouses and villas; the infrastructure is built synchronously with commercial centers, schools, community houses and hospitals.

Phuoc Tho Residental Area is likened to a “green peninsula” adjacent to the central area, promising to change the urban infrastructure and improve the quality of life of people in Vinh Long City after completion.

The  housing and commercial service complex is one of the largest projects in Long Xuyen today, invested by Vinh Thien Da Nang Joint Stock Company (a member of T&T Group) and Newtecons as the General Contractor.

The project has a total area of 35,811m2 divided into two zones: Zone 1 includes 118 townhouses with 5 floors and shophouses; Zone 2 is a five-star hotel with 20 floors. In particular, the project is arranged 2,705m2 of green parkland. In particular, the project is arranged 2,705m2 of green parkland

Currently, the project has completed 70% of technical infrastructure items. It is pressing piles, and testing compression pile load.

Despite facing challenges due to epidemics and adverse conditions during the rainy season in the West, the Site Management team always encouraged each other to make efforts, enthusiasm and determination to overcome challenges and continue to ensure project progress and safety construction.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/housing-and-commercial-service-complex-in-long-xuyen-city-an-giang/feed/ 0 THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF THE 05 BW HAI DUONG PROJECT – EXPANDING THE STRATEGYTO ACHIEVE THE GLOBAL RANKING https://newtecons.vn/en/the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-the-05-bw-hai-duong-project-expanding-the-strategyto-achieve-the-global-ranking/ https://newtecons.vn/en/the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-the-05-bw-hai-duong-project-expanding-the-strategyto-achieve-the-global-ranking/#respond Tue, 18 Jan 2022 09:48:18 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=9860 Following the success of project 08 BW Thoi Hoa, the investor BW Industrial Development Joint Stock Company (BW) continues to engage Newtecons with the bidding package for the 05 BW Hai Duong Project, which has a total construction area of 63,000sqm and three 35,000sqm factories. The post THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF THE 05 BW HAI DUONG PROJECT – EXPANDING THE STRATEGYTO ACHIEVE THE GLOBAL RANKING appeared first on Newtecons.

]]>

Following the success of project 08 BW Thoi Hoa, the investor BW Industrial Development Joint Stock Company (BW) continues to engage Newtecons with the bidding package for the 05 BW Hai Duong Project, which has a total construction area of 63,000sqm and three 35,000sqm factories.


The 05 BW Hai Duong project’s located in Vietnam Singapore Industrial Park (VSIP)

In Vietnam, industrial real estate is a rapidly expanding industry. The demand of big domestic and foreign corporations on leasing land and factories shows no signs of abating. BW was successful in leasing ready-built factories with international standards in the major industrial parks in Vietnam for industrial development.

BW currently owns 600 hectares of land in 8 provinces with 30 projects. In particular,  08 BW Thoi Hoa project was implemented and handed over by General Contractor Newtecons, confirming the General Contractor’s quality and prestige and making preparations for this collaboration.

the 05 BW Hai Duong project was officially launched on December 29, 2021 with the participation of representatives of the Investor, General Contractor Newtecons and representatives of the supervisor, the Vietnam Institute For Building Science And Technology (IBST).

Mr. Michael Chan, BW Investor’s Sales Manager for the North Region, said at the ceremony, “Congratulations to Newtecons on becoming the General Contractor of this project.” This is the first time BW and Newtecons have collaborated in the Northern region. BW plans to construct an additional 1 million m2 of the factory for lease in 2022, Newtecons is one of the General Contractors that BW has always trusted; there will undoubtedly be many more opportunities for collaboration in the future.

Mr. Hoang Phuong Lam, CEO of Newtecons, thanks to the Investor’s message of long-term cooperation, “As a general contractor, Newtecons will do its best to ensure the project successfully finish on time, reach to the highest quality and perfect safety. We hope that all stakeholders will work together for completion. I am confident that the project will make significant contributions to Hai Duong’s economic development.”

Many quality criterias are specified for the construction of  leasing factories, requiring the general contractor to assure everything from the roof height to the foundation load to the power supply, water and wastewater treatment systems, etc. One of the most significant criteria is the supper flat floor standard, which needs the General Contractor to have rich experience in order to complete.

Newtecons has proven its ability through several leasing factory projects under standard pressure from three parties: the Investor, the Supervisor, and the Lessee. Understanding the lessee’s requirements, cooperating with the Investor, Newtecons always has a plan to ensure current international standards, meet the lessee’s needs with the optimal solution for design and construction.

BW is expected to become Vietnam’s leading rental industrial real estate unit, contributing significantly to the development of the field as well as the country’s overall economic development. Newtecons is pleased to collaborate with BW on leasing factory projects that meet international standards.

The post THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF THE 05 BW HAI DUONG PROJECT – EXPANDING THE STRATEGYTO ACHIEVE THE GLOBAL RANKING appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> At the recent online awards ceremony, Anphabe – Pioneer consulting firm providing Employer Brand & Happy Workforce solutions, announced the list of “TOP 50 VIETNAMESE COMPANIES WITH ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYER BRAND 2021”. Newtecons is honored to be included in this list.

Attractive Employer Brand is one of the prestigious categories according to the objective assessment of individuals in the same business based on 6 groups of criteria: Salary, Bonus, Welfare; Promotion chances; Culture and Values; Leader team; Quality of Work and Life; Company reputation. Anphabe conducted a poll of 65,000 experienced employees from approximately 600 organizations in 20 different industries around the country in order to present the results of the categories at the awards ceremony.

retained employees by taking practical steps such as creating a professional, comfortable, and friendly working environment, being interested in developing successor teams. In addition, Newtecons is committed to retaining its reputation as the company with the best welfare regime and the remuneration policy in the construction industry.

In 20 years of development, with over 700 employees, generations of Newtecons employees have gotten values from the motto of developing the greatest life for employees and assisting employees in becoming the best version of themselves.

Investing in human resources is an investment in the Company’s current and future success. This philosophy is the foundation that helps Newtecons develop specific and practical action plans for employees. Newtecons Leaders aspire to make the company a second home for its employees, where they may work, achieve personal goals, and dedicate iconic works for life.

Newtecons is one of TOP 100 BEST COMPANIES TO WORK FOR IN ASIA 2021 voted by HR Asia – the leading magazine on Human Resources in Asia.

To achieve ATTRACTIVE EMPLOYER BRAND in 2021, Newtecons would like to thank the Anphabe professional community and the voters. Thank Newtecons people who work hard to build our reputation.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-top-50-vietnamese-companies-with-attractive-employer-brand-2021/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS WON THE BID AND BEGAN CONSTRUCTION ON VIETEL TECHNICAL CENTER IN HOA LAC WITH HIGH TECHNICAL STANDARDS https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-won-the-bid-and-began-construction-on-vietel-technical-center-in-hoa-lac-with-high-technical-standards/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-won-the-bid-and-began-construction-on-vietel-technical-center-in-hoa-lac-with-high-technical-standards/#respond Tue, 18 Jan 2022 04:16:29 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=9744 In the role of General Contractor of M.E.P, Newtecons impressed successfully with the Vietel Technical Center in Hoa Lac Hi-Tech Park, Thach That, Hanoi. This project necessitates adhering to a number of construction standards for international data center, including stringent deployment and operation requirements. Viettel Technical Center in Hoa Lac will be one of the ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS WON THE BID AND BEGAN CONSTRUCTION ON VIETEL TECHNICAL CENTER IN HOA LAC WITH HIGH TECHNICAL STANDARDS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> In the role of General Contractor of M.E.P, Newtecons impressed successfully with the Vietel Technical Center in Hoa Lac Hi-Tech Park, Thach That, Hanoi. This project necessitates adhering to a number of construction standards for international data center, including stringent deployment and operation requirements.

Viettel Technical Center in Hoa Lac will be one of the two largest data storage centers of Viettel in Vietnam after completing and operating, the using area is 21,467sqm including 7 floors.

The groundbreaking ceremony was held on November 29, 2021, establishing a partnership between Newtecons and Viettel Asset Management Company, as well as the project participants: Vietnam Institute For Building Science And Technology (IBST) (Supervisor), Vietnam National Construction Consultants Corporation (VNCC) (Consultant and Design).

Viettel Technical Center in Hoa Lac has the shape of a solid and equally spectacular building block, with square box architecture, non-standard perforated aluminum facade system, and modern and new steel structure system as a highlight. This is a typical project with a combination of technical and artistic features.

Although construction without the basement, the project has a complex structure that necessitates the use of construction techniques appropriate for a two-story structure. In which the installation of technical equipment systems; big oil tanksand water tanks with the size more than 70m in length and -7.5m in depth that is supported by a ground structure ranging from 6-9m in height.

Viettel Technical Center in Hoa Lac is expected to complete in September 2022 in accordance with the most severe construction and acceptance criteria. The M.E.P system implemented by Newtecons meets the construction criteria of adata center and plays a critical role in terms of operational safety, security, and self-convenience.

Some important items such as air conditioner to ensure stable temperature for servers and equipment; redundant connection system; security and surveillance systems; The power supply system meets international standards… Newtecons has been focusing on and following all these projects from the start to coordinate construction and assure project quality.

Viettel Technical Center in Hoa Lac is the next project in Newtecons’ journey of creating iconic works, confirming our position and role as Vietnam’s leading General Contractor. We look forward to the appearance of a major data center in September 2022.

The post NEWTECONS WON THE BID AND BEGAN CONSTRUCTION ON VIETEL TECHNICAL CENTER IN HOA LAC WITH HIGH TECHNICAL STANDARDS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-won-the-bid-and-began-construction-on-vietel-technical-center-in-hoa-lac-with-high-technical-standards/feed/ 0 THE SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF M GARDEN CITY DA NANG PROJECT HAS COMPLETED THE CANTILEVER BEAM WITH SOPHISTICATED TECHNIQUES. https://newtecons.vn/en/the-site-management-team-of-m-garden-city-project-has-completed-the-cantilever-beam-with-sophisticated-techniques/ https://newtecons.vn/en/the-site-management-team-of-m-garden-city-project-has-completed-the-cantilever-beam-with-sophisticated-techniques/#respond Mon, 10 Jan 2022 02:01:30 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=9748 Recently, the site management team of the M Garden City Da Nang project successfully completed the main and most difficult load-bearing transfer beam system, which is the “backbone” of the project, under rainy weather. The post THE SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF M GARDEN CITY DA NANG PROJECT HAS COMPLETED THE CANTILEVER BEAM WITH SOPHISTICATED TECHNIQUES. appeared first on Newtecons.

]]>

Recently, the site management team of the M Garden City Da Nang project successfully completed the main and most difficult load-bearing transfer beam system, which is the “backbone” of the project, under rainy weather.

The largest transfer beam is 2650m x 2500m with 3 cantilever beams at 8.75m long. This important floor transfer beam system has a floor area of 810m2 with countless complex structural details, a fairface concrete surface, using a total volume of 730m3 of concrete.

Long-term effects include the COVID-19 epidemic, increased raw material prices, negative factors from surrounding works, designs, and complex architectural details, the site management team has devoted all their hearts, researched difficult techniques, and made efforts to keep the project on schedule, comply with safety, and ensure the quality.

M Garden City Danang was evaluated by Archdaily as one of the green, large-scale, and unique projects in the world and excellently won the best hotel architectural design award organized by PropertyGuru Awards (Singapore).

]]>

In mid-November 2021, Asiana Danang successfully completed the ground floor, 1 month ahead of schedule, under the strict supervision of the project management, the highly focused spirit of the site management team, and the fast construction speed of General Contractor Newtecons.

The basement and floor, with a total floor area of up to 4,300 m2, are constructed by the semi-topdown method.This is an advanced construction method that shortens the schedule, ensures safety, and facilitates regular and rigorous quality testing.

The Asiana Danang project has a special structure with a complex facade system, including 3 basements, 2 podiums, and 33 floors. Besides the advantages of location and sea view, the Asiana Danang project is also strongly marked by complicated construction techniques, applying the most advanced technologies.

The rapid formation of the project has created momentum for Northwest Danang real estate. Asiana Danang was honored as the best apartment project (Best Condo Development) at the PropertyGuru Vietnam Property Awards 2020.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/asiana-da-nang-completed-ahead-of-scheduel-the-flooring-with-a-total-area-of-4300m2/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS BEGAN WORK ON THE DAKMIL COMMERCIAL CENTER PROJECT ON THE SITE OF ROUGHLY 30,000M2 https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-began-work-on-the-dakmil-commercial-center-project-on-the-site-of-roughly-30000m2/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-began-work-on-the-dakmil-commercial-center-project-on-the-site-of-roughly-30000m2/#respond Fri, 07 Jan 2022 07:47:21 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=9743 Dak Mil Trade Center is a project invested by Vegetables Import Export Joint Stock Company (under T&T Group), and Newtecons is assigned as the General Contractor. This is a leveraged initiative that promotes the development of a complex entertainment and commercial center model in Dak Nong province in particular and the Central Highlands region in ... The post NEWTECONS BEGAN WORK ON THE DAKMIL COMMERCIAL CENTER PROJECT ON THE SITE OF ROUGHLY 30,000M2 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Dak Mil Trade Center is a project invested by Vegetables Import Export Joint Stock Company (under T&T Group), and Newtecons is assigned as the General Contractor. This is a leveraged initiative that promotes the development of a complex entertainment and commercial center model in Dak Nong province in particular and the Central Highlands region in general.

Dak Mil Center has built on an area of 4,545m2, a floor space of roughly 30,000m2 with 5 floors and 1 basement – its modest size produces resonance in terms of the urban landscape and harmonious aesthetic of the building.

The groundbreaking ceremony for the Dak Mil Center project was held on December 24, 2021, with leaders from T&T Group and General Contractor Newtecons in attendance.

Dak Mil Center is a significant project that demonstrates the investor T&T Group’s vision as well as Newtecons’ construction capabilities. These two variables combine to create a project that transforms the appearance of Dak Nong province, contributes to local growth, and raises people’s living standards.

The project ensures stringent technical requirements as well as a distinct and new aesthetic – a prominent piece on National Highway 14, with a modern but culturally relevant design. On the 4th and 5th floors, there are over one hundred four-star hotel rooms, as well as integrated shopping malls, theaters, restaurants, bars, and conference spaces.

Dak Mil Center is near to a residential area, so proper solutions must be implemented during the development process to avoid harming adjacent works. Many high-grade materials are used in the project, which necessitates advanced processing abilities to assure technical and aesthetic factors.

Newtecons is delighted to contribute its expertise to making a convenient destination, attracting visitors, engaging investors, and allowing for long-term development in the area. On Newtecons Media channels, the progress of the Dak Mil Center project – Dakmil Center will be updated on a regular basis.

The post NEWTECONS BEGAN WORK ON THE DAKMIL COMMERCIAL CENTER PROJECT ON THE SITE OF ROUGHLY 30,000M2 appeared first on Newtecons.

The post CELEBRATE CHRISTMAS EVE NEWTECONS PEOPLE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons people have become closer by engaging and spreading activities in the midst of the hectic atmosphere of the final days of the year. Each present, each activity organized by Newtecons demonstrates the Board of Directors’ attention to employees and the cohesion of the Newtecons people.

The Christmas tree was decorated early at Newtecons’ new headquarters so that staff could “check in” and enjoy the festive mood. The Union Executive Board prepared Christmas celebrations with mini games for all to exchange and relax, as well as to save nice memories with dear colleagues.

Christmas is one of the most important holidays for Christians. As a result, the Administration Department has carefully prepared the gifts before delivering it to each building site. The employees who are Christians are given the day off on December 25 to fully enjoy this important and meaningful holiday.

The employees from departments/construction sites also enthusiastically participated in the Communication Department’s contest “XMAS – XFUN: Double the Joy of Christmas” with sparkling photos and sweet and funny comments. This is the activity that exemplifies Newtecons’ philosophy of “work hard, play hard.”

The employees themselves plan and participate in these activities. This is the “glue” that sticks Newtecons people together across the country, from workplaces to construction sites.

When winter arrives, the most meaningful thing is neither a warm coat because the weather in some locations is still warm, nor the gleaming appearance because we cannot always afford glamorous Christmas decorations. The most important thing is the moment we are together, and Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.

Wish all Newtecons employees a calm, joyful, and healthy holiday season to enter the New Year in 2022.

]]> Enormous efforts and determination of Newtecons Site Management Team have made up  a modern technical infrastructure system at  Waterpoint project.

Located in Ben Luc, Long An, Waterpoint project boasts a living environment close to the nature, rivers and provide residents with a wide variety of facilities to live, study, work and entertain comfortably as in satellite urban models in the world.

Technical infrastructure works implemented by the Project Team help to connect residential communities in the whole area. The newly builds straight roads will connect schools, hospitals and other urban areas in the future.

Once again, congratulations to all project team.

]]> The Nine – a magnificent project located at the heart of Hanoi Capital is being completed by Newtecons Site Management Team to hand over in early 2022.

Long harsh days on site with scorching daytime of typical Hanoi summer and numerous white nights to supervise floors’ concreting now have resulted in the formation of this proud 30 storey high-rise building.

In addition to that, the success of this project also consolidates the good relationship between Newtecons and GP. Invest, enhace chances of mutual coorperation in future projects.

The post NEWTECONS WAS AWARDED BEST COMPANIES TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2021 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Recently in Singapore, Newtecons and more than 100 Vietnam based companies were honored as Best Companies to Work for in Asia 2021, an annual award held by HR Asia – a leading journal on Human Resources in Asia.

This award recognizes Newtecons’ progress of actively engaging employees, teams and leaders; executing outstanding personnel policies and attractive compensation and welfare policies and regularly organizing appealing team building activities. HR Asia appreciates Newtecons’ flexibility in facing and dealing with obstacles and uncertainties during the pandemic, especially when social distancing continues to disrupt business on global scale.

 

HR Asia’s survey result revealed vigorous efforts and unyielding spirit of all employees toward  common goals. Most of interviewees chose answers such as “We are willing to support our colleagues when they need our help”, “I will strive harder to achieve common goals of the company”; “I am constantly looking for ways to improve my performance and contribute to this organization.”

 

During straight 18 years of establishment and development, Newtecons has strived to affirm its position as the No. 1 General Contractor in Vietnam, appreciated trust and integrity as core values to attract talents and encourage our people to dedicate at their best for the ultimate benefits of our society. We have built a corporate culture based on 5 core values: Integrity – Unity – Trust – Optimization – Creativity. At the same time, we have built an unique working environment according to 6 principles: Transparency – Fairness – Cooperation – Sincerity – Enthusiasm – Professionalism.

 

Newtecons is known as one of the companies with best working environment and employee benefits policies in construction industry, and was voted by HR Asia Award as one of the best companies to work for in Asia for many consecutive years. Each employee always considers the success of Newtecons as the success and legacy of their own, thus never stop learning and developing themselves.

 

Thousand days in one direction, thousands of people with one heart, all employees consider Newtecons as their second family, commited and dedicated to deliver their best performance and together reach new heights in their career.  Not only focus on business scale, we always set business goals  next to the mission of creating value for partners, clients and society, and at the same time build a fulfilling working environment for our people.

The post NEWTECONS WAS AWARDED BEST COMPANIES TO WORK FOR IN ASIA IN 2021 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> After months of hard work on construction site, the Site Management Team has successfully accomplished the No.8 – BW Thoi Hoa project within hand-over schedule.

The Site Management Team started this project at the end of December, 2020. This project has a total area of over 87,000 sqm, including four warehouses of 16,800 sqm each and one warehouse of 20,000 sqm.

During 8 months of construction, the Site Management Team has met all strict standards from the Client. The quality of all items such as structural works, finishing, MEP, utility, landscaping and superflat floors were highly appreciated both technically and aesthetically.

After being put into operation, the No.8 – BW Thoi Hoa Project will contribute to the development of industrial real estate sector of Binh Duong Province in particular and of the whole country in general.

The post NEWTECCONS WON THE BID FOR FLORA MIZUKI MP6-7-8 PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Following its string of successes, good news came to Newtecons when it won the bid for Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 Project. Newtecons would be the General contractor, performing basement, structural, finishing, MEP and landscape works with the total value of nearly 950 billion VND.

With its solid reputation and exceptional quality, Newtecons would work along with the Employer to establish the ideal living space at Flora Mizuki MP6-708 Project. Flora Mizuki buildings are to be built in zic zac line to maximize the space between the apartments. Moreover, with its landscape works at the project, Newtecons will bring in green nature and harmonious, peaceful atmosphere to the living space of future residents.

The project locates in Mizuki Park Urban Area of 26 hectares and on Nguyen Van Linh Boulevard, Binh Hung Commune, Binh Chanh District, Ho Chi Minh City. The canal district apartments – this name is given for a reason: on one side, the apartment buildings lie along the central canals with a system of green parks, right next to Event Park square & Japanese gardens and on the other side, they are faced with school area – which would be built in the future.

Newteccons is expected to complete the construction process for Flora Mizuki MP6-7-8 project within 19 months, building over 750 apartments and modern facilities such as viewing stations, multi-purpose work space, outdoor lounges, BBQ areas, swimming pools, fitness centre, indoor playground….

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newteccons-won-the-bid-for-flora-mizuki-mp6-7-8-project/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS WON THE BID – FULBRIGHT UNIVERSITY VIETNAM PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-won-the-bid-fulbright-university-vietnam-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-won-the-bid-fulbright-university-vietnam-project/#respond Mon, 28 Jun 2021 02:18:52 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=8067 With the prestige and experience in participating in various projects across the country, especially in education projects, Newtecons is trusted by the investor to be selected as the General Contractor of Design & Construction of Fulbright University Vietnam. The post NEWTECONS WON THE BID – FULBRIGHT UNIVERSITY VIETNAM PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> With the prestige and experience in participating in various projects across the country, especially in education projects, Newtecons is trusted by the investor to be selected as the General Contractor of Design & Construction of Fulbright University Vietnam.

Fulbright University Vietnam project is built on a 15- Ha land in Saigon High Tech Park. Upon completion, the project will become a modern space for studying, teaching, training and researching for thousands of local and international students.

Currently, Newtecons is preparing the best in all aspects such as a team of experienced Steering Committees who have participated in international standard constructions; modern construction equipments, and machines to enter the construction phase.

In the first phase, the Steering Committee will build dormitories, lecture halls, and a central lawn – a green space for students’ outdoor learning and entertainment activities.

At the main gate building of Fulbright University Vietnam headquarters located at the head of the lawn will house a distinctive amphitheater at its core, as well as the student center and library. A network of pedestrian streets will extend out from the lawn and the main building, all paths will reach focal-point buildings designed to host quintessential college facilities such as galleries, theaters, or a gymnasium. The convergence of two thoroughfares forms a wedge-shaped dormitory with student dining on the ground floor. The remaining compound buildings will expand in subsequent phases of construction.

It is known that Fulbright University Vietnam headquarters is built based on sustainable standards, achieving the standards of LEED (Green building rating systems developed by U.S. Green Building Council). USA) and LOTUS (Green building rating systems in Vietnam).

Dam Bich Thuy, President of Fulbright University Vietnam said: “We at Fulbright are excited to see the efforts of planning, fundraising and negotiation merge into this realization. The university has always made a priority of providing competencies-based, experiential learning opportunities for our students. This flagship campus affords us opportunities for growth through innovative, newer technologies, and through flexible learning spaces”.

According to Fulbright

Around the project are prominent ... Read more

The post ONE CENTRAL HCM – NEW ARCHITECTURE ICONS IN THE CENTER OF HO CHI MINH CITY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> One Central HCM is a luxury apartment project combining 6-star trade in services, located in the prime location in the center of Saigon: 4 fronts of Le Thi Hong Gam Street – Calmette – Pham Ngu Lao – Pho Duc Chinh, opposite Ben Thanh Market and Ben Thanh Metro Station. Around the project are prominent landmarks of the city such as: Ben Thanh Market, Art Museum, September 23 Park,… frequent destinations of domestic and international tourists.

One Central HCM comprises two towers of 47 and 56 storeys high invested by Saigon Glory Co., Ltd, Masterise Group develops the project and Newtecons is the main contractor. Two towers are interconnected by a podium and separated independently. The 56-storeys West Tower includes offices and hotels. The 47-storeys East Tower consists of apartments, with the services provided by the hotel through connecting the base and basement. Especially at base floor B1, directly connecting 2 locations with Metro Tunnel.

Known as a project owning a 6-star standard internal utility system with 9-storeys commercial center, 6-star hotels area, overflow swimming pool with panoramic view, internal park, premium spa & gymnasium area,… Along with the unique design, One Central HCM will become an architectural highlight and a symbolic work of Ho Chi Minh City after completion.

The post ONE CENTRAL HCM – NEW ARCHITECTURE ICONS IN THE CENTER OF HO CHI MINH CITY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/one-central-hcm-bieu-tuong-kien-truc-moi-tai-trung-tam-tp-hcm/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS AND AN GIA GROUP OFFICIALLY TOP OUT THE SONG PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-and-an-gia-group-officially-top-out-the-song-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-and-an-gia-group-officially-top-out-the-song-project/#respond Sat, 15 May 2021 02:10:10 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=8064 [Vung Tau, May 15, 2021] Newtecons officially top out The Song project (Vung Tau). The hard work of the project committee in the face of harsh construction conditions has paid off with the formation of a successful project that fully meets the criteria of quality, safety, and progress. In addition, the ceremony also marked the ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS AND AN GIA GROUP OFFICIALLY TOP OUT THE SONG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Vung Tau, May 15, 2021] Newtecons officially top out The Song project (Vung Tau). The hard work of the project committee in the face of harsh construction conditions has paid off with the formation of a successful project that fully meets the criteria of quality, safety, and progress. In addition, the ceremony also marked the close cooperation between Newtecons and An Gia Real Estate Group.

Officially started in the fourth quarter of 2019, as the General Contractor, Newtecons has planned and implemented the entire The Song project technically and professionally. With the experience of implementing many large-scale, high building projects, especially high-class projects that require outstanding quality, Newtecons focuses all resources to accompany An Gia Real Estate Group to implement a successful The Song project. During the implementation process, Newtecons always uses materials and equipment from reputable brands in the market, focusing on human resources to ensure the committed schedule. The topping out of The Song project is a milestone marking the efforts of hundreds of engineers and workers directly involved in the construction of the project.

As the first 5-star tourist apartment complex in Vung Tau, The Song project provides the market with more than 1,500 apartments and a series of high-class facilities. Notably, The Song was honored to receive double awards at the Vietnam Property Awards 2019 in 2 categories: Best Condo Architectural Design and Best Condo Interior Design. On the top of the building, An Gia has “impressively” built an infinity pool with a length is nearly 50m. Surrounding the pool is a giant Sky Bar at an altitude of more than 100m. To ensure privacy for the entire hotel area, this Sky Bar is equipped with a private outdoor Panorama glass elevator.

The project has an architectural design to shape the exterior with many slanted and corrugated wings, which is difficult to construct, so it requires a thorough construction process, a close combination of structure, and finishing to ensure high aesthetics. The solution of light adobe bricks is applied in this project and occupies 85% of the wall area to reduce the load on the building. Despite construction in difficult conditions due to high winds and harsh climate typical of the sea, Newtecons still ensures the progress and 5-star quality of the project.

Currently, The Song is the largest and tallest apartment complex in Vung Tau. The Song is planned on a total area of more than 8,500 m2, construction density of 40%. Once completed, the project will be a new symbol of Vung Tau city with a height of 36 floors. 

The Song is a project with smart design, ensuring that all apartments have a wonderful view of: Vung Tau beach, Paradise Golf Course, Christ statue, city center at night or a beautiful internal park. In addition, The Song also owns a unique architecture inspired by the winding waves of the sea. This design helps the project retain its softness and sophistication, completely different from the rough architecture of most buildings in Vung Tau today.

Sharing the reasons and expectations of An Gia Real Estate Group in choosing Newtecons as a strategic partner of The Song project, An Gia representative said: “We always cooperate with reputable and experienced partners and contractors to implement An Gia’s projects, ensuring quality according to international standards. We believe that, with the companionship of General Contractor Newtecons, The Song project quality will be beyond expectations, on schedule, and feel assured to customers.

Newtecons General Contractor is focusing on completing the project with the best quality days and nights, together with An Gia Real Estate Group to accelerate the completion of items to soon hand over to residents.

The post NEWTECONS AND AN GIA GROUP OFFICIALLY TOP OUT THE SONG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-and-an-gia-group-officially-top-out-the-song-project/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION AS VIETNAM’S TOP PRESTIGE GENERAL CONTRACTOR https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-affirms-its-position-as-vietnams-top-prestige-general-contractor/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-affirms-its-position-as-vietnams-top-prestige-general-contractor/#respond Wed, 28 Apr 2021 01:47:23 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/?p=8048 In the afternoon, April 27, at Sheraton Hotel, Hanoi city, Ceremony to announce the list of Top 500 fastest growing enterprises in Vietnam in 2021 (FAST500), the list of top 10 prestigious Real estate, Construction and Building materials Companies in 2021. It was held by Vietnam Report (VNR) and VietNamNet Newspaper – Ministry of Information ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION AS VIETNAM’S TOP PRESTIGE GENERAL CONTRACTOR appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> In the afternoon, April 27, at Sheraton Hotel, Hanoi city, Ceremony to announce the list of Top 500 fastest growing enterprises in Vietnam in 2021 (FAST500), the list of top 10 prestigious Real estate, Construction and Building materials Companies in 2021.

It was held by Vietnam Report (VNR) and VietNamNet Newspaper – Ministry of Information and Communications. Newtecons was proud to be honored in Top 10 Most Reputable Building Contractors in 2021 and Top 50 Best Growing Enterprises in Vietnam.

The ranking of “Top 10 Most Reputable Real Estate – Construction – Building Materials Companies” is a result based on independent research and evaluation by Vietnam Report. The enterprises honored in the list are all effective, experienced, well-positioned in the sector. They have positive contributions to the development of the industry and are trusted brands by many people in the market.

According to Vietnam Report, in recent years, the socio-economic situation in many countries around the world has fluctuated, even Vietnam. The world economy is forecasted to experience the most serious recession in history, the growth of major economies has declined deeply due to negative effects of the Covid-19 pandemic. However, Vietnam’s economy still maintained impressive growth in this context, with GDP growth estimated to increase by 2.91%. This is a good sign affirming that many Vietnamese firms still maintain good business activities and high growth potential. Their business is creative and active with high community responsibility, thereby contributing significantly to the overall development of the country’s economy.

In 2020, overcoming many challenges, Newtecons continuously won a series of big projects, applied advanced sciences and technologies for optimization that helps to reduce time and minimize costs, at the same time, ensure the quality and progress of the work, bring the highest benefits to customers and partners.

The year 2021 is determined to be a pivotal and breakthrough year for Newtecons. Newtecons’ Board of Directors has outlined business strategies adaptable for each period. We continuously focus to enhance the solidarity of the workforce, improve construction activities, and keep up with market trends and demands that are the keys to help Newtecons continue to grow and maintain the position of the leading General Contractor in Vietnam, at the same time, bring the Newtecons brand to develop and reach the international market.

The post NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION AS VIETNAM’S TOP PRESTIGE GENERAL CONTRACTOR appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-affirms-its-position-as-vietnams-top-prestige-general-contractor/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS KICK OFF “5 STAR RESORT APARTMENT” ASIANA DA NANG PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-khoi-cong-khu-can-ho-resort-5-sao-asiana-da-nang/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-khoi-cong-khu-can-ho-resort-5-sao-asiana-da-nang/#respond Wed, 28 Apr 2021 01:14:06 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-khoi-cong-khu-can-ho-resort-5-sao-asiana-da-nang/ [Da Nang, April 27 , 2021] The groundbreaking ceremony of Asiana Danang project solemnly held at the project site, Lot 1A, Nguyen Tat Thanh Street, Hoa Hiep Nam Ward, Lien Chieu District, Da Nang city. Newtecons, as the General Contractor, cooperated with the Investor – Gotec Land Group to conduct and welcome representatives of local ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS KICK OFF “5 STAR RESORT APARTMENT” ASIANA DA NANG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Da Nang, April 27 , 2021] The groundbreaking ceremony of Asiana Danang project solemnly held at the project site, Lot 1A, Nguyen Tat Thanh Street, Hoa Hiep Nam Ward, Lien Chieu District, Da Nang city. Newtecons, as the General Contractor, cooperated with the Investor – Gotec Land Group to conduct and welcome representatives of local authorities and more than 200 participants.

Belong the chain of high-end resort apartment projects of Gotec Land Group – TOP 10 typical real estate investor in Vietnam , Asiana Danang is distinguished by its unique and luxurious architecture in the heart of the most “worthy” city for living in Vietnam”. The Groundbreaking Ceremony marks an important milestone in the Investor’s journey to create a symbolic work, a new step full of enthusiasm in the Da Nang.

Asiana Danang luxury apartment complex has the appearance of a 5* resort with 35 floors, 3 basements and 487 apartments for two blocks. The staggered layout creates architectural highlights and makes the most of the viewing angle so that 100% of the apartments have sea views, natural light, and efficiency in energy saving. Besides, the apartment is also smartly designed, integrating many different utilities in the complex: Infinity pool, private natural yoga floor, unique indoor and outdoor play area, beauty services, relaxing spa and attractive entertainment

Lying on the frontage of Nguyen Tat Thanh Street – which is considered the most beautiful street along beach in Vietnam, Asiana Danang project owns a wonderful view when capturing the whole view of the blue Da Nang Bay and the poetic Ba Na mountain, and the majestic Hai Van Pass.

Said by Mr. Florent Isnard – Design Director of Huni Vietnam Co., Ltd – Huni Architectes: “Asiana Danang is considered as one of the projects with the most unique and different design in the region. The design idea is formed from the image of a bamboo rampart, a special and close image to each person’s mind. Characteristic images such as bamboo joint, bamboo shoots, bamboo leaves… are incorporated into architectural elements gently but deeply in a contemporary direction. At the same time, the day and night lighting effects also highlight the concept of the building as well as the general landscape of the area”.

 

Representative of the operation management unit, Mr. David Jackson – CEO of Colliers Vietnam spoke at the ceremony: “Da Nang has been attracting a lot of resort and residential real estate investors because of its geographical location and favorable weather. As a management consulting unit, we hope that the combination in this project will bring luxurious experiences and satisfaction to investors when choosing Asiana Danang”.

Da Nang is known worldwide as one of the most beautiful beaches on the planet and one of the top resort options in Asia. In recent years, Da Nang has “transformed”, becoming the most modern and dynamic city in Vietnam.

Newtecons is proud to have contributed a part of our efforts to the development of Da Nang city since 2006 with a series of famous projects. Currently, accompanying Gotec Land Group to build the high-class Asiana Danang project, Newtecons is committed to investing in the most professional human resources and the most modern materials to implement the project on schedule with high quality, continue to make its mark on the map of Da Nang city with iconic works.

With the cooperateion between Newtecons and Gotec Land Group, Asiana Danang promises to be one of the most prestigious and classy projects in the region, a great place to relax and ejnoy life like a 5* resort, a perfect choice for domestic and foreign tourists.

According to Asiana Danang

The post DEPUTY PRIME MINISTER TRINH DINH DUNG VISITED THE NINE PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Hanoi, March 30, 2021] Deputy Prime Minister Trinh Dinh Dung had a working session with the Vietnam Association of Construction Contractors and visited some key projects that the Association’s members are implementing in Hanoi. In particular, The Nine project by Newtecons at the role of General Contractor was honored to welcome the Deputy Prime Minister.

After the report of the Chairman of the Vietnam Association of Construction Contractors, Deputy Prime Minister Trinh Dinh Dung recognized the important contributions of construction contractors in the socio-economic development of our country. “In recent years, Vietnam’s construction sector has developed strongly, approaching advanced construction techniques of the region and the world; Contributing to change the context of the country through large and key construction projects in urban areas, industry, civil works, and many other service works. Vietnamese contractors have affirmed their important role in this process,” said by Deputy Prime Minister Trinh Dinh Dung.

After visiting, quality inspecting of many big construction projects performed by Vietnamese contractors; in particular, visiting The Nine project site (Investor – GP.Invest; General contractor – Newtecons) in the morning on March 30, Deputy Prime Minister Trinh Dinh Dung affirmed the capacity of technology, equipment and people of the Vietnamese contractors completely meet the requirements of large-scale projects which require high technology levels.

“Based on available capacity and experience, the contractors need to continually restructure, improve governance efficiency, focus on human resource training, innovate technologies to reduce costs, increase the business competitiveness and the construction sector in Vietnam,” said the Deputy Prime Minister.

The Deputy Prime Minister emphasized that the Vietnamese constructors have many opportunities and favorable conditions for development currently. Vietnam’s total social investment is approximately 34% of GDP, of which construction investment accounts for about 70%. This shows that the workload of the construction sector in the future will be very large. This is both an opportunity and a big challenge for domestic contractors, especially in the context of international economic integration.

In the solemn meeting with the Deputy Prime Minister, representatives of Newtecons Board of Directors and The Nine Project Board committed to grow the role of a reputable, professional, and fair General Contractor in the construction sector, contribute to economic development as the expectation of Deputy Prime Minister.

Swan Smart Logistics Long An is located in Phu An Thanh Industrial Park, Ben Luc District, Long An Province, with a strategic traffic location when only 3km from Saigon-Trung Luong Expressway, quickly connecting with main roads such as: Nguyen Van Linh Boulevard, East-West Boulevard to the center of Ho Chi Minh City and Cat Lai port. Newtecons is the General Contractor of Design and Build (Design & Build) project with a total value over 900 billion VND.
