The post NEWTECONS BREAKING GROUND FOR THE FIRST PROJECT OF LUXURY BRAND MARRIOTT IN VIETNAM appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [HCMC, March 24, 2021] The groundbreaking ceremony of Grand Marina, Saigon – the first real-estate project of luxury brand Marriott in Vietnam was solemnly held by international real- estate contractor Masterise Homes at the construction site of the project, No. 2 Ton Duc Thang Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City.

Newtecons was honoured to accompany Masterise Homes in the role of Main Contractor of this super project. Grand Marina, Saigon included an apartment project with two brands of Marriott and JW Marriott, this project is also a master-planned complex with a large public park, riverside walkways, and a high-class marina, reaches the mission of a super project located in the most favourable position in Saigon.

Mr. Jason Turnbull – Deputy Managing Director cum Chief Financial Officer of Masterise Homes shared: “We are proud to be the pioneer to bring the luxury real estate to Vietnam and introduce Grand Marina, Saigon – a project with a global guarantee brand, a legacy left for many future generations, creating world-class architectural works with international quality and worthy experiences, contributing to the prosperity of the community and society”.

With the good cooperation in many previous projects between Newtecons and Masterise Homes, having a rich background of experience in implementing large-scale projects, understanding the strict standards of world-class projects, Newtecons commits to manage and implement the project under safety, high quality, and on schedule.

Luxury Real Estate Project – Grand Marina, Saigon has a favorable location on the banks of the maleficent Saigon River. The groundbreaking ceremony is an important milestone, marking the beginning of the journey to create a new symbol of Ho Chi Minh City and Vietnam, this city is becoming the new commercial and cultural center of the whole region, enhance its position and prestige in the international arena.

With an area of up to 10 hectares, it owns an 850m-long wooden promenade winding around the historic river, public green gardens that are cared for and artistically shaped, and masterpiece buildings. Architecture, Grand Marina, Saigon itself is a world with a completely different top-class living only for its residents, bringing together all the world-class relaxation and entertainment facilities.

Mr. Shawn Hill – Senior Vice President – In charge of Asia Pacific, Marriott International said that the Grand Marina project, Saigon will be strictly controlled at every stage from design, construction quality inspection to management after completion according to the strict standards of the world’s largest hotel brand.

Hopefully, female staff of Newtecons in particular and all of company’s employees in general will keep the faith in making contribution and regard Newtecons company as their second home.

The post THE DEWEY SCHOOLS – INTERNATIONAL GREEN BUILDING CONSTRUCTED BY NEWTECONS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The Dewey Schools – a project that certified the international Green Building after being put into operation, has recorded satisfaction and positive effects from parents and students studying there. At the same time, Newtecons, as a General Contractor has received much praise and trust from the Investor – Edufit Education Group. 

The Dewey Schools is built on an area of about 20,000 m2 with 04 blocks including 5 floors and 02 basements for each, a total of 126 classes, a system of function rooms and a large utility complex such as a 4-season swimming pool that meet the Aquatots standard of swimming school (USA), music room, creative studio, etc. In the role of the general contractor, Newtecons has synchronously combined the implementation of Construction and M&E packages at the beginning of the project. This coordination helps shorten the project schedule and maximizes management costs for the Investor. During the project, the quality is always guaranteed, ensure to meet the urgent construction schedule, the Newtecons Management Board has implemented many specialized construction measures, applying BIM to limit the risks of conflicts. and strictly control the construction progress in each stage.

The success of The Dewey Schools project is the foundation for the development of a good relationship between Newtecons and Edufit Education Group in the implementation of future projects.

The post NEWTECONS COMMENCED M GARDEN CITY DA NANG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> (Da Nang city, 27/2/2021) The groundbreaking ceremony of M Garden City hotel was highly successful. The ceremony was honored to welcome the presence of Developer’s representative – Vu Ha Anh Tourism and Services Company Limited; representative of General Contractor – Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company and design consultant, supervision consultant, suppliers in this project.

At the ceremony, Newtecons is put the faith by the Developer and assigned the responsibility of General Contractor. Representative of Newtecons, Mr. Tran Kim Long– General Director confirms capability and reputation of one of the top general contractors in the country, M Garden City will soon be under construction meeting quality, safety, progress to hand over the Investor.

M Garden City Hotel is comprised of 25 floors and 3 basements, located in the center of high-rise buildings projects along the coast of Da Nang city. The front is facing the East, next to Vo Nguyen Giap coastline, which is 43 meters wide, the back is facing the West heading towards the city center next to the main roads. The construction is designed with a moving pattern of vegetation from the first floor garden twisting into every room, going deeply into the living room of the hotel, in combination with concrete construction Fair-Face which are various to each floor with unlimited sand pool on the rooftop. Especially, on July 2020, the construction was evaluated by Archdaily* to be one of green projects, big scope and exotic in the world and excellent which received the best hotel architecture design organized by Property Guru Awards (Singapore).

The post NEWTECONS HANDOVER DEWEY SCHOOL PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On January 25, Newtecons officially handed over the project of International School PTLC Dewey Tay Ho Tay. The project is located in Tay Ho Tay urban center, Bac Tu Liem district, Hanoi. This is one of the most modern and classy buildings among the projects of the Dewey school system.

The project is built on an area over 20,000 m2 with 04 blocks, including 5 floors and 02 basements for each, a total of 126 classes, a system of function rooms and a large utility complex, such as a 4-season swimming pool that meet the Aquatots standard of swimming school (USA). Upon completion, Dewey School will definitely become a new school with modern, safe, international-standard facilities, inspiring training activities and learning experiences.

As the general contractor, Newtecons has synchronously combined the implementation of Construction and M&E packages at the beginning of the project. This coordination helps shorten the project schedule and maximizes management costs for the Investor. During the project, quality is always guaranteed.

To comply to meet the urgent construction schedule, the Newtecons Management Board has implemented many specialized construction measures, applying BIM to limit the risks of conflicts, and strictly control the construction progress in each stage.

The success of Dewey School project is the foundation for the development of the relationship between Newtecons and the Investor in the implementation of future projects.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-handover-dewey-school-project/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS AND T&T COMMENCE KEY PROJECT IN AN GIANG PROVINCE https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-and-tt-commence-key-project-in-an-giang-province/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-and-tt-commence-key-project-in-an-giang-province/#respond Mon, 18 Jan 2021 01:58:35 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-and-tt-commence-key-project-in-an-giang-province/ On January 10th, Newtecons in cooperation with Vinh Thien Da Nang Co., Ltd. This is set to be the most significant real estate project commenced in the Mekong Delta since this ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS AND T&T COMMENCE KEY PROJECT IN AN GIANG PROVINCE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On January 10th, Newtecons in cooperation with Vinh Thien Da Nang Co., Ltd. (a member of T&T Group) held a ground-breaking ceremony to commence construction of a key residential complex at Long Xuyen city, An Giang Province. This is set to be the most significant real estate project commenced in the Mekong Delta since this year.

The commencement ceremony was honored to have the presence of leadership of An Giang Province along with Mr. Do Quang Hien – Chairman and CEO of T&T Group and Mr. Tran Kim Long – General Director of Newtecons.

The project located in My Binh ward, covers an area of 3.5 hectares with investment capital of nearly VND2.4 trillion (US$103 million). Once completed, the residential complex will consist of 118 apartments along with other modern facilities, including hotels, shopping and conference centers. Under the project design, 40% of the land area will be used for civic infrastructure, including parks, transportation system and public facilities, which are expected to promote a green life-style in An Giang province.

Chairman of An Giang province People’s Committee Nguyen Thanh Binh shared his expectation of the mixed-use complex combining commercial services with the design of “The magnificent European street on the Hau Giang line” which is highly anticipated to be the “bright pearl” of the province, a regional destination, and the pride of the local people.

“After the project is completed, a modern mixed use residential and commercial complex will be formed, combining architecture, technical infrastructure, and social infrastructure in a sustainable direction, protecting the environment, and contributing to beautifying the urban landscape with the creation of an architectural highlight. This project will meet the needs of high-class accommodation and modern trade of Long Xuyen city” Mr. Nguyen Anh Tuan, Deputy General Director of T&T Group, emphasized in his speech at the project ground-breaking ceremony.

The commencement of this project is a milestone for Newtecons in An Giang province as the first major project in the region. 2021 has seen a positive beginning for Newtecons, which has seen strong growth in 2020 and this trend continuing in 2021 as Newtecons is recognized as a major General Contractor providing confidence and value-add delivery on many large-scale projects across Vietnam.

The post NEWTECONS COMMENCES PROJECT NO. 8 – BW THOI HOA appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons is proud to be general contractor of project No.8 – BW industrial Thoi Hoa at Road NA2, Thoi Hoa Industrial Park, Thoi Hoa Ward, Ben Cat Town, Binh Duong. This is a factory project invested by BW Industrial Development Corporation, with the scale is 8,4 hectares

Project perspective No. 08 – BW Thoi Hoa

The ceremony was honored with the presence of Ms. Tran Thi Ngoc Thuy – Director of Thoi Hoa Urban and Industrial Development Enterprise, The representative of the Investor, Consulting and key partners of the project.

Project No. 08 is located in My Phuoc 4 industrial zone, Binh Duong province with the scale is 8.4 hectares. The project consists of 05 factories with 04 factories covering an area of 16,000m2 and the other one is 20,000 m2.

Speaking at the groundbreaking ceremony, Mr. Ngo Dinh Ngoc Quang – Operation Director of Newtecons shared, “With an admirable growth rate and the right development strategy, we believe that project No. 08 and other projects of BWID will attract more Customers and Investors”

Recently, the industrial real estate market of Vietnam has been very active with increasing demand for land and factory lease from large domestic and foreign corporations. Facing market opportunities, BW aims to provide international standard ready-built factories for lease and will expand by 200 hectares by 2020.

BW Industrial development JSC. (BW) is founded on a shared vision between Warburg Pincus and Becamex to become the largest industrial platform of industrial factory for rent in Vietnam as well as logistics real estate market generally, providing high quality factory for rent and warehouse for rent.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-commences-project-no-8-bw-thoi-hoa/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS COMMENCED HANOI ADELAIDE SCHOOL – ZONE C PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-commenced-hanoi-adelaide-school-zone-c-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-commenced-hanoi-adelaide-school-zone-c-project/#respond Mon, 28 Dec 2020 04:28:03 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-commenced-hanoi-adelaide-school-zone-c-project/ On the 21st December 2020, Newtecons JSC was proud to celebrate the groundbreaking of HANOI ADELAIDE SCHOOL (H.A.S) – Zone C project being developed by H.A.S. The post NEWTECONS COMMENCED HANOI ADELAIDE SCHOOL – ZONE C PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On the 21st December 2020, Newtecons JSC was proud to celebrate the groundbreaking of HANOI ADELAIDE SCHOOL (H.A.S) – Zone C project being developed by H.A.S. Education Development JSC at Geleximco urban area, Le Trong Tan street, Ha Dong district, Hanoi.

The Zone C is constructed on a total land area of 4,184 m2, with the scale of 04 towers and includes 03 floors, 01 roof and 01 basement. In this project, Newtecons acts as the general contractor of structural construction and finishing, MEP and landscape.

As a leading general contractor who had its name affixed to many high-rise projects across Vietnam, Newtecons committed to the best quality of this project. Hanoi Adelaide School is a part of the Vietnamese national education system, training from primary to high school in the model of two high school diplomas.

The post NEWTECONS JSC IS PROUD TO BE PARTICIPATING IN THE COMPETITION FOR SKILLED CRAFTSMEN IN CONSTRUCTION 2020 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons JSC is proud to be participating in the Vietnam Association of Construction Contractors (VACC) Competition for skilled craftsmen in Construction in 2020 being held on December 8-9, 2020 at Hanoi, Vietnam. Newtecons is proud to have achieved 28 awards, including 12 “Golden hands” – the highest award of the competition.

The event attracted 250 talented craftsmen from 24 prestigious Vietnam contractors to compete over 7 subjects, including: Plastering, Tiling, Reinforcement, Aluminums and glass, Plumbing, High-tech welding, and Electrical systems.

The contest is an important milestone for the construction industry, as well as the opportunity to commend all craftsmen who worked hard to create the modern buildings across Vietnam, “Mr. Nguyen Quoc Hiep, Chairman of VACC, Head of the Organizing Committee said.

In addition, Newtecons is honored to be hosting this event which is being held at The Nine Project, located at Hanoi’s strategic gateway on Pham Van Dong street, and to be participating in all 7 categories of this event.

The Nine is bringing luxurious lifestyle in the heart of the West of the capital. The Nine is currently under construction by Newtecons, and has recently been posted for sale by Savills with an expected handover of Q1/2022.

The post NEWTECONS SIGN LANDMARK AGREEMENT WITH NATIONAL UNIVERSITY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons has signed a landmark agreement with the National University of Civil Engineering to extend the existing internship program, develop new research and technology in the field of construction.

On December 3rd, Newtecons and the National University of Civil Engineering held the signing ceremony enhancing the Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Faculty of Civil Engineering in Hanoi. Newtecons has invested heavily in supporting education with this agreement being the third university that Newtecons has established agreements with in 2020.

This was highlighted by a seminar held during the ceremony to introduce to faculty and students “The Importance of BIM and its application in Newtecons Projects” and the implementation of emerging technologies in construction.

Through cooperation with key universities, Newtecons has built a team of young, enthusiastic and dynamic staff, who lead the implementation and innovation of technology in the field of construction. In the North of Vietnam, many of Newtecons staff are alumni of the National University of Civil Engineering, who chose to continue working with Newtecons after they graduated.

Newtecons is highly regarded in the construction industry of Vietnam and internationally for building high-end projects ranging from industrial, to high end luxury apartments across the country. Currently, Newtecons has many luxury projects in Hanoi which include The Nine, Starlake, Vinhomes Smart city and most recently Masteri Waterfront. This growth has allowed Newtecons to offer great opportunities to graduates looking to begin and develop their careers on exciting and challenging projects.

For further information regarding the opportunities at Newtecons, please visit: https://newtecons.vn/tin-tuyen-dung/

The post NEWTECONS AND VIETRAVEL CELEBRATE THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF THE VIETRAVEL LUXURY TOURISM AND SERVICE COMPLEX PROJECT IN HUE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On November 24th, 2020, The General Contractor – Newtecons JSC and Vietnam Tourism and Transport Marketing Joint Stock Company – Vietravel organized the Groundbreaking Ceremony of the “Vietravel Luxury Tourism and Service Complex Tower” project, locatedat 01 Nguyen Hue, Hue City, Thua Thien Hue province.

The groundbreaking ceremony was attended by Leaders of the People’s Committee of Thua Thien – Hue Province, the People’s Committee of Hue City, Department of Planning and Investment, Department of Construction, Department of Natural Resources and Environment, Department of Tourism, Department of Van Chemistry – Sports along with leaders of departments, branches and unions. Representitives on behalf of the Developer, Vietravel,included Mr. Nguyen Quoc Ky – Chairman of the Board of Directors, Mr. Vo Quang Lien Kha – Member of the Board of Directors cum Deputy General Director, and leaders of affiliated units, together with representatives of Newtecons who has been appointed as the Main Contractor, and the appointed Project management Consultant Bureau Veritas Vietnam Company Limited.

The “Vietravel Luxury Tourism and Service Complex” project is constructed on a total land area of ​​1,015.3 m2, and includes 6 floors, 2 basements, 1 mezzanine with total construction floor area of ​​4,778.4 m2. The total investment of the project is approximately 140 billion VND and is expected to be completed and put into use by the end of 2021. The project will offer a full range of high-end tourism services in Hue city, while retaining the ancient features with its own style.

Speaking at the groundbreaking ceremony, Mr. Nguyen Quoc Ky – Chairman of Vietravel’s Board of Directors affirmed: “This groundbreaking ceremony is one of the most important recent events for both Hue city and Vietravel. This is the first project in a chain of high-end tourism service projects serving Vietravel’s travel ecosystem. When completed and put into operation, the project will contribute to the realization developing the ancient capital of Hue into a tourism and service focal point of the Central region, promoting tourism development, and supporting socio-economic development of the city in the future ”.

The post NEWTECONS AND MASTERISE HOME CELEBRATE THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF THE MASTERI WATERFRONT PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On the 20th November 2020, Newtecons JSC was proud to celebrate the groundbreaking of the Masteri Waterfront project being developed by Masterise Homes in the Vinhomes Ocean Park, Hanoi

At the groundbreaking ceremony, Mr. Jason Turnbull, Deputy General Director cum Chief Financial Officer of Masterise Homes shared how Masteri Waterfront contributed to “heating up” the high-end segment in the Northern market.

“This project demonstrates Masterise Homes’ vision of bringing international standards into development, operation and management of real estate projects in Hanoi through our highly experienced international staff and partners. When completed, the Masteri Waterfront luxury apartment complex will offer a chic  lifestyle to the elite community, ”said Mr. Turnbull.

Located in the center of Vinhomes Ocean Park, Hanoi, Masteri Waterfront has a direct view of the 6.1ha saltwater lake and 24.5ha central park. Residents will enjoy the natural open spaces and the extensive on-site private facilities including extensive landscaped gardens, underwater lounge, aerial garden, indoor swimming pool etc.

Masterise Homes has appointed Newtecons JSC, one of the leading companies in the construction sector in Vietnam, as the General Contractor to the Masteri Waterfront Project and with their extensive experience in implementing large-scale projects is targeting completion of the construction in 2022.

Mr. Tran Kim Long, the General Director of Newtecons spoke about the long relationship that exists between Newtecons and Masterise Homes, having cooperated on many successful projects in the past. With this new project, both parties expect to provide an exceptional quality product, meeting the highest of international standards for future residents.

“Newtecons is fully committed to achieving the highest quality, and to continuing our tradition of delivering the project on schedule, ensuring strict environmental conditions, and absolute safety throughout the construction process”.

Masterise Homes are working with other leading internationals partners in the development of Masteri Waterfront, including architecture by Tange Associates (Japan) interiors by Studio HBA (USA), landscape design by Belt Collins International (USA), and Apave Asia – Pacific, a member of Apave Group (France) for project supervision.

As the first “North-Ahead” project, Masterise Homes champions the philosophy of “Customer is the Focus” to the Hanoi market. Masteri Waterfront project is design is world-class, and expected to be handed over in 2022.

Hanoi, 20th November, 2020

]]> On October 06, 2020, Phu Gia Real Estate Investment Company Limited (Owner) and Newtecons as the General Contractor accomplished the Commencement Ceremony of The Pegasuite II project located in Ward 6, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City.

Developed by Phuong Viet Investment Joint Stock Company (PVInvest), The Pegasuite II is a high-rise apartment complex with 28 upground floors and 1 basement, including simplexes, duplexes, duplexes with garden, shophouses, officetels among other properties. This youthful designed, comfortable and modern building is an ideal living space for young families who desire for a dream home amid the hustle of Ho Chi Minh City

He is completely confident in the competency of Newtecons to satisfy the Owner’s expectations. The project success, above all, is an important premise for the desirable long-lasting cooperation between the two parties.

]]> (Binh Duong, September 30, 2020) Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company coordinated with Japanese BTMJR Investment Company Limited for a successful topping-out ceremony of Sora Gardens II Project. Representatives of the Owner, Consultant and General Contractor cheered for the successful topping-out of the project

Sora Gardens II is built right next to Sora Garden I in Binh Duong Province. This 24-storey and 1-attic high-rise condominium involves Newtecons as the General Contractor and has a gross floor area of up to 90,000m2.

In his speech at the ceremony, Mr. Onuma Minoru – Deputy General Director of Becamex Tokyu – praised the efforts of Newtecons and construction units. Mr. Hoang Phuong Lam – Newtecons CEO spoke at the ceremony

This event is, among others, a proof for the prestige and position of Newtecons. We are confident to meet the strict standards of domestic and foreign Owners.

After the ceremony, Newtecons’ Site Management Board eagerly started off the finishing work to ensure the hand-over schedule in early 2021.

TOWER – A PERFECT LIFE” https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-commenced-project-gp-tower-a-perfect-life/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-commenced-project-gp-tower-a-perfect-life/#respond Sun, 20 Sep 2020 09:51:52 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-commenced-project-gp-tower-a-perfect-life/ Morning September 20, 2020, at the Northwest gateway of Hanoi Capital, a mixed-use building project named GP Tower was commenced under the ownership of GP. The post NEWTECONS COMMENCED PROJECT “GP. TOWER – A PERFECT LIFE” appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Morning September 20, 2020, at the Northwest gateway of Hanoi Capital, a mixed-use building project named GP Tower was commenced under the ownership of GP. Invest Group and involved Newtecons as the general contractor.

GP Tower project is located at the intersection of Pham Van Dong and Doan Ke Thien Streets, on the newly expanded Ring Road 3 of Hanoi City. Standing alone amid a low construction density area, GP Tower boasts a panoramic view of the city since it is not obscured by any sky-scrapers. With a full glass exterior coverage, balcony made of glass walls, and load-bearing concrete walls instead of a column bearing system, every apartment at GP Tower has a stunning panorama view that bears the signature of American luxury apartment design.

In this project, Newtecons acts as the general contractor of structural construction and finishing of 30 upground floors in a period of 16 months. The project, beside an acoustic 2-sided Façade system, is equipped with an air purification system to provide fresh air, deodorize, eliminate toxic gases and filter out dust, protecting the health of residents. The project also has facilities such as 7 trading centres, green space and restaurant on the rooftop.

The Chairman of GP. Invest Group, who has more than 40 years of construction expertise and used to assume key positions in state agencies, is known as a diligent person who takes quality is the secret for the Group’s prosperity and longevity. That is why the selection of construction contractor is paid special attention. The two parties’ partnership in this project proves the trust of a “picky” Owner in Newtecons as the General Contractor.

As a leading general contractor who had its name affixed to many high-rise projects across Vietnam, Newtecons committed to the best quality of this project. The project success will be a testament to the desirable faithful relationship between GP. Invest Group and Newtecons for further cooperation in future projects.

The post NEWTECONS IS LISTED IN THE TOP 5 FASTEST GROWING CONSTRUCTION COMPANIES IN 2020 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> In the construction industry only, Newtecons is the fastest growing private enterprise in Vietnam. The rankings have been recently published by Vietnam Report Joint Stock Company (Vietnam Report) in collaboration with VietNamNet. Newtecons is now ranked 41st in the Top 500 enterprises, according to industry rankings.

Newtecons is honoured to be in the top 5 fastest growing construction companies in 2020

FAST500 rankings are based on the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) in terms of revenue and business performance. Other criteria such as total assets, total labour, profit after tax and corporate media reputation are also used as supporting factors to determine the size and position of a business.

FAST500 appraised that leading enterprises were “rising stars” which made the driving force for the economic growth and contributed to a vibrant healthy competitive environment.

In 2020, Newtecons, backed by its own well-established reputation, connected with domestic customers and partners and expanded the cooperation network with foreign Owners, outperforming other construction companies in terms of business results. This is a testament to the restless efforts of Newtecons in the year, especially against the backdrop of Covid-19 epidemic.

The post PROGRESS OF THE SÓNG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> The Sóng project is invested by An Gia Group. Boasting a prime location on Thi Sach Street adjacent to Thuy Van Beach, the project gains “spotlight” from every domestic and foreign tourists. This 31,000-square-meter project has 36 airy sea-view upground floors, 2 basements, and a plenty of modern facilities.

Overview of The Sóng project

In 2019, Newtecons assumed the role of Design and Construction General Contractor. By far the Project Site Management Board has been working on the 15th floor structural construction, tiling and plastering up to the 6th floor. To cope with strong sea winds in the stormy season, the Site Management Board outlined a variety of proper solutions that assure the construction progress. The Site Management Board also paid special attention to the safety issues during use of scaffolding, materials gathering and electrical work, so as to ensure workers’ safety.

Construction work to the 15th floor

The Site Management Board and the consultant inspected the tiling and plastering of the 3rd floor

Newtecons, empowered by a robust construction capacity and extensively experienced team, will surely complete project of 5-star standard on schedule.

The Site Management Board is determined to assure the project progress, quality and safety

The post PROGRESS OF THE SÓNG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/progress-of-the-song-project/feed/ 0 BINH CHAU – THE CONVERGENCE OF QUINTESSENCES, A HAVEN FOR HEALTH AND PEACE https://newtecons.vn/en/binh-chau-the-convergence-of-quintessences-a-haven-for-health-and-peace/ https://newtecons.vn/en/binh-chau-the-convergence-of-quintessences-a-haven-for-health-and-peace/#respond Tue, 01 Sep 2020 06:13:49 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/binh-chau-the-convergence-of-quintessences-a-haven-for-health-and-peace/ Binh Chau Tourism Area is situated in the middle of a vast primeval forest in Xuyen Moc District, Ba Ria – Vung Tau Province. It is the only one destination in the South Region to have the largest hot springs and mineral mud reserve in Vietnam. It is voted by the World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) ... Read more

The post BINH CHAU – THE CONVERGENCE OF QUINTESSENCES, A HAVEN FOR HEALTH AND PEACE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Binh Chau Tourism Area is situated in the middle of a vast primeval forest in Xuyen Moc District, Ba Ria – Vung Tau Province. It is the only one destination in the South Region to have the largest hot springs and mineral mud reserve in Vietnam. It is voted by the World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) as one of 65 sustainable eco-tourism areas globally.

In pursuit for a world-class eco-tourism area, Saigon – Binh Chau Tourist Joint Stock Company embarked on renovation of Binh Chau Hot Spring Tourism Area. For its decade long-lasting partnership, Newtecons has been always the first choice of general contractor for Liberty Que Huong to realize their projects. This is proved by the Liberty hotel chain in Ho Chi Minh City and today Binh Chau Tourism Area with a total value of more than VND 1,000 billion.

Binh Chau Tourism Area has taken on a total new face of a new level after 20 months of construction. It puts on show a 5-star Guest House, Japanese style villas and uniquely designed bungalows, not to mention the Southeast Asia’s largest mineral pool, Greek and Japanese style mineral pools, mud baths. There are also nature-embraced facilities such as camping grounds, pristine forest walking paths, egg boiling areas and unexampled cafeteria houses. It is not an overstatement to say Binh Chau Tourism Area is the haven of health.

Southeast Asia’s largest mineral pool

 

5-star Guest House with one-of-a-kind luxurious design

   

Haven for peace and health

The post BINH CHAU – THE CONVERGENCE OF QUINTESSENCES, A HAVEN FOR HEALTH AND PEACE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/binh-chau-the-convergence-of-quintessences-a-haven-for-health-and-peace/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS HELD A FIELD TOUR FOR STUDENTS OF HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-held-a-field-tour-for-students-of-ho-chi-minh-city-university-of-technology/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-held-a-field-tour-for-students-of-ho-chi-minh-city-university-of-technology/#respond Sat, 18 Jul 2020 01:21:11 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-held-a-field-tour-for-students-of-ho-chi-minh-city-university-of-technology/ (July 17, 2020 – Ho Chi Minh City) Newtecons Human Resources in coordination with the Mechanic – Electrical Department organized a field trip for students of the Electrical – Electronics Faculty and Heating and Refrigeration Technology Department under Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology. This program is part of a series of career-oriented and ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS HELD A FIELD TOUR FOR STUDENTS OF HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> (July 17, 2020 – Ho Chi Minh City) Newtecons Human Resources in coordination with the Mechanic – Electrical Department organized a field trip for students of the Electrical – Electronics Faculty and Heating and Refrigeration Technology Department under Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology. This program is part of a series of career-oriented and competency development activities for talented students, which provide a full industry background for students to embark on their career after graduation. 

Students of Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology visited the project

During the tour, students were facilitated to experience the practical working environment, acquire a lot of knowledge about the MEP system from Newtecons’ Site Management Board. Students’ questions about professional knowledge and skills were answered thoroughly by representatives of Newtecons’ Mechanic – Electrical Department.

Representatives of Newtecons’ Mechanic – Electrical Department briefed students on the MEP system at the project

“Although I have learned about the profession before, today I am really excited by the scale and professionalism of the MEP system at the project. As well, their sharing of professional knowledge and career orientation give me a big encouragement on the way ahead”- said a student.

Seeking and nurturing young talents at their schooling is always a key practice to build an excellent team consistent with the Company’s culture. By this program, Newtecons believes that students would accumulate an extensive knowledge background and become talented engineers to join the Newtecons family in the future.

Other images:

]]> In 2020, Newtecons is honorably voted as one of the best companies to work for in Asia by HR-Asia. This result is a clear demonstration for our efforts in building an professional working environment, bringing about satisfaction to all employees.

HR Asia Awards is a prestigious international award which is held to evaluate and honor companies with outstanding personnel policies, attractive remuneration, leading working environment and regularly organizing internal activities to engage employees. In 2020, HR Asia Magazine will assess and select qualified companies in 12 countries throughout Asia including Hong Kong, China, Korea, Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam with many evaluation rounds:

  • Independent research on the reputation of companies with outstanding work environments
  • Total Engagement Assessment Model
  • Interviewing with companies’ managers
  • Evaluating the collected results and data

With the strategy of putting staff in the center of company’s development”, Newtecons always tries to become not only a desirable and satisfactory workplace for our staff but also for talents who want to join Newtecons in the near future.

The post UPDATING THE PROGRESS OF VIETNAM SMART SPEAKER RESEARCH AND PRODUCTION PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Vietnam Smart Speaker Research and Production Factory is invested by Quoc Quang Electric Co., Ltd. (Vietnam). Commencing the project since April 2019, Newtecons has engaged as the Design & Build Contractor. The factory consists of 03-storey workshop, warehouse and items of specialist houses, auxiliary houses, with a total floor area of ​​over 4ha.

Up to now, Newtecons Site Management Team is constructing the finishing works, MEP and infrastructure. At the project, Newtecons Site Management Team has applied the Chiller system to ensure the factory’s cooling capacity. This is a system that uses cold water as an intermediate load, pumped to indoor units to cool the air and distribute to loads throughout the entire system of the factory.

At the end of June 2020, Newtecons Site Management Team will inspect and energize the whole project. Expectedly, in July 2020, the project will be handed over meeting all requirements for quality, safety and progress from the Developer.

The post YOUTH ON SITE OF KYOCERA HAI PHONG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Newtecons engineers, who attach their lives to the sunny and windy land of Hai Phong City, are passionate employees. These more than 70 supervisors, coming from different personalities, thoughts and circumstances, have joined hands from the very beginning and worked side by side for a common goal of completing the Kyocera project. They themselves have blown new winds to the life here.

Walking around the construction site of more than 40 ha wide, our eyes stumbled on brothers working off the reel in high spirit for timely accomplishment of project. Everyone was immersed in the extreme sunlight and burning heat from steel and concrete. However, such hardship could not frustrate anyone of them. “Success doesn’t come from simple things. Every challenge brings me invaluable lessons, drags me out of my comfort zone to make miracles”, said an engineer.

The Site Management Board’s green-day activities and glasses of fresh lemon juice every afternoon made a big consolation for workers to overcome the burning heat on the construction site. Such subtle cares have become a driving force to unite individuals in a shared mind to face up difficulties and challenges.

We imbue our youthfulness in the very passion for work. Being young is being in no fear of challenges. The young generation of Newtecons are holding up their enthusiasm and joining hands to conquer things ahead.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/youth-on-site-of-kyocera-hai-phong-project/feed/ 0 UPDATING THE CONSTRUCTION PROGRESS OF BARETT FOOD AND BEVERAGE PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/updating-the-construction-progress-of-barett-food-and-beverage-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/updating-the-construction-progress-of-barett-food-and-beverage-project/#respond Thu, 18 Jun 2020 07:04:53 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/updating-the-construction-progress-of-barett-food-and-beverage-project/ Barett Food and Beverage Factory is a project invested by Hai Long Hung Yen Joint Stock Company, which is located in Xuan Dao hamlet, Xuan Duc commune, My Hao district, Hung Yen province. The post UPDATING THE CONSTRUCTION PROGRESS OF BARETT FOOD AND BEVERAGE PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Barett Food and Beverage Factory is a project invested by Hai Long Hung Yen Joint Stock Company, which is located in Xuan Dao hamlet, Xuan Duc commune, My Hao district, Hung Yen province. This is a pioneering factory applying 4.0 technology, which is operated based on Braumat system with a Manufacturing Operation Management to optimize and automate management and production activities.

Commenced since October 2019, Barett Food and Beverage Factory has built on a 4.5-hectare plot of land by Newtecons taking on the role of Design and Build. The project is applied the Fast-Track construction method (concurrent construction and design) to ensure the progress and quality of the project. In particular, the finished goods warehouse is constructed with Super Flat Flooring System nearly 10,000m2, which helps increase manufacturing productivity, save space and ensure smooth operation for forklifts.

At the same time, the factory is designed according to LEED standards, strictly complying with issues, such as: increasing drainage efficiency, reducing emissions, using renewable energy resources optimally,… to minimize many negative impacts on human health and the surrounding environment.

Up to now, the Newtecons Management Team concentrates on steel structure works for the main workshop, finishing, MEP and infrastructure. It is expected that, in September 2020, Newtecons Management Team will hand over the project to the Developer on schedule, quality and safety.

Specifically, the furniture factory has met the following requirements: ▪ Using Solar Roof System with maximum allowable capacity (1MWp) ▪ Tree ... Read more

The post BOHO DECOR’S FACTORY HAS EARNED LEED GOLD CERTIFICATION appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> BOHO Decor at which Newtecons take on the role of General Contractor is honored to be the first furniture factory in Vietnam to achieve LEED Gold Certification by The U.S. Green Building Council (USGBC).

Specifically, the furniture factory has met the following requirements:

▪ Using Solar Roof System with maximum allowable capacity (1MWp)

▪ Tree density reaches 27% (required LEED standard is 25%)

▪ Natural ventilation is applied to the entire Factory

▪ Using energy-efficient and water-saving appliances

LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) is the most widely used green building rating system in the world with many stringent criteria. LEED certification is a globally recognized symbol of sustainability achievement and leadership. To save energy and use it efficiently not only reduce costs for business but also play an important role in building a modern life, ensuring energy security, developing sustainably and protecting the environment.

Source: BoHo Décor

The post BOHO DECOR’S FACTORY HAS EARNED LEED GOLD CERTIFICATION appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> [Binh Duong, May 29th, 2020] The Sora Gardens II Project has officially achieved 500,000 safe man-hours. Achieving the milestone of 500,000 safe working hours is a recognition of the contribution of team who have strictly observed safety rules during 13 months of construction.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/sora-gardens-ii-project-achieves-500000-safe-man-hours-without-lti/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED THE TRANSFER BEAM AT THE SÓNG PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-successfully-completed-the-transfer-beam-at-the-song-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-successfully-completed-the-transfer-beam-at-the-song-project/#respond Sat, 09 May 2020 01:53:34 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-successfully-completed-the-transfer-beam-at-the-song-project/ On the night of 7/5/2020, the atmosphere at The Sóng project became “more heat” than ever. Newtecons Site Management Team is ready for the transfer beam with concrete up to 1800m3 and 370 tons of steel at a height of 6.5m. The Site Management Team has mobilized more than 65 concrete trucks, 4 boom pumps, ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED THE TRANSFER BEAM AT THE SÓNG PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> On the night of 7/5/2020, the atmosphere at The Sóng project became “more heat” than ever. Newtecons Site Management Team is ready for the transfer beam with concrete up to 1800m3 and 370 tons of steel at a height of 6.5m. The Site Management Team has mobilized more than 65 concrete trucks, 4 boom pumps, 4 horizontal pumps and 4 mixing stations of 2 concrete suppliers to ensure the continuous supply of concrete during the pouring process.

This transfer beam is a special component applied cooling system to cool large concrete blocks with heat up to 90 degrees C. This system is operated by pumps that bring ice water into the cooling pipe passing through concrete, combined with high bay lamp under the pouring block and heat-proofing plastic fabrics to cover the concrete surface after pouring in order to balance the heat.

Nearly 10 hours passed, until dawn on May 8, 2020, although Newtecons Site Management Team was tired, they still maintained enthusiasm, and successfully conquered the transfer beam that meeting the progress and quality. Immediately after completion of transfer beam, Newtecons Site Management Team will continue with the structural items of typical floors.

Some other images:

]]> (Ho Chi Minh City – March 24, 2020) The groundbreaking ceremony of Cadivi Tower is successfully celebrated at 70 – 72 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia Street, Nguyen Thai Binh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City. The ceremony was attended by representatives of the Developer – Vietnam Electric Cable Joint Stock Company (Cadivi), Vietnam Electrical Equipment Joint Stock Corporation GELEX; Representative of General Contractor – Newtecons Construction Investment Joint Stock Company and other partners, customers.

Cadivi Tower is the headquarters building of Cadivi located in the center of Ho Chi Minh City. This project is overally invested with a system of Grade A office buildings and modern utilities. The project is invested and developed by Gelex Land Limited Company (a member of Vietnam Electrical Equipment Corporation GELEX).

At the ceremony, Mr. Le Quang Dinh – General Director of Cadivi shared his trust about the construction capacity of Newtecons general contractor . ]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-cadivi-tower/feed/ 0 PREMIER BERRIVER IN THE HANDOVER STAGE https://newtecons.vn/en/premier-berriver-in-the-handover-stage/ https://newtecons.vn/en/premier-berriver-in-the-handover-stage/#respond Mon, 24 Feb 2020 04:11:52 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/premier-berriver-in-the-handover-stage/ Located in the center of Long Bien, Premier Berriver was developed, sponsored by three major brands in real estate, construction and finance. Located near the center of Hanoi capital and inherited the recreational facilities, commercial services, large-scale services and many other outstanding advantages, Premier Berriver promises to bring a comfortable and modern living space to ... Read more

The post PREMIER BERRIVER IN THE HANDOVER STAGE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Located in the center of Long Bien, Premier Berriver was developed, sponsored by three major brands in real estate, construction and finance.

Located near the center of Hanoi capital and inherited the recreational facilities, commercial services, large-scale services and many other outstanding advantages, Premier Berriver promises to bring a comfortable and modern living space to Hanoi residents.

Central location

The project has the advantage of location when located in the center of Long Bien district with a synchronized transportation system helping residents easily connect to main destinations of the capital, Noi Bai International Airport and other nearby provinces.

Located in an existing residential area, Premier Berriver has a full range of utilities that meet the needs of residents. The residents only take a few minutes to quickly access to utility services such as Long Bien golf course, Aeon Mall Long Bien shopping center, Wellspring international school, system of public schools, Tam Anh high-class hotel hospital….. or easily go to the old quarter to enjoy many diverse and modern utilities that fully serving the entertainment needs of residents.

Premier Berriver brings a comfortable and modern living space with a variety of utilities such as private indoor pool, modern gym, community room, shophouse on the ground floor of the project … 24 Hour Security Monitoring allows residents to enjoy their life safely, privately.

Diverse gadgets, smart design

The investor reduces density of construction and optimizes apartment’s design and landscape architecture. With a limited number, it has only 210 2-3 bedroom apartments, each apartment is smartly designed to optimize the riverside advantage with unobstructed view, while receiving the natural breeze and lighting from loggia and open balcony.

Leading development team

Not only having advantages of location, diverse utilities, optimal design, the attraction of the project also comes from the strategic cooperation of three leading big brand names in Vietnam: luxury real estate development brand – Masteri, general contractor – Coteccons – Newtecons and Techcombank.

With the advantage of prestige, potential and experience, Masteri is now one of the most prestigious developer brands in Vietnam with 5 large-scale projects in Ho Chi Minh City (Masteri Thao Dien, Masteri An Phu, M-One Saigon South, M-One Gia Dinh and Millennium). Projects developed by Masteri meet rigorous criteria for progress, quality, service and operation.

With the strategic vision and the cooperation of three major brands, Premier Berriver ensures optimal benefits for customers from construction, hand-over to operation, contributing to increasing real estate value over time.

Some pictures of the project:

Source: vnexpress.vn

The post PREMIER BERRIVER IN THE HANDOVER STAGE appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/premier-berriver-in-the-handover-stage/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF STARLAKE PROJECT HANOI SCHOOL https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-starlake-project-hanoi-school/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-starlake-project-hanoi-school/#respond Wed, 19 Feb 2020 01:15:23 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-organized-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-starlake-project-hanoi-school/ (HN – February 19th, 2020) The Starlake Project Hanoi School officially started construction in Tay Ho Tay Urban Center, Bac Tu Liem District, Hanoi. The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE GROUNDBREAKING CEREMONY OF STARLAKE PROJECT HANOI SCHOOL appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> (HN – February 19th, 2020) The Starlake Project Hanoi School officially started construction in Tay Ho Tay Urban Center, Bac Tu Liem District, Hanoi.

Starlake Project Hanoi School meets fully standards of an international school. The school is built on an area of ​​more than 20,000 m2 with 126 classrooms, system of functional rooms and large utility complex such as high-end 4-season swimming pool as Aquatots swim center (USA), music room, creative studio … This is one of the few schools investing heavily in facilities with separate room system and curriculum to promote maximum the student’s creative potential and artistic thinking. The project is considered to be an ideal model for the architecture of green space itself and the largest in Hanoi capital.

As one of the leading contractors in Vietnam who has been constructing many large projects, Newtecons is completely confident when giving this package. Besides, with the prestige in the market, Newtecons commits to complete the project with quality, safety and quick progress.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-organized-the-groundbreaking-ceremony-of-starlake-project-hanoi-school/feed/ 0 CONTEMPLATING THE LUXURY COMPOUND SOL VILLAS IN DISTRICT 2, HCMC https://newtecons.vn/en/contemplating-the-luxury-compound-sol-villas-in-district-2-hcmc/ https://newtecons.vn/en/contemplating-the-luxury-compound-sol-villas-in-district-2-hcmc/#respond Fri, 14 Feb 2020 09:27:24 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/contemplating-the-luxury-compound-sol-villas-in-district-2-hcmc/ 101 compound villas appear rarely in District 2 with the highest standards of living space bringing endless excitement to successful business people. Breaking the usual design rules to create powerful neoclassical mansions, the luxury compound Sol Villas have become a symbol of noble values and timeless. The noble mansion Architectural art is considered the “soul” ... Read more

The post CONTEMPLATING THE LUXURY COMPOUND SOL VILLAS IN DISTRICT 2, HCMC appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> 101 compound villas appear rarely in District 2 with the highest standards of living space bringing endless excitement to successful business people. Breaking the usual design rules to create powerful neoclassical mansions, the luxury compound Sol Villas have become a symbol of noble values and timeless.

The noble mansion

Architectural art is considered the “soul” of each mansion, a place that fully conveys the style, thoughts and status of its owner.

Neoclassical style appeared from the eighteenth century and quickly became a trend spread throughout Europe and North America in the nineteenth century. However, with the meticulousness and sophistication in each line, this art is mainly applied in famous constructions such as government buildings, Stourhead House (Palladian), Woburn Abbey ( England), Altes museum (Germany), Red Army theater (Russia), …

In Vietnam, neoclassical architectural constructions can be found in prime and luxurious locations such as Hanoi Cathedral, Hanoi Opera House, City People’s Committee, Ho Chi Minh City Post Office. … Over hundreds of years, the neoclassical architectures still intact the charm, prestige, becoming an endless source of inspiration for many generations of architects.

With the luxurious, classy and sophisticated nature, showing the position of the owner, the luxury compound Sol Villas in the neoclassical style quickly attracts the attention of successful business people. More specifically, Sol Villas was personally architectural architect Thierry Van De Wyngaert, former president of the French Academy of Architecture. Accordingly, 101 villas were built in the style of neoclassical architecture with high walls, straight columns and exquisite carvings. Therefore, when referring to Sol Villas is referring to the luxury and elegance created by neoclassical architecture “old but never old”.

Talking about Sol Villas, architect Thierry Van De Wyngaert said: “The architecture at Sol Villas contains three important elements. First, these villas have achieved the standards of neoclassical architecture. I was quite impressed with how to move from the outer space into the inner space through a two-story high lobby. Second, the interior space is very comfortable and luxurious. Sunshine and wind can “go” everywhere. Thirdly, the materials used in the villas are also very quality, harmonious in color. The use of arches, composite curves at the base, as opposed to the square windows that move inwards is also a successful combination. ”

Compound villa: Hundred years of honor

Strict standards in architectural planning and high demands of the owner in the design of living space have made the compound villa model “identified” for successful people with a value of up to millions of dollars. Sol Villas is the only compound villa appeared in Cat Lai area, and quickly became a new luxury symbol of the upper class in District 2.

The solemn 101 masterpieces of Sol Villas are privately planned with a team of security, protection, smart cards and modern camera systems. Nowadays, the “position” of successful people is not showing off but being subtly and skillfully expressed through living space. A mansion of authority, isolation, utility is the crown that expresses the class.

Enjoy the “three-storey utility”

Luxury compound Sol Villas are the heart of the PhoDong Village model urban area. Here, the owner enjoys every “privilege” of the upper life.

Sol Villas has a prime location near the administrative center of District 2, the development center of the creative urban area of ​​East Saigon, and has many advantages when quickly moving to commercial centers, international schools, as well as utilities to meet the needs of entertainment, health care … in the region.

But not only that, right in the luxury compound Sol Villas, the Investor – Saigon Construction Joint Stock Company (SCC) and the General Contractor – Newtecons have equipped with top-notch utilities to meet the owner’s demands such as gym, sauna, yoga, club, swimming pool, children’s play area … along with other items such as nursing homes, schools, … With green space are carefully cared for , Sol Villas optimizes the connection of nature and people, bringing a noble life but still comfortable and peaceful.

Source: Saigon Construction Joint Stock Company (SCC)

The post CONTEMPLATING THE LUXURY COMPOUND SOL VILLAS IN DISTRICT 2, HCMC appeared first on Newtecons.

Leaving aside the chaos, hustle and bustle, all officers and employees of Newtecons enjoyed meaningful moments today. The time to welcome Lunar New Year ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS YEAR-END PARTY “ENDLESS INNOVATION” AND IMAGE OF A SUPER SPEED TRAIN appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Following the success of the Staff Meeting, the 2019 Year-End Party with the theme of “Newtecons Endless Innovation – Super Speed 2020” has made hundreds of employees burst into emotions by inspirational speeches, unique performances and reunited moments after a year of work.

Unlike programs of previous years, the ideas and the size of the guests of this year-end party are more in-depth and varied. In addition to the attendance of nearly 450 employees of the Company, the party welcomed the representatives of Coteccons Group’s Board of Directors and nearly 200 guests who are partners and customers of Newtecons.

In order to have 90 minutes of sublimation on stage at Vinpearl Luxury Landmark 81, the Organization Board of the program in collaboration with Agency LongKan took nearly 2 months to develop ideas together, make reasonable plans based on the Board of Directors’ initial orientation of “Endless Innovation”. Additionally, the choice of venue is also an important step to create a feeling for the program. Landmark 81 is one of the major projects built by the hands and minds of Newtecons’ people. The image of the super speed train is used to show the speed of development – modernization – strength – connection with directions of Newtecons.

Despite a few shortcomings in the organization, for Newtecons’ people in particular and the guests attending, we had a night of uplifting and burning party. When the song “The Great Circle of Vietnam (Nối Vòng Tay Lớn)” was sung by Microwave Band, it was time for all people to connect shoulder to shoulder like small wagons to harmonize meaningful lyrics together. It is remarkable for this Year-End Party of Newtecons.

Journey 2020 is coming so close, and Newtecons’ people are continuing to accelerate, make best effort and stand side-by-side together on next journeys.

]]> (HCM – December 21st, 2019) Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company successfully organized the Staff Meeting in 2019, closing the emotional “Change to Break” journey of nearly 450 employees of the Company.

In 2019, revenue from the construction and electromechanical segment made impressive progress, reaching 100% of planned profit. More specifically, Newtecons with a solid reputation in the construction market has continued to connect with customers, traditional partners and expand the network of cooperation with investors from Japan and China.

At the program, the Newtecons Board of Directors has continued to set out strong plans and directions of operations, which reflect the spirit of “ENDLESS INNOVATION” for 2020.

In addition, the Meeting honored outstanding collectives and individuals who made significant outstanding contributions during the past year. Compared to previous years, the program has an additional innovation by adding the category of selecting Top 15 Under 35 Newtecons, finding influential individuals in each field who is publicly elected on the Company’s website system.

The future begins with the ongoing efforts in the present and the solidarity of Newtecons’ people who dare to commit, dare to think and dare to act. The “2020 – Endless Innovation” journey is coming so close, and the Company’s Board of Directors and 450 Newtecons’ employees are ready for a new challenging journey.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-sucessfully-organized-the-staff-meeting-2019/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS SUCCESSFULLY ORGANIZED THE TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF WÍNK SAIGON CENTER HOTEL PROJECT https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-successfully-organized-the-topping-out-ceremony-of-wink-saigon-center-hotel-project/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-successfully-organized-the-topping-out-ceremony-of-wink-saigon-center-hotel-project/#respond Fri, 15 Nov 2019 06:11:26 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-successfully-organized-the-topping-out-ceremony-of-wink-saigon-center-hotel-project/ (HCM – November 15th, 2019) The General Contractor of Newtecons and Indochina Kajima Development Ltd. The post NEWTECONS SUCCESSFULLY ORGANIZED THE TOPPING OUT CEREMONY OF WÍNK SAIGON CENTER HOTEL PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> (HCM – November 15th, 2019) The General Contractor of Newtecons and Indochina Kajima Development Ltd. (Indochina Kajima) successfully organized the Topping Out Ceremony of  Wínk Saigon Center Hotel project.

With 237 rooms, Wínk Saigon Center is located at 75 Nguyen Binh Khiem Street, District 1, HCMC. The project is expected to open in the third quarter of 2020. The Topping Out Ceremony of the Wínk Saigon Center Hotel marks the completion of construction of the superstructure of the project, towards the interior and exterior finishing. The hotel design simulates the typical characteristics of the Wínk brand: modern, minimalist, effective on the basis of cultural values and Vietnamese traditions.

This is the first project of a series of 20 Wínk hotel projects developed by ICC Kajima in Vietnam.

* Additional information: ICC Kajima is a joint venture between Indochina Capital, a leading real estate developer in Vietnam, Kajima Group, one of the largest real estate contractors and developers in Japan.

]]> Newtecons currently owns young human resources, mainly U35 group. NewVote is a program organized to motivate and inspire Newtecons employees through nomination/self-nomination and voting. In addition, this campaign helps Newtecons find the nucleus in all fields, a generation that is considered the pioneer team and the company’s representatives in the journey of creativity, dedication and shine to blow up the fire of passion to colleagues and the community.

“Create superstars in your company”- It was the advice of John Makerte, President of Allied Breweries, a successful boss with the art of encouraging his employees.

Every day of us is a journey to find inspiration. Inspirations not only come from those who stand on the most glorious peak, but also come from the simplest people; from the greatest achievements, to the simplest stories about us – those who shape the pristine land, those who live with the desire to conquer the peak of Vietnam and the world.

No matter who you are or where you are working – just as you are Newtecons’ people. Please share your inspirational story. VOTE AND SEND us stories and feelings about Newtecons’ people that make you feel proud.

NewVote2019, the journey of inspiration has begun. Join Newtecons to explore the NewVote 2019 journey, the journey of proud stories and look for characters that motivate you at Newtecons.

The program takes place at: vote.newtecons.vn

Time to receive nomination/self-nomination applications: November 7th, 2019 – December 6th, 2019

Time to open the voting port: December 7th, 2019 – December 14th, 2019

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/bold-to-nominate-confident-to-self-nominate-at-the-newvote-program-vote-top-under-35/feed/ 0 UPDATE THE CONSTRUCTION PROGRESS OF BOHO DECOR FACTORY  https://newtecons.vn/en/update-the-construction-progress-of-boho-decor-factory/ https://newtecons.vn/en/update-the-construction-progress-of-boho-decor-factory/#respond Tue, 15 Oct 2019 06:17:16 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/update-the-construction-progress-of-boho-decor-factory/ Commenced on May 28th, 2019, up to now, after more than 4 months of construction by Newtecons at an urgent pace, the important basic items of BOHO Factory such as assembly of beton structures, guard house, fire protection tanks, etc., are completed. BOHO Decor Factory is expected to come into operation in the first quarter ... Read more

The post UPDATE THE CONSTRUCTION PROGRESS OF BOHO DECOR FACTORY  appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> Commenced on May 28th, 2019, up to now, after more than 4 months of construction by Newtecons at an urgent pace, the important basic items of BOHO Factory such as assembly of beton structures, guard house, fire protection tanks, etc., are completed.

BOHO Decor Factory is expected to come into operation in the first quarter of 2020.

*Additional information: BoHo Décor Factory was built on a total area of nearly 30,000 m2 in Long An. The design of the project is based on environmentally friendly LEED standards. BoHo Decor is the general contractor of furniture in some major projects across the country: City Garden, One Verandah, Viettel Group Headquarters, etc.

Here are some pictures of construction works up to the present time.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/update-the-construction-progress-of-boho-decor-factory/feed/ 0 NEWTECONS CO-OPERATED WITH JAPANESE, COMMENCED SORA GARDENS II PROJECT BINH DUONG https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-co-operated-with-japanese-commenced-sora-gardens-ii-project-binh-duong/ https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-co-operated-with-japanese-commenced-sora-gardens-ii-project-binh-duong/#respond Mon, 23 Sep 2019 03:53:50 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/newtecons-co-operated-with-japanese-commenced-sora-gardens-ii-project-binh-duong/  (HCM – July 31, 2019) Accordingly, Sora Gardens II Project Binh Duong is the project that marks the next cooperation between BTMJR Investment Limited Company and Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company. The superstructure commencement ceremony was successfully held at Lot C17, Hung Vuong Boulevard, Hoa Phu Ward, Thu Dau Mot City, Binh Duong Province. ... Read more

The post NEWTECONS CO-OPERATED WITH JAPANESE, COMMENCED SORA GARDENS II PROJECT BINH DUONG appeared first on Newtecons.

]]>  (HCM – July 31, 2019) Accordingly, Sora Gardens II Project Binh Duong is the project that marks the next cooperation between BTMJR Investment Limited Company and Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company. The superstructure commencement ceremony was successfully held at Lot C17, Hung Vuong Boulevard, Hoa Phu Ward, Thu Dau Mot City, Binh Duong Province. The ceremony featured the representatives of Committees of Binh Duong Province, Becamex IDC Board of Management, Mitsubishi Asia & Vietnam Real Estate Group, Coteccons Group Board of Management and all employees of the project

Sora Gardens II is the second project built next to Sora Gardens I which is located in Binh Duong province. The project takes the “Extra Life” style as the theme, in order to bring customers the most luxurious living space The project’s design is a unique “X” shape providing spectacular views from majority of the units and includes an attractive amenities package of an infinity swimming pool (25 meter), sauna, gym, flower garden, guest room, and BBQ area.. This project is invested by two representatives from Japan, “Tokyu Corporation” and “Mitsubishi Jisho Residence”. These companies will apply the experience and knowledge gained in Japan and overseas markets, along with the support from Becamex IDC Corporation to develop the most luxurious apartment project. in Binh Duong province.

With great respect, Mr. Furukawa Takashi – International Sales Manager of Tokyu Group, representative of the investor made a welcoming speech and praised the Newtecons – the contractor of the tunnel construction of the Sora Gardens II Project. With the completion of the tunnel section on schedule, professionally, he believes that Newtecons will continue to maintain the bravery, successfully cooperate with BTMJR Investment in the next phase of the project. In addition, he would like to express his sincere thanks to the companions of the provincial committee, the general contractor – Newtecons and the management consultants.

In response to the trust of the investor, Mr. Tran Kim Long – General Director of Newtecons Company said that being one of the prestigious contractors in Vietnam, Newtecons will surely cooperate with BTMJR Investment and bring high quality products, ensure progress for customers – residents of Sora Gardens II Project. In addition, Newtecons wishes this project will be a solid foundation for long-term cooperation between the parties.

After the ceremony, the entire Sora Gardens II Project site management team quickly started to implement the next items of the project. For site management team, Sora Gardens II is one of the special projects by request, “standard” from Japanese experts. Right from the tunnel phase, site management team has focused on construction, changing manners and constantly learning to meet the standards from the Investor.

The post NEWTECONS ORGANIZED THE FIRST INTERNAL TRAINING COURSE FOR QS SUPERVISORS IN 2019 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> (9 March, 2019 – Ho Chi Minh City) Under the Company’s plan, the Training Section coordinates with the Contract & Cost Control Management Department to organize the internal training course for QS for the first time in 2019. The program is attended by internal lecturer Tran Vu Dang Son – Deputy Tender Department Manager and 45 students who are QS Supervisors at sites across the country.

Internal lecturer Tran Vu Dang Son at the training session

The internal training program entitled “Knowledge – Skills – QS operations” will last for 8 weeks, starting from March 2019. According to the Newtecons Training Section, this training program aims to add knowledge and skills to the QS Supervisors  on site. Since then, it would be able to support the students how to handle and organize work in planning according to the new standards of the Company.

The students are QS Supervisors and the Trainer at the training session

Internal training is a unique culture that is focused on by all Newtecons departments & sites and aims to achieve specific quality. According to the survey, after participating in internal training programs, the spirit of learning, self-training and continuous improvement of capacity is strongly spread among the staff of the Company. In 2019, the development of internal training programs will be further promoted by the Training Section and the Board of Management.

Overview of the first QS Supervisory training session in 2019

The post NEWTECONS AND BOHO DÉCOR STARTED TO CONSTRUCT LONG AN FURNITURE FACTORY PROJECT appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> (Long An – May 28, 2019) Newtecons Construction Investment Joint Stock Company and BoHo Décor Company successfully organized the groundbreaking ceremony of the BoHo Décor Factory project at Lot 29, Road 7, Tan Duc Industrial Park, Duc Hoa Ha Commune, Duc Hoa district, Long An province.

Representative of the Investor – BoHo Décor Company and Design & Build General Contractor – Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company at the ceremony

BoHo Décor factory is a factory specializing in furniture production with a total area of ​​30,000m2, green area up to 7500m2. As a Design & Build General contractor, Newtecons will implement constructing, finishing and ME works.  in this project. According to BoHo Décor, the project plays an important role in R&D strategy and promotes the company’s Design & Build interior capabilities. Specifically, in the future this factory will support the process of research and production of products that meet quality requirements that are competitive in the market.

Mr. Nguyen Dang Hoang Chuong – General Director of BoHo Décor shared, “For us, Newtecons is the contractor that meets the expectations of D&B of the project at this time. This is also the first time BoHo Décor and Newtecons cooperate directly as investors and construction contractors. I hope that in the future, we will continue to cooperate with other contractors in Coteccons Group system ”.

Previously, these two companies together with members of Coteccons Group carried out some successful big projects, such as Paihong Binh Duong Factory, GainLucky Tay Ninh Factory, City Garden Project … Right after the ceremony, Newtecons’s site management  teamand BoHo Décor quickly deployed their work with the goal of  completing project meeting all requirement about progress, quality.

The entire Newtecons site management team at the project
