]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/newtecons-and-boho-decor-started-to-construct-long-an-furniture-factory-project/feed/ 0 THE PROFIT OF NEWTECONS INCREASED IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2019 https://newtecons.vn/en/the-profit-of-newtecons-increased-in-the-first-quarter-of-2019/ https://newtecons.vn/en/the-profit-of-newtecons-increased-in-the-first-quarter-of-2019/#respond Wed, 19 Jun 2019 02:30:06 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/the-profit-of-newtecons-increased-in-the-first-quarter-of-2019/ With the project bidding situation and results achieved, the Board of Director of the company strives to complete and exceed the business plan set out this year. At the beginning of April, Newtecons started simultaneously two projects in the center of Ho Chi Minh City and Binh Duong province, namely the Wink Hotel Saigon Center ... Read more

The post THE PROFIT OF NEWTECONS INCREASED IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2019 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> With the project bidding situation and results achieved, the Board of Director of the company strives to complete and exceed the business plan set out this year.

At the beginning of April, Newtecons started simultaneously two projects in the center of Ho Chi Minh City and Binh Duong province, namely the Wink Hotel Saigon Center and the Sora Gardens II Project.

Rapid growth rate

Newtecons Construction Investment Joint Stock Company has just announced its business results inthe first quarter of 2019 with fast growth targets. Revenue is estimated to increase by 158% over the same period last year. Along with revenue, after-tax profit also reaches high growth.

This result is more outstanding to many enterprises in the same industry and is even more remarkable in the time when the real estate market is difficult. Some investors acknowledge the legal review of many real estate projects have caused the approval and implementation of projects suspended. This directly affects the contractor, even causes the situation of delaying the project to start and break the bidding plan.

However, Newtecons still find potential niche markets with mega projects across the country, stretching from the North to the South. On the other hand, Newtecons’ close strategic partner – Coteccons has a strong financial potential to help the company fully concentrate its human resources and material resources on safe construction, quality and on-schedule. Newtecons brand reputation and construction reputation are always highly appreciated and trusted by investors.

From a business with only 3-digit revenue, Newtecons continuously asserted itself, accelerating rapidly with targets of several trillion dong each year.Contractors of  mega projects

If assessing the brand of the construction company with thesites, the image associated with Newteccons was Landmark 81, Casino Nam Hoi An, Masteri Thao Dien CT5, Vinhomes Thang Long, Flamingo Dai Lai Resort … From a construction company with small contracts, Newtecons have been constantly rising, marking their iconic projects.

In 2019, Newtecons continued to implement projects worth triliions such as Vincity Grand Park (District 9, Ho Chi Minh City), Vincity Sportia (Hanoi), Vincity Ocean Park (Hanoi), Hotel Project 58 Tay Ho (Hanoi) …

At the beginning of April, Newtecons started simultaneously two projects in the center of Ho Chi Minh City and Binh Duong province, the Wink Hotel Saigon Center project and the Sora Gardens II project. Also in the first quarter of 2019, Newtecons started to construct many projects from North to South, including: One Hub Saigon Phase II; Manwah Factory Phase II; Vincity Ocean Park (Gia Lam), Vincity Sportia; Vincity Grand Park – Lot I1 – PK2; 58 Tay Ho Hotel; Sora Gardens II Binh Duong; Binh Chau Hot Spring Resort, BoHo Décor Long An Factory Project.

In addition, with the strategy of cooperating with some investors who have available land for development, Newtecons has implemented real estate projects in Vung Tau with great value.

With the project bidding situation and the results achieved, the Board of Director of the company strives to complete and exceed the business plan set out this year.

Source: VnEconomy

The post THE PROFIT OF NEWTECONS INCREASED IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2019 appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/the-profit-of-newtecons-increased-in-the-first-quarter-of-2019/feed/ 0 WÍNK HOTEL ANNOUNCES MAIN CONTRACTOR FOR WÍNK SAIGON CENTRE HOTEL https://newtecons.vn/en/wink-hotel-announces-main-contractor-for-wink-saigon-centre-hotel/ https://newtecons.vn/en/wink-hotel-announces-main-contractor-for-wink-saigon-centre-hotel/#respond Thu, 18 Apr 2019 02:25:13 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/wink-hotel-announces-main-contractor-for-wink-saigon-centre-hotel/ HCM CITY — ICC-Kajima, a joint venture between Indochina Capital, a leading real estate property developer in Việt Nam, and Kajima Corporation, Japanese overseas real estate developer, hosted a groundbreaking ceremony for the appointment of Newtecons, a subsidiary of Coteccons, as the main contractor for Wínk Saigon Centre Hotel (Wínk 75NBK), the first Wínk Hotel ... Read more

The post WÍNK HOTEL ANNOUNCES MAIN CONTRACTOR FOR WÍNK SAIGON CENTRE HOTEL appeared first on Newtecons.

]]>

HCM CITY — ICC-Kajima, a joint venture between Indochina Capital, a leading real estate property developer in Việt Nam, and Kajima Corporation, Japanese overseas real estate developer, hosted a groundbreaking ceremony for the appointment of Newtecons, a subsidiary of Coteccons, as the main contractor for Wínk Saigon Centre Hotel (Wínk 75NBK), the first Wínk Hotel in Việt Nam.

Wínk 75 NBK will be located in the HCM City’s District 1 with 237 rooms. The hotel aims to offer modern design, a coworking space, innovative food and beverage concepts, cutting edge technology and minimalist guestrooms.

Wínk aims to champion the affordable luxury segment in Việt Nam,.

“This is a key milestone for the first ICC-Kajima project. After carrying out a thorough tender process, we are satisfied with the end result – Newtecons has been appointed for basement superstructure and masonry works,” said Peter Ryder, CEO of Indochina Capital and Chairman of ICC-Kajima. “They have worked on several notable projects in Việt Nam and we strongly believe that Newtecons will add value to our development.”

Trần Kim Long, general director of Newtecons, shared, “With our extensive experience and strong credentials in carrying out hospitality projects, we will do our best to ensure the highest aesthetic and technical standards for Wink 75 NBK.”

Newtecons has worked on a series of projects in Việt Nam, including Landmark 81, Masteri Thảo Điền, Casino Nam Hội An and Forest in the Sky Residences at Flamingo Đại Lải.  ICC-Kajima expects Newtecons to complete their work in November 2019 and is currently tendering the MEPF package for the project.

Wínk 75 NBK is set to open in the first half of 2020.

Read more at: Vietnamnews.vn

The post WÍNK HOTEL ANNOUNCES MAIN CONTRACTOR FOR WÍNK SAIGON CENTRE HOTEL appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/wink-hotel-announces-main-contractor-for-wink-saigon-centre-hotel/feed/ 0 GREAT GROWTH POTENTIAL OF NEWTECONS WITH 55% REVENUE PLAN https://newtecons.vn/en/great-growth-potential-of-newtecons-with-55-revenue-plan/ https://newtecons.vn/en/great-growth-potential-of-newtecons-with-55-revenue-plan/#respond Thu, 14 Mar 2019 04:19:34 +0000 https://newtecons.vn/great-growth-potential-of-newtecons-with-55-revenue-plan/ In a stormy market, Newtecons want to establish a parallel position in both construction and real estate. The potential and experience of a 15-year construction company is sufficient to expect to turn the target into reality. Real estate, building “sublimation” Mr. Tran Khanh Quang, real estate expert said that in 2019 the market continued to ... Read more

The post GREAT GROWTH POTENTIAL OF NEWTECONS WITH 55% REVENUE PLAN appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> In a stormy market, Newtecons want to establish a parallel position in both construction and real estate. The potential and experience of a 15-year construction company is sufficient to expect to turn the target into reality.

Real estate, building “sublimation”

Mr. Tran Khanh Quang, real estate expert said that in 2019 the market continued to grow strongly. The inner city real estate in Ho Chi Minh City has a high price but the demand is still great. If the investor launches the project with products that are of real value, it will surely succeed. He predicts the market will grow from 10 to 15% over the previous year.
Not only Mr. Quang, many experts as well as management units said that 2019 real estate market will not have “bubbles”. The signal of the market is still very good, when in 2018, the leading real estate in the industry had a sudden growth in profit, up to 78%.


Along with sustainable development from the real estate market, the construction industry enterprises in 2018 also marked a bold mark with outstanding business results. A business leader expected that in 2019, even if the bank has tightened credit on real estate, it was difficult for the construction industry to grow at a certain rate, about 6-8%. Enterprises will still grow faster than the overall growth of the economy and construction industry.

Newtecons: Average revenue growth of 62% / year

In the general flow of the real estate and construction market, FDC Construction and Investment Joint Stock Company changed its name to Newtecons Construction Investment Joint Stock Company. During 15 years of construction and growth, the company’s name has been associated with construction and many big projects such as Landmark 81, Hoi An Casino, Vinhomes Times City – Park Hill 5, Vinhomes Golden River – Aqua Tower 2, Flamingo Dai Lai Resort.

Along with the change of name, Newtecons aims to become a construction company associated with real estate and other promising business sectors. In particular, the company plans to cooperate with businesses that have available land to embark on potential real estate and opportunities.
To realize this ambition, Newtecons possesses a solid business result and maintains good growth. In the period 2012-2017, Newtecons kept an average annual growth rate of 62%.

Through the continuous efforts, Newtecons has been recognized in the top 10 prestigious Construction Contractors in Vietnam market, according to Vietnam Report (VNR) in Vietnamnet in 2017. Not only that Newtecons also ranked 11th among 500 largest private construction enterprises in Vietnam.

By 2019, Newtecons aims to increase revenue by 55% and profit after tax by 67% over the previous year. The company will also continue executing large projects such as Vincity Gia Lam, Diamond Island 2, Gain Lucky factory (Tay Ninh), OneHub SaiGon project, 58 Tay Ho project (Hanoi) …

The post GREAT GROWTH POTENTIAL OF NEWTECONS WITH 55% REVENUE PLAN appeared first on Newtecons.

]]> https://newtecons.vn/en/great-growth-potential-of-newtecons-with-55-revenue-plan/feed/ 0
